Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of October 7, 2024 ▪️ At night, the R...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 7, 2024▪️ At night, the Russian Armed Forces launched strikes on the enemy’s rear areas. UAVs - Geranium - and missile weapons operated in Kyiv, Cherkassy, ​​Konotop, Sumy region, Baturin, Chernihiv region, Sinelnikovo, Dnepropetrovsk region.▪️ The Ukrainian Armed Forces also used attack UAVs. They reported on the successful work of air defense in Crimea, Bryansk and Kursk regions ▪️ In the Kursk region in the Glushkovsky district, oncoming battles continue, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are not abandoning attempts to advance to the north. In the south of the Sudzhansky district, the Russian Armed Forces advanced into the area of ​​the settlement with heavy fighting. Plekhovo, repelling one counterattack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Korenevsky sector, the assault groups of our troops continued their attacking actions and significantly advanced in the south-eastern direction, reports the group of troops -North.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), our troops continue to advance in the center along Torgovaya and Rudnichnaya streets and are conducting assault operations in the direction of the mine -Central-.▪️ From the Pokrovsky direction, messages are coming in about the advance of the Russian Army to the west about Tsukurino. In addition, information is being received about the entry of our troops into Novoselidovo, located to the southwest. Information has appeared about the release of the Desired Second, but so far without video footage from the field. In general, this development of events in the southwestern direction indicates the continuing collapse of enemy defenses. ▪️ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success after the capture of Ugledar. There is a gradual movement north towards Epiphany; fragmentary data have been received about the effective actions of our troops in Zolotaya Niva. Constant attacks on Katerynivka (Ekaterinivka) continue. ▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Kamensk direction began to move. Our assault groups, with the support of UAVs, advanced to the northwestern part of the village of Kamenskoye. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine hit Shebekino several times, a woman was wounded. In the morning in Shebekino, an FPV drone attacked an industrial building; a woman with a mine explosion injury and a shrapnel wound to her leg was taken to the hospital. In the village of Kozmodemyanovka, Shebekinsky urban district, an FPV drone flew into the window of a residential building. As a result of the attack, a 13-year-old child had scratches on his neck, which the parents treated themselves; they refused to call an ambulance. In the village of Yasnye Zori, Belgorod region, a drone attacked an apartment building.▪️In Donetsk, a man born in 1964 was killed by a Ukrainian Armed Forces artillery strike. In Gorlovka, a man born in 1943 died during the detonation of a previously unexploded cluster submunition. There, as a result of the release of an IED from the UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, a woman born in 1973 was injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsZaporozhye FrontChannel @zovpobedy confirms the offensive actions of our troops: the Russian Armed Forces advanced in Kamensky, as can be seen in the recording we published, they entered the area of ​​dachas, crossing dam. Two majors

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of September 30 - October 6, 2024▪️Russian troops continued to strike at identified enemy targets over the past week. In the Nikolaev region, a train with ammunition for artillery guns and mortars in Kazanka came under fire.▪️In the Odessa region, a ferry terminal in the Izmail district was hit during a drone raid. The facility was used for the transit of goods to Romania. The crossing was closed for more than 12 hours.▪️In the Sumy region, Russian troops worked on the enemy’s critical infrastructure. During the raids, power facilities in the Shostkinsky and Sumy regions were disabled, which led to long-term blackouts.▪️Ukrainian formations carried out a massive drone raid on the Voronezh region in the middle of the week. The target was military airfields in the region, all UAVs were shot down by air defense forces, there were no casualties among personnel or aircraft.▪️The next day, Ukrainian formations again attacked the region with drones. Most of them were shot down, but several were able to hit the territory of the Anninsk oil depot.▪️At the same time, the Ukrainian special services continued to carry out terrorist attacks. In Energodar, the head of the pass service of the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant was killed.▪️In the Kursk region, a Russian armored group carried out a successful attack south of the Plekhovo-Borki line in the Sudzhansky district. To the north, the Russian Armed Forces regained control of positions in the area of ​​Kauchuk and Kromskiye Bykov.▪️In the Glushkovsky district, Russian troops consistently occupied previously lost positions. The enemy has been driven south from Veselye, to the east there are battles within the borders of Medvezhye.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on October 5-6, 2024. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in various areas of the so-called. Ukraine, including the Novokramatorsky Machine-Building Plant, the workshops of which are used by the Ukrainian Armed Forces as warehouses for storing ammunition. In the Kursk direction, fighting continues in the Glushkovsky region, where the enemy managed to advance in forest belts. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, Russian troops repelled attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, while simultaneously striking enemy positions on the front line and in the near rear. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces destroyed two crossings of Ukrainian formations and, according to some sources, started fighting on the outskirts of Kolesnikovka and Kruglyakovka, advancing in the direction of the Oskol River. Official statements are coming from the Donetsk direction about the release of Zhelanny Vtoroy, despite the lack of objective control personnel from the populated area. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian army fighters have expanded the zone of control north of Konstantinovka and are attacking the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near Antonovka. There have also been reports about the start of battles for Zolotaya Niva, but this information has not yet been confirmed by objective monitoring personnel.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru ; en) South Donetsk direction (ru; en)#digest #report #Donetsk #map #Kupyansk #Kursk #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Glushkovsky and Koren...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting in the Glushkovsky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end October 6, 2024 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas. Ukrainian formations remain highly active and launch attacks. 🔻In the Glushkovsky district, fighting continues in the Vesely area, where the enemy has occupied several forest belts to the east and south of the settlement. Russian aviation is striking the Ukrainian Armed Forces in adjacent areas of the Sumy region. In the Dibrova area, Russian Aerospace Forces crews destroyed an M777 howitzer that was firing from a forest area. Also, hits occurred in places where the Ukrainian Armed Forces were concentrated in Volfino, Bondarevshchina and Katerynovka.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces repelled enemy attacks in the Lyubimovka area and on the eastern approaches to Obukhovka. In Lyubimovka itself, the Lancet strike destroyed the MRAP Roshel Senator of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In the Kremyanoy area, Russian UAV operators hit an armored car of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, finishing off the surviving crew members. To the east of the settlement, an attack by the Russian Armed Forces was recorded in the direction of a forest that had been repeatedly subjected to airstrikes. Objective control footage does not allow us to determine the outcome of the assault. In the Sudzhansky district, Ukrainian formations attacked in the area of ​​Kamyshevka and Plekhovo, but were unsuccessful. The Russian Aerospace Forces carried out a series of attacks on the enemy’s rear infrastructure in the vicinity of Sudzha. In the border zone, IDF units continue raids on the Kafr Kila-Al-Adisa and Yarun-Aitarun borders. At the same time, the presence of Israeli troops in the center of Yarun, where a large mosque was blown up, is confirmed. The Israelis also attacked several targets in northwestern Syria. In Homs, an Israeli drone attacked a car, and near the border of Al-Qusayr, it hit targets involved in smuggling into Lebanon. And The Washington Post published an article according to which Israeli intelligence in 2015 introduced booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies with a device for listening to conversations of Hezbollah members into Lebanon. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸 Battle for Jabaliya: the beginning of a new IDF ope...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸 Battle for Jabaliya: the start of a new IDF operation Situation as of 19:00 October 6, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops began another ground operation in Jabaliya. Prior to this, IDF units operated in the settlement in May - then they occupied the southeastern part of the camp in three weeks, after which they left the settlement, reporting the destruction of terrorist infrastructure and the elimination of Hamas militants. The IDF press service associated the new offensive with the receipt of intelligence information about the restoration of Hamas' combat potential in the populated area. At the same time, the operation involved the forces of 162 divisions, which were transferred from the territory of the border - Philadelphia corridor - in the south of the Palestinian enclave. ▪️In the morning, the IDF press service announced the evacuation from the northern part of the Gaza Strip. Residents were advised to leave their homes and travel south to the expanded humanitarian zone. Meanwhile, Hamas tried to prevent the evacuation of the population by calling on residents to move only to a neighboring residential area until the Israeli offensive ceases.▪️Currently, no footage has appeared on the Internet that could clarify the configuration of the front in the vicinity of Jabaliya. However, according to incoming textual statements from Hamas, Israeli units are present at least on the northern and southern outskirts of the city. At the same time, the command of the Israeli Defense Forces claimed in the morning that the settlement was completely encircled.▪️Against the background of the offensive, Palestinian formations launched two missiles towards the border Zikim and Ashkelon. Both munitions were intercepted by Israeli air defenses. ▪️At the same time, the Israelis continued to strike both Jabaliya and neighboring settlements, including the capital of the Palestinian enclave. Meanwhile, according to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, over the past 24 hours, 45 people were killed and 256 injured during IDF strikes. 🔻Only five months have passed since the last operation of Israeli troops in Jabaliya, but during this period Hamas, according to the IDF, was able to restore its combat potential and now again pose a threat. Against this backdrop, Israeli society began to once again question why IDF soldiers have to carry out operations in the same places over and over again. The secret of the current situation is that Hamas is the only organization capable of governing Gaza: any civil institution is closely connected with it, the flow of humanitarian aid is also under the control of Hamas, and against the backdrop of resonant strikes by the IDF, the number of people wishing to join the ranks of the movement remains at a high level . Be that as it may, this state of affairs is quite satisfactory for the ultra-Orthodox government. And in the context of the aggravation on the Lebanese-Israeli border, the Gaza Strip acquired another role - it actually became a training ground for IDF fighters, while most of the elite formations had already been transferred to the war with Hezbollah.📌 Moreover, the start of another operation in the Gaza Strip on the eve of the anniversary of the escalation of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, this is a unique way for Israelis to declare their commitment to the fight against the Palestinians and to continue the chosen course. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Jabaliya #Israel #map #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇦🇰🇬🦠 On the possible denunciation of the agreement between ...
Description: 🇨🇦🇰🇬🦠 On the possible denunciation of the agreement between Kyrgyzstan and Canada on the construction of a biological laboratory In Kyrgyzstan, the public again drew attention to the agreement concluded back in 2008 with Canada on the construction of a biological laboratory, which should have marked the beginning of its appearance back in the early 2010s. However, the color revolution in 2011 and the publication of this information caused the refusal to implement this agreement due to public pressure. As a result, the laboratory did not appear, but some agreements are still in effect, which causes concern among citizens.📌 And this concern of the Kyrgyz people can be understood. After the COVID-19 epidemic, the authorities are taking biological threats seriously, and in recent years, measles outbreaks on the Kyrgyz-Kazakh border have become more frequent, resulting in the deaths of many people, including children. And social activists attribute the increased number of cases to the emergence of a biological laboratory in Almaty - 230 km from Bishkek. It is there, and in the neighboring Zhambyl region, that an abnormal number of measles cases have been recorded. The example of Kyrgyzstan clearly shows what a public reaction can lead to. The politicians entered into an agreement, everything seemed to be decided, but the people had their say. In Kazakhstan, this has not even been heard of, and laboratories appear there like mushrooms after rain. In 2025, in the village of Gvardeysky in the already mentioned Zhambyl region of Kazakhstan, it is planned to build a biological laboratory of the BSL-4 level. And this is similar to the one in Wuhan, China - the one where the coronavirus broke out. #Canada #Kyrgyzstan@rybar Support usTelegram Test Tube Genie | Biological laboratories🇰🇬|🇨🇦The population of Kyrgyzstan asks to cancel the agreement on a biological laboratory with Canada Residents of Kyrgyzstan demand that the authorities denounce the agreement with Canada on the construction of a biological laboratory on the territory of the republic. In August 2008, between governments...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇷 About Iran's preparation for an Israeli attack While the ...
Description: 🇮🇷 About Iran's preparation for an Israeli attack While the number of various scenarios for Israel's response to a missile strike by Iranian troops is growing on the Internet, Iran is preparing with all its might for a possible strike from the air defense in the coming days. Bloomberg, citing satellite images, TankerTrackers reports that Iranian tankers that were near Khark Island were withdrawn deep into the Persian Gulf in case of an attack on the country's energy infrastructure. Khark Island is the largest transit hub in Iran, through which about 90% of Iranian oil exports pass. In the event of an attack on this island, Iran’s already weakened economy could be seriously damaged. From a logical point of view, an attack on oil facilities in the medium term looks much more dangerous than on nuclear infrastructure. The Islamic Republic's economy is now heavily dependent on energy exports. The defeat of the ports used for this, or oil refineries such as in Khuzestan, could seriously hit the economy. And this, taking into account the already deplorable state inside Iran, will cause discontent among the population. Here it is simply worth remembering the protests in Iran, which have been going on for months. Initially, they arose due to the death of a Kurdish woman, and then grew into spontaneous rallies due to the deterioration of the economic situation. And from time to time people still go on strike.❗️The Iranian authorities understand all this and take precautions by moving tankers away from major ports. We are also talking about Bandar Abbas, which is located in the heart of the Strait of Hormuz. In addition, the Tehran Air Control Center (ATCC) sent out a warning about the closure of several overflight points from October 5 to 9 under the pretext of an ongoing exercise. Training is quite possible, for example, air defense units, if you look at the restricted areas - from Iraqi Kurdistan and the Persian Gulf, that is, areas from which Israeli missiles are highly likely to fly. High resolution mapEnglish version#Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: taking Tsukurino an...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: capturing Tsukurino and moving west Acute situation as of 16:00 October 6, 2024 Russian troops continue to attack enemy positions that have occupied populated areas of the Donetsk People's Republic. At the moment, two half-coverages are being formed in the area in the Selidovo and Kurakhovka areas. ▪️North of Novogrodovka, the Russian Armed Forces improved the situation on the ground, knocking out the enemy from positions in the Nikolaevka area. In Lysovka, attack aircraft gained a foothold at least in houses on the outskirts of the village, despite the active work of artillery and drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The actual zone of control of the RF Armed Forces may be much wider, but it will be possible to clarify it only when video materials are received. And at the Lysovka-Selidovo line, Russian fighters advanced to the west, occupying the waste heap of the Novogrodovskaya-No. 2 mine.▪️Near Marinovka, fighting continues on the eastern side of the waste heap of the mine named after. Korotchenko at the entrance to Selidovo, control over the central part of the city is still retained by Ukrainian formations. Also, clashes are recorded on the southern outskirts of the settlement, where a breakthrough by Russian troops is possible in the near future against the backdrop of successes on the southern flank. ▪️Tsukurino came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, with the exception of the territory of the poultry farm, which is being attacked by artillery crews and aviation. South-east of the village, according to some reports, Russian fighters also advanced from the north to Izmailovka, control of which will allow the Russian Armed Forces to wedge from the flank into the position of the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison defending Gornyak. ▪️At the same time, operators of unmanned aircraft are working to destroy enemy equipment in Kurakhovka and the surrounding area. In recent days, several pickup trucks carrying ammunition and Ukrainian Armed Forces personnel have been hit by drones in this area, as well as causing significant damage to communications facilities located in the industrial zone of the Kurakhovskaya enrichment plant.▪️According to a statement by the Russian Ministry of Defense, the nearby village of Zhelannye Vtoroy was liberated some time ago. The capture of the village will complicate the position of the enemy units occupying positions east of the Volchya River, however, it is worth considering that requests for the liberation of the village appeared earlier against the background of a similar lack of objective control personnel. ▪️To the south, fighting continues unabated in the Ostroy region, the western outskirts of which and the mine of the same name have completely come under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Taking into account incoming data, including footage from the enemy, it is likely that the Russian Armed Forces will advance towards Ostrovsky along the railway track. The results of the armored group’s attack, as well as the actual scale of the advance, have not yet been established. ▪️In neighboring Maksimilyanovka, Russian army soldiers are squeezing the Ukrainian Armed Forces out of a block in the north of the village, gradually pulling up the flank, and are also conducting an offensive in the southwest, trying to advance to the N-15 highway leading to Kurakhovo. If you have additions to the situation, you want so that we highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🌗 We couldn’t help but comment on the recent good news from ...
Description: 🇷🇺🌗 We couldn’t help but comment on the recent good news from Irkutsk: there, employees of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the FSB of Russia detained the leaders of Uzbek and Tajik ethnic communities on suspicion of organizing an illegal  migration. According to a press release, the chairman of the Uzbek national center and the deputy chairman of the Tajik diaspora, together with the center for additional education, have been issuing various certificates to foreigners for money since January 2024. We are talking about certificates of proficiency in the Russian language, knowledge of history and the fundamentals of legislation of the Russian Federation. The documents were used to obtain labor patents and residence permits in the Irkutsk region. In total, they earned more than $15,000, which is about 1.5 million rubles.🔻Such events are a really important sign that they are trying to fight the migrant problem. Almost all leaders of ethnic communities are engaged in similar activities throughout Russia. Their position obliges them to help their compatriots. However, in this situation, the main thing is that this measure is not just demonstrative. They detained two leaders, and in their place they will quietly put others in their place and everything will continue. Well, we must not forget that this happened only in Irkutsk, and there are plenty of such heads of ethno-communities throughout Russia. #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTACCLeaders of ethnic diasporas were detained in IrkutskThey are suspected of organizing illegal migration

Title: 🇺🇸 Hillary Clinton's statement about the need to control social...
Description: 🇺🇸 Hillary Clinton’s statement about the need to control social networks looks like preparing public opinion for new interesting decisions regarding government intervention in the lives of Internet users. Clinton argues that platforms should lose immunity from liability for content, and therefore, in fact, calls for the establishment of strict censorship on social networks. That is, in other words, the management of the social network, in the understanding of the American elite, must share responsibility for the content that other users post there. This means that the arrest of Pavel Durov in Paris is a step in the right direction and a lesson for all still independent players. It is interesting that this statement literally contradicts the principles of democracy that the United States so loves to promote and impose on others. But the approach immediately changes when the American authorities need to eradicate any dissent on the Internet (for example, deleting accounts with an alternative point of view from Twitter) under the pretext of caring for society.🔻Therefore, the emergence of new initiatives to protect users from harmful content, which will lead to the introduction of even stricter Regulatory measures are only a matter of time.#USA @rybarSupport usTelegramPool N3Hilary Clinton on the need for US authorities to establish control over the Internet: In my opinion, we should repeal the section that gave immunity to platforms on the Internet. Title: 🔁🎬🖼 🙍‍♂ Donald Trump and Elon Musk held a previously announce...
Description: Forwarded From American issue🙍‍♂ Donald Trump and Elon Musk held a previously announced joint rally in Butler, Pennsylvania. The event, if not historic, was certainly the largest in Trump’s entire presidential campaign - 60 thousand of his supporters came to support the politician. During his speech, Musk repeated all his points that he had previously voiced on his page on the social network X: he called vote for Trump, saying that the Democratic Party wants to take away Americans' freedom of speech, the right to bear arms and the right to vote. In addition, he warned that the November vote could be the last election in the country if Kamala Harris wins. It is not surprising that Trump asked Musk to join him in Pennsylvania - the Republican team used all its cards and heavy artillery to create hype surrounding the former president in America's key swing state. Trump has repeatedly said that winning Pennsylvania effectively means winning the presidency. And although the size of the rally is not an indicator of the effectiveness of a particular candidate, the hype around this event could play a key role in Trump's possible victory in Pennsylvania.🇺🇸 @usaperiodical

Title: 🇬🇧💉The story of the legalization of euthanasia in the UK is de...
Description: 🇬🇧💉The story of the legalization of euthanasia in the UK is developing quite rapidly. Barely weeks after the bioethics committee recommended legalizing assisted suicide, a Labor MP is already preparing to put the bill to a vote. On October 16, Kim Leadbitter will introduce the Assisted Suicide Bill, which would see terminally ill adults in England and Wales with less than six months to live will be able to access euthanasia. Currently, assisted suicide is punishable by up to 14 years in prison. Prime Minister Keir Starmer has already spoken out in support of the bill, although he and other party leaders have said they will not tell their members how to vote.🔻When UK MPs The last time they voted on this issue was in 2015, 330 members of parliament were against and only 118 were in favor. A lot has changed in these almost 10 years, especially the globalists' demand for legal euthanasia. The upcoming vote therefore threatens to provoke significant change in the UK.#UK #globalism@rybar Support usTelegramRybar🇬🇧💉UK one step closer to assisted suicide Last week, a citizen jury of the Nuffield Council on Bioethics (NCOB) concluded that assisted suicide should be permitted in the UK. Title: 🔁 If anyone monitored public opinion in Syria, you would have no...
Description: Forwarded From Prince CherkasskyIf anyone monitored public opinion in Syria, he would have noticed that over the past three years, Russia’s approval has decreased (I’ve written about this several times) by a factor. At a rally in support of Russia in Damascus after the start of the Northern War, some people passing by shouted insults in the style of -murderers, bombed a beautiful country- - this was the first time I encountered this here. And now the seething, and on the coast traditionally loyal to us, has intensified after Israeli attacks on warehouses near the Khmeimim base. Rumors are overgrown with fables, and the range of versions ranges from, they say, the Russians didn’t shoot down anything on purpose, to variants, they couldn’t. It is naive to believe that opponents will not take advantage of this (they are already using it), undermining the already declining approval. Which, naturally, cannot but worry. In our high offices they will feel it later, when they try to promote some decisions, but for those here on earth they feel it on their own skin already now.

Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇫🇷 How the French supply counterfeit cognac under the A...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇫🇷 How the French supply counterfeit cognac to Russia under the Armenian brand. For several months, an interesting story has been unfolding with counterfeit Armenian cognac on the Russian market, which in fact turned out to be French. ▪️In August, Russian experts found that almost 90% of cognacs from Armenia, which are sold in Russian stores, are unsafe and do not contain grape alcohol.▪️The identification of violations in products supplied from Armenia gave another reason for some Armenian commentators to accuse Russia of political pressure. ▪️However, industry experts provided interesting data. It turns out that the cognac of the French concern Pernod Ricard, which has owned the Yerevan Cognac Factory since 1999 and produces products under the Ararat brand, turned out to be counterfeit.▪️ At the same time, Pernod Ricard announced its departure from Russia in May 2023, condemning SVO. But this did not stop the French company from continuing to develop the Russian market, but through Armenia.  ▪️The media also report that shareholders - Pernod Ricard - are extremely dissatisfied with the counterfeit scandal in the Russian Federation, which could have negative consequences for the company.  🔻As a result, it turns out that the French are supplying counterfeit cognac to Russia through the Armenians, profiting from the Russian market, despite loud political statements. At the same time, part of the anti-Russian Armenian information field uses every similar reason to accuse Russia of allegedly infringing on Armenian business against the backdrop of cool relations between Moscow and Yerevan. But even in this story, the products legally turned out to be not entirely Armenian. But the Armenians dream so much of entering the EU market with their infamous cognac, being fooled by the promises of kind European Commissioners. But something went wrong again. #Armenia #Russia #France @rybarSupport us EADaily-Leaving—go away: -Pernod Ricard was not able to hide the top of ARARAT in RussiaThe other day, EADaily wrote that according to the results of a joint study of the Russian association Anti-Counterfeiting and Russian Union of Producers of Cognac, Spirits and Alcoholic Beverages - almost 90% of Armenian cognacs, which are sold in Russian stores...

Title: 🔁 Start above ✨ Thus, the Russian Armed Forces maintain the init...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsStart above✨ Thus, the Russian Armed Forces maintain the initiative at the front, solving problems of depriving the enemy of logistics in the near rear, and striking deep into enemy territory. The Ukrainian Armed Forces, with the support of the West, are fighting skillfully and trying to hold back the onslaught of our troops; they are forced to maintain a group in the Kursk region and replenish it with manpower and equipment, ensuring control over the Sudzha gas measuring station, which supplies blue fuel to Hungary and Austria, as experts write. The difference in the potentials of the armies of Russia and Ukraine forces the latter in the short term to lower the mobilization age to 21 years (according to some sources, the West wanted immediately - to 18) and replenish the Armed Forces of Ukraine with manpower using well-known forceful methods. However, this approach and NATO assistance allow the enemy to continue to provide organized resistance. The summary was compiled by: Two majors

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for October 6, 2024 ▪️ Last week in the Ukrai...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Review #Summary for October 6, 2024▪️ Last week, narratives about the need to mobilize youth from 21 to 25 years old into the Armed Forces of Ukraine were increasingly being thrown into the Ukrainian information field (currently the lower age limit for the mobilization of Ukrainian citizens is exactly 25 years ). Apparently, the shortage of personnel and losses are making themselves felt, in addition, there are too many signals from the West about the need to lower this bar as a prerequisite for further obtaining NATO weapons and equipment. For Russia, this means placing several hundred thousand new soldiers in the enemy’s formation who will have to be destroyed. For Ukraine - further depopulation and predicted declines in the birth rate. ▪️ At the front, the Russian Army continues offensive operations in a number of directions. The main event was the liberation of Ugledar, the fighting for which lasted for about two years, including many tragic unsuccessful assaults. The zone of control of our troops is expanding around the liberated city, and the Russian Armed Forces are rushing towards Epiphany from several directions. As enemy sources critical of the Kiev military leadership reported, the enemy defense lines beyond this settlement are no longer so extensively equipped.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are developing success in Tsukurino, pushing the Armed Forces of Ukraine to the western outskirts of the settlement. In the semicircle of Selidovo, fighting on the outskirts of Gornyak. To the south, our troops storm Ostrovskoye and close the pocket from Krasnogorovka to Zhelannye Vtoroy. ▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), our people are advancing in the city with heavy fighting. In the Seversky direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of Verkhnekamensky. In the Krasnolimansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone of control near Makeevka and Nevsky. To the north, in the Kupyansky direction, Vishnevoye was liberated, which formed a new ledge of the front. From Berestovoy and Peschany our troops advanced to Kruglyakovka, occupying which will provide access to the river. Oskol south of Kupyansk. ▪️ Kharkov direction is practically unchanged. The formed wedging did not allow the formation of the so-called. -buffer zone- to protect the civilian population of the Belgorod region, which is daily subjected to terrorist attacks and shelling. ▪️ In the Kursk region there have been no large-scale changes in the front line over the past week; heavy battles were reported near Plekhovo, where our troops are advancing south of the settlement. In the Glushkovsky district, the enemy’s attacks continued to be repelled near Vesely, but in the neighboring direction, successes of the Russian Armed Forces were reported near the border Medvezhiy. ▪️ Offensive actions of the Russian Army in a number of directions naturally require more resources, the same drones. An increase in the number of regular and non-standard UAV units leads to a shortage of them due to the discrepancy between the number of UAVs supplied and the combat missions being solved, which logically requires an increase in the rate of delivery of drones to preserve the lives of attack aircraft. ▪️ In the rear and at the front, the cleansing of law enforcement agencies from proliferating corrupt officials continues. Thus, the former head of the branch of the Construction Department of the Central Military District of the Military Construction Company, Sergei Sukhov, was arrested on charges of embezzling 35 million during the renovation of a military hospital in Perm. In the front-line units, work has also been intensified against unscrupulous officials. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above✨ Thus, the Russian Armed Forces maintain the initiative at the front, solving problems of depriving the enemy of logistics in the near rear, striking deep into enemy territory. The Ukrainian Armed Forces, with the support of the West, are fighting skillfully and trying to hold back the onslaught of our troops...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: shootings in border areas....
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: skirmishes in border areas situation leading up to October 5, 2024 The ground phase of Operation Arrows of the North continues on the Lebanese-Israeli border. Over the course of the day, the current configuration of the front has not changed significantly: the parties continue to exchange blows and local battles. The most violent clashes took place in the area of ​​​​Marun ar-Ras, Yarun and Kafr Qila, where Israeli troops carried out raids on Hezbollah infrastructure facilities and with the help of transport they blow up houses using remote control.▪️The press service of the Israel Defense Forces, meanwhile, reported that soldiers of the Golani infantry brigade discovered caches of weapons and underground tunnels in one of the settlements. According to the Israeli command, the caches were located in civilian buildings.▪️Fighters of the Lebanese group responded with rocket attacks on Israeli positions: more than 100 ammunition were fired in the morning, some of them fell within populated areas, leading to fires and material damage.🔻Do not stop and massive Israeli attacks on Lebanon: according to the country’s Ministry of Health, over the past 24 hours the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 46 people killed and 85 wounded. The total figure is 2036 dead and 9653 injured.▪️In addition to the already routine strikes on the capital of the republic, Beirut, a drone hit the Beddawi Palestinian refugee camp in Tripoli, the second largest city in Lebanon, located in the north of the country. Hamas media resources confirmed the death of the field commander. He turned out to be Said Atalla Ali, one of the high-ranking leaders of the movement and the commander of the Lebanese branch of the group - Kataib Izz ad-Din al-Qassam -. Meanwhile, Arabic-language media, citing the country's intelligence services, reported that Hezbollah had lost contact with Hashem Safi ad- Dean is the likely successor to Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah. According to some reports, he could have been killed during one of the raids on Beirut. However, the official resources of the Lebanese group have not yet commented on this information. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🪖 Border defense line Poland announced the start of construct...
Description: Forwarded From ARCHANGEL SPECIAL FORCES Z🇷🇺🪖 Border defense line Poland announced the start of construction of a fortification system on the border with the Kaliningrad region and Belarus. The armed forces of the Baltic republics, Great Britain and the USA are involved in the project of the decade. The cost of the project is around 2.5 billion dollars. They intend to complete the construction of fortifications by 2028.  Also in connection with this the Drones Protective Wall project has surfaced again, which was initially supposed to be implemented on the eastern borders of Latvia and Estonia, but now, apparently, Poland will also join it . The project, to put it mildly, is provocative and can be used as an instrument of aggression against Russia.  Today Warsaw devotes 4.7% of GDP to preparing for a war with Russia, which they call among themselves -defense-. All three neighboring Baltic tigers are doing the same glorious thing. We have been hearing about US plans to drag them into a war against Russia for several years now, and fortifications have already appeared on the borders of the Leningrad and Pskov regions.  At the same time, the accumulation of troops continues on the border. It is planned to create at least 49 more brigades of 5,000 people each and increase the number of air defense units by 5 times. Archangel Special Forces. Subscribe.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Vesely area and attac...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Vesely area and attacks on the rear infrastructure of the Armed Forces of Ukraine the situation is coming to an end October 5, 2024 In the Kursk direction, Ukrainian formations are not abandoning attempts to expand the zone of control on several lines at once. At the same time, Russian troops are systematically working to search for and destroy enemy equipment and positions in both the Kursk and Sumy regions. 🔻In the Glushkovsky district, clashes were noted in the Vesely area. Judging by the footage that appeared on the Internet, the enemy managed to advance into the forest belts to the southeast of the village and pull up UAV units. One of them was covered by Russian artillery fire. It is likely that in the near future the Ukrainian Armed Forces will also launch attacks along the railway in order to secure the right flank of their group, which is gradually enveloping Veseloye. ▪️At the same time, Russian air raids continue. Thus, the crews of the Russian Aerospace Forces destroyed another M777 howitzer, which was firing from a position in a forest in the Dibrova area, and also carried out a series of attacks on concentrations of Ukrainian Armed Forces personnel in Volfino, Bondarevshchina and Katerynivka. 🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces repelled enemy attacks in the Lyubimovka area and on the eastern approaches to Obukhovka. To the west of Kremyany, Russian UAV operators hit an armored vehicle of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and after it overturned as a result of loss of control, they finished off the surviving crew members. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, Ukrainian formations attempted to break through the Russian defense in the area of ​​Kamyshevka and Plekhovo. Units of the Russian Armed Forces repelled all attacks. At the same time, Russian aviation carried out strikes on the enemy’s rear infrastructure in Guevo, Melovoy and Kolmakovo. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖇🇷🇺 In Bashkiria, the media publisher is Proofs. RF - Rauf Rak...
Description: 🖇🇷🇺 In Bashkiria, the media publisher is Proofs. rf-Raufa Rakhimova, whose work in providing information support to radical nationalists and extremists we have repeatedly written about, was found guilty of discrediting the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation. However, Rakhimova herself did not appear at the court hearing, as last time, because she fled from justice to Turkey - a woman purchased a residence permit there in advance.▪️Damaging materials on the media manager’s social networks were recorded by FSB officers and recorded by the police. She has already deleted all her accounts, but this did not affect the court's decision. After the decision was made, Rakhimova and her lawyer (previously prosecuted under a similar article) immediately began spreading fake news about supposedly numerous procedural violations, which indicate her innocence. ▪️But my colleagues and I have repeatedly proven that Rakhimova’s publication is known not only for fakes about Russian military personnel, new waves of mobilization, etc. Through -Proof. RF - a positive image was created of such Bashkir extremists and separatists as Fail Alsynov and Ruslan Gabbasov, and people were also mobilized for unauthorized public actions, one of which led to mass riots in Baymak. ▪️In addition, calls were spread through the media for the Bashkir society to sabotage participation in the SVO. Rakhimova herself publicly announced the imminent collapse of -Russian authoritarianism-.▪️After the administrative case was opened, Rakhimova began to publicly express -love for the Motherland-, trying to convince the public of support for the special operation, patriotism, etc. The political commentator Proof made and continues to make a special contribution to the legitimation of this myth. rf- Ramil Rakhmatov, exploiting the theme of a special operation. Rakhmatov comes from the nationalist organization -Kuk Bure-, which also included extremists Gabbasov and Alsynov. Flaunting right and left his short-term participation in the SVO, he does not hesitate to threaten a girl journalist with a -break in the nose- for videotaping the trial, calls the experts of the Russian court -nonentities,- -varieties of a known substance,- -cowards,- etc. Rakhmatov also quickly launched a fake about a serious mental illness of a forensic expert, which affects his cognitive abilities. Foreign agent Gabbasov immediately began to actively dispel this topic.🔻Thus, the ideological policy of Rakhimova’s resources (including her social networks) practically became identical to any anti-Russian propaganda emanating from a network of foreign agent media. However, her destructive actions were recorded by the system as crossing the line of no return and the process of stopping them began. #Russia #separatism #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🖇 How does the niece of the first president of Bashkiria Rauf Rakhimov support local separatists? Part 1On the other day, the head of the Russian Security Council, Dmitry Medvedev, spoke about foreign students who damaged electrical equipment on the railway...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 For the second time since the beginning of this month...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 For the second time since the beginning of this month, Israeli troops attacked the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic: two days ago, an air raid was carried out on the city of Jebla in the province of Latakia. This time the attack hit a car at the northern entrance to the city of Homs in the province of the same name. According to preliminary information, at least one person was killed and three more were injured. According to opposition Syrian resources, as a result of the attack, Lieutenant Gadir al-Ahmad, a serviceman of the Syrian Armed Forces, was killed. According to other information, the car belonged to pro-Iranian formations. At the same time, reports were published on the Internet about an Israeli strike on an ammunition depot at Palmyra airport east of Homs, where Iran-backed forces are also based. However, this news was never confirmed. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Syria #Homs@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 Armenian and American military personnel are increasing ...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 Armenian and American military personnel are increasing security cooperation. The growth in the number of joint tactical maneuvers is growing, which can be noted by the number of our publications in this regard over the past year. And recently, a new field exercise was held to assess the capabilities and mechanisms of Armenia’s response to the spread of chemical, biological, radiological and nuclear threats, in which there were 10 government bodies are involved.📌 Let’s even leave aside the fact that the main source of such threats, in the conditional liquidation of the consequences of which Armenian military personnel participated, is precisely the American leadership. The important thing is that Armenia still has not left the CSTO, and this imposes obligations. At the same time, earlier Nikol Pashinyan called the CSTO the main source of threat to the national security of Armenia, so training to eliminate chemical, biological, radiological and nuclear threats plays with new colors. The fact is that this does not bode well for either Russia or the region as a whole. And the situation is such that the CSTO is again inactive, although using the example of the countries of Central Asia it was already clear that herbivorous policies in our time are not only ineffective, but even destructive.#Armenia #USA@rybar Support usARMENPRESS Armenian News Agency Field exercises were held jointly in Armenia with the US Department of Defense Threat Reduction Agency. As part of the fight against weapons of mass destruction (WMD), field exercises were held in Armenia with the participation of the competent bodies of the public administration system of the Republic of Armenia....

Title: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 The Georgian TV channel Imedi reported a warning from th...
Description: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 The Georgian Imedi TV channel reported a warning from the American Embassy in Tbilisi to its citizens and a call to avoid crowded places on October 26, election day. The letter to the Americans notes that spontaneous demonstrations are possible on this day, since - in the past, unplanned, spontaneous protests with the use of violence occurred in Georgia -.📌 The closer the day of parliamentary elections gets, the more actively the West is preparing for its direct participation in this process. We have written more than once that provocations are being planned for October 26 in full swing. After the sharp transition of the Georgian authorities towards a balanced policy, the opposition and pro-Western structures sounded the alarm, starting to organize spontaneous protests and using political blackmail. But in the end this led to nothing. The ruling party’s competent prioritization has shown its effectiveness, and Georgian citizens have begun to live a new life, including thanks to increased trade with Russia. Parliamentary elections are almost the last chance for the opposition, which has lost its strength, pro-Western NGOs and, of course, Ukrainian citizens in in the country. Поэтому беспорядки и провокации с их стороны — это скорее прогнозируемый факт, чем гипотетическая возможность.#Грузия #США@rybarПоддержать насImedi Newsაშშ-ის საელჩოს სკანდალური იმეილი საკუთარ მოქალაქეებს: -მოგიწოდებთ, გამოიჩინოთ სიფრთხილე საქართველოში 26 ოქტომბრის არჩევნებთან დაკავშირებით…აშშ-ის საელჩო საქართველოში მათი ქვეყნის მოქალაქეებს სკანდალური შინაარსის იმ ეილებს უგზავნის და მოუწოდებს, გამოიჩინონ 26 არჩევნებთან დაკავშირებით ხალხის დიდი მასების შესაძლო შეკრებას ან პროტესტს საქართველოში.

Title: 🔁🎬 One of the coordinators of the Russian Community, Andrei Afa...
Description: Forwarded From Russian Community ZOVOne of the coordinators of the Russian Community, Andrei Afanasyev, returned from the SVO zone and wrote down a response to the Chechen ombudsman Mansur Soltaev, who had previously called on law enforcement agencies to conduct an audit of our activities. In short: we are ready for inspections, we work with the authorities openly and with pride, interethnic enmity on the contrary, we extinguish, not inflame. An important fact: the main attacks on the Russian Community began after the publication of material by the British edition of the BBC. Western intelligence services have allocated serious money to discredit the Community. Our dear fellow citizens, neighbors and friends of other nationalities! Remember that the Russian Community stands for the interests of the State-forming Russian people and this does not contradict the interests of the indigenous peoples of Russia! We are all united in the face of the migration threat, which is already openly discussed at the very top! We are together against population replacement! Video is too big

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 At night, an IDF drone for the first time since t...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 At night, an Israeli Defense Forces drone struck Tripoli, the second largest city in Lebanon, located in the north of the country, for the first time since the beginning of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. It hit a residential building in the Beddawi Palestinian refugee camp in the city's district of the same name. . And although the IDF press service did not report the attack, Hamas media resources confirmed the death of its field commander. The deceased was Said Atallah Ali, one of the high-ranking leaders of the movement and commander of the Lebanese branch of the group - Kataib Izz ad-Din al-Qassam -. His wife and two children were killed along with him.#Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The incident with the fall of an unidentified object ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The incident with the fall of an unidentified object over Konstantinovka in the occupied part of the DPR is being vigorously discussed on the Internet. Initially, Ukrainian media reported the downing of a Russian Su-34 fighter, and then a Su-25 attack aircraft. In both cases, it was claimed that the plane was carrying adjustable aerial bombs. But when examining the footage of the wreckage, as well as the video of the fall, it can be stated that the fallen object was the Russian heavy attack drone S-70 - Okhotnik -.🔻The informant suggests that the cause of the fall was most likely , was a targeted strike on a drone by our air defense units, which, due to a technical malfunction, flew into enemy territory. The appearance of the -Hunter- in the Northern Defense zone is a unique event, since the UAV was in development for many years, and its real condition was a matter of more than one discussion, in features after the start of a special operation. Unfortunately, during testing, emergency situations arise. The main thing here is that we see that a promising idea is not abandoned on the spot and that errors are promptly responded to. It would be much worse if the enemy got it all intact. #Konstantinovka #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us

Title: 🇰🇬🇹🇯 About the delimitation of the Kyrgyz-Tajik border On Tue...
Description: 🇰🇬🇹🇯 On the delimitation of the Kyrgyz-Tajik border On Tuesday, in the Tajik Buston, a meeting was held between the co-chairs of the government delegations of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan on the delimitation and demarcation of the Tajik-Kyrgyz state border, Saimumin Yatimov and Kamchybek Tashiev. Following the meeting, the parties gave new instructions to the working groups to continue work on further determination of the border in the remaining sections. Formally and according to media impressions, the meeting of the heads of the State Committee for National Security of both countries shows that significant progress has been achieved, which the parties would like to record in order to avoid a new escalation. Moreover, the public demand on both sides for a solution to the problem is such that it is beneficial for Tashiyev and President Rakhmon to stretch out the PR from the process one teaspoon at a time. It is no coincidence that over the past 1.5 years, reports on the negotiations have remained almost unchanged: agreed kilometers are reported, but the figure - agreed upon 90 percent of the border - remains the same.📌 Let us recall that in September 2022, uncertainty in border issues became one of the reasons for bloody clashes on the border two countries (we wrote about this earlier), which occurred on the eve of the SCO summit in Samarkand. As a result of the fighting, hundreds of people were killed and wounded on both sides. The escalation of the long-term conflict became one of the links in a chain of clashes, the ultimate goal of which was to create problems for Russia. As the latest news shows (and what we hope for), these events will remain far in the past. #Kyrgyzstan #Tajikistan #CentralAsia@rybar Support uskhovar.tj A regular meeting of the co-chairs of the government delegations of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan on delimitation and demarcation took place…

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇸 Our account on X (formerly Twitter) was blocked. Over...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸 Our account on X (former Twitter) was blocked. In general, we initially didn’t really believe that something would change much under Musk, and the work of independent Russian resources in Western social networks has always been fraught with restrictions. But it’s still interesting to see how the public image of the head of Twitter speaking in support of freedom of speech, against the American DeepState and the Democratic Party is dissonant with reality. Or maybe Elon Musk just read our article to himself and harbored a grudge. Who knows. In any case, this will not prevent Rybar from remaining the most cited Russian analytical resource in the West. And you can once again support our work in many different ways, for which thank you very much! Yours @rybar

Title: 🖼 🇲🇳🇺🇸 How English is being introduced into Mongolian educat...
Description: 🇲🇳🇺🇸 How English is being introduced into Mongolian education At the end of August, it became known that from this academic year in Mongolian schools, English will become the main foreign language, which will replace Russian. While lessons will be conducted in test mode in 100 schools from the third grade, teachers will be required to study abroad to obtain a master's degree. And in the future they plan to expand the system. In principle, nothing surprising: the Mongolian authorities have long been working on introducing English in educational institutions and this initiative is willingly supported by Western governments. Only this year, former British Foreign Minister David Cameron and US Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited Mongolia. Cameron promised to allocate £10 million from the UK budget over three years to further expand the English language initiative, and Blinken announced his intention to create an English language center in Mongolia. 🔻Read more about how the process of introducing English into the Mongolian education system is going and how Western governments and the country's authorities contribute to this - read on our website.#Great Britain #Mongolia #article #USA @rybar together with @pezdicideSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The territory of the Donetsk agglomeration is subject...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 The territory of the Donetsk agglomeration is subject to daily attacks from Ukrainian forces - both critical infrastructure facilities and civilians come under fire. In total, over the past night, as a result of the actions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, at least 11 people were injured, and two civilian infrastructure facilities received various damages. An enemy drone attacked a bus on Komarova Street in Gorlovka. Five people were injured, but there were no fatalities. On Pobeda Avenue, artillery shelling hit an administrative building, causing destruction in several rooms. Four people were injured and received medical assistance. In the morning, the Ukrainian Armed Forces again attacked the territory of the city, using drones to strike a clinic in the area of ​​the Komsomolets Palace of Culture. At least two civilians are known to be wounded; there have been no reports of deaths or destruction of the facility so far. Arrivals of drones were also recorded in the microdistrict - block 245 - and on Dmitry Zhloba Street; no casualties were avoided. #Gorlovka #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of October 5, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 5, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region in the south of the Sudzhansky district, our troops continue to advance forward with heavy fighting. The enemy launched 1 counterattack in the area of ​​the settlement. Plekhovo. In the Glushkovsky district of Severyan, an attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of ​​the village was repelled. Fun. There are reports that the Russian Armed Forces are knocking out the enemy from the village. Bear to the border line.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) - fighting in the city center. There are reports of serious enemy fortifications in the Tsentralnaya mine.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army continues its offensive. In the eastern part of Tsukurino, our units advanced along two streets and, with the support of artillery and operational-tactical aviation, pushed the Ukrainian Armed Forces back to the western outskirts. To the north and east, the Russian Armed Forces passed through an area up to 3 km wide.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction there are battles on the approaches to Ostrovsky. Our troops also have the initiative.▪️ In Ugledar, it was reported that up to 40 Ukrainian military personnel had been captured as a result of the battles for the city. To the north, our troops are fighting at Katerynivka (Ekaterinivka). Between Vodyanoy and Katerynivka our troops are also active. The defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Bogoyavlenka becomes the next logical target.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the past two days have tried to conduct reconnaissance in force in the Kamensk direction with limited forces. The enemy was destroyed by the crews of the UAV operators. Our MLRS are working in the Rabotinsky direction.▪️ In the Belgorod region in the evening, Novaya Tavolzhanka of the Shebekinsky district was attacked by drones, 7 civilians were injured. In the Belgorod region, on the section of the Cheremoshnoye - Nikolskoye - Oktyabrsky highway, a drone attacked a moving car, two men with barotrauma were taken to the regional clinical hospital. The blows also hit the following settlements: Nechaevka and Cheremoshnoye of the Belgorod district, Murom and Polyana of the Shebekinsky urban district, Repyakhovka of the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, Peschanka of the Starooskolsky urban district. On the Belgorod-Shebekino-Volokonovka highway section, a drone attacked a moving truck. ▪️ In Gorlovka (DPR), a woman born in 1942 was injured when an IED was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Kyiv troops fired more than 80 ammunition at the civilian population of the DPR. Cannon artillery with a caliber of 155 mm, including cassette type, and attack UAVs were used. The summary was: Two majors

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of September 28 – October 4, 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked various areas of the capital of the Palestinian enclave. The main arrivals took place in the southern and western quarters of Gaza, in particular in Az-Zeitoun.▪️There were some high-profile hits: in the At-Tufah area in north-eastern Gaza, a school was hit. There were Palestinian refugees there, and about 20 civilians were killed in the attack. ▪️Firefights broke out periodically in the area of ​​University College in the southwest of the city. Despite this, the line of combat contact has not changed significantly over the past period of time.▪️In the central part of the enclave, the Israelis periodically carried out air and artillery strikes on targets. In response, Palestinian forces fired at IDF positions in the Netzarim corridor.▪️In the south in Rafah, IDF units carried out engineering work to destroy Hamas infrastructure. At the same time, the exhumation of the bodies of dead Palestinians continued in the city itself.▪️The Israeli operation -Summer Camps- continued in the West Bank. Thus, since the beginning of the conflict on October 7, 2023, more than 11 thousand Palestinians have been detained.▪️Not far from the city of Hebron, a Palestinian with a knife tried to attack Israeli checkpoint officers. However, IDF soldiers identified the militant in time and eliminated him.▪️There were terrorist attacks in Israel, where two armed militants attacked tram passengers in Tel Aviv. As a result of the incident, seven people were killed and 16 people were injured of varying degrees of severity.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on October 4, 2024. Russian troops attacked the infrastructure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using the Geran-2 UAV in the territory of the Kyiv, Zhytomyr and Kirovograd regions. Enemy air defense work was also recorded in the Sumy and Cherkasy regions. Ukrainian formations again carried out a drone raid on the territory of several regions of Russia. Air defense systems intercepted targets over the waters of the Rostov and Oryol regions, as well as the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Voronezh region, a UAV hit caused a minor fire at an oil industry facility. In the Kursk direction there are battles in the Glushkovsky, Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, Russian units are successfully repelling attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces launched a successful strike against the concentration of enemy personnel and equipment in the Sumy region. In the Donetsk direction, Russian troops liberated most of Tsukurino and pushed the Ukrainian Armed Forces back to the western outskirts of the village. There is also unconfirmed information about the beginning of battles for Izmailovka. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces have completed clearing Ugledar and are preparing to launch an offensive on Bogoyavlenka. Data has also appeared indicating the start of fighting on the south-eastern outskirts of Katerynivka and a significant advance of Russian troops in this area. A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Zone operations (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Northern direction (ru; en)Yuzhnozhonetsk direction (ru; en)#Voronezh #Donetsk #digest #report #map #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Glushkovsky region an...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting in the Glushkovsky district and the next use of the Pacer - the situation towards the end of October 4 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas. In the Glushkovsky region, according to available information, Russian troops have restored part of the positions in the Medvezhye area. Most of the settlement is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. According to the most optimistic statements, Russian troops managed to reach the state border line, throwing the enemy in this area into the Sumy region.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the fact of the successful use of the UAV -Inokhodets- was noted. This was the fifth public use of this drone on this section of the front in a month. The Ukrainian Armed Forces' air defense system in Olgovka was hit by guided weapons from a drone. The enemy is not abandoning attempts to gain a foothold in the village and attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces to the north. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, Russian aviation strikes at identified places of accumulation of Armed Forces personnel in Russky Porechny, Bogdanovka and Kolmakov. At the Borki-Plekhovo line, heavy clashes continue on the approaches to the latter.▪️In the Sumy region, Russian troops hit a concentration of enemy personnel and vehicles in a forest belt in the Bondarevshchina region with a missile strike. After arriving at the site of the impact, a secondary detonation of ammunition was also observed. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kursk # map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us
