Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for October 4, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities, in the south they hit Khan Yunis and its environs. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out another series of raids, during which IDF air force aircraft struck the city of Tulkarm, eliminating a Hamas field commander and several other people. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, IDF units conduct local raids on Hezbollah targets and carry out massive strikes on Lebanon. Over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 37 dead and 151 wounded. The US and British air forces carried out one of the largest attacks on the Houthi-controlled part of Yemen in recent times. And during a UAV raid by pro-Iranian forces on the occupied Golan Heights, two Israeli soldiers were killed.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)The situation in Lebanon- Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: local raids and bombing of...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: local raids and bombing of buildings situation towards outcome October 4, 2024 A tense situation remains on the Lebanese-Israeli border due to the Israeli Defense Forces conducting a ground operation. In the border area, the Israelis are bringing in reinforcements, while continuing to evacuate the local population.🔻Despite the fact that the forces of the 98th division -Ha-Esh- and the 36th division -Gaash- entered the territory of Lebanon and clashes with -Hezbollah-, it is not yet possible to establish the exact configuration of the front. However, there is progress, albeit at a relatively slow pace. The reason for this is not only the resistance of local units of the Lebanese group, including the special unit Radwan, but also the peculiarities of the geographical landscape: the southern part of Lebanon is a hilly area. The territory of the same Gaza Strip is flat.▪️Despite this, in Lebanon, Israeli troops are using tactics similar to those carried out in the Palestinian enclave: the use of remote-controlled vehicles and the bombing of buildings potentially used as military installations.▪️At the same time The Israelis destroy caches, secret warehouses and underground tunnels. The version about a certain underestimation by the Israeli command of the combat capabilities of its enemy is confirmed: the scale of the Shiite group’s infrastructure turned out to be much larger. Massive Israeli air and artillery strikes throughout Lebanon also did not stop. According to the Ministry of Health of the Arab Republic, over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 37 dead and 151 wounded.▪️Once again, attacks were carried out on the Lebanese capital city of Beirut, in particular on the Ad-Dahiya district - they became one of the most intense in recent years. last days. According to the Israeli portal Ynet, during a night attack, the IDF Air Force dropped 73 tons of explosives on Hezbollah’s intelligence headquarters.❗ According to some reports, one of the possible successors of the organization’s ex-Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah, Hashem Safi ad-Din, could be there. However, there is no official confirmation of this information from either side yet. However, this option also cannot be ruled out, especially taking into account the circumstances of the murder of the previous leader. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿🇮🇳 About the Kazakh-Indian exercises A combined company of ...
Description: 🇰🇿🇮🇳 About the Kazakh-Indian exercises A combined company of military personnel from the regional command - South - Ground Forces and the Air Assault Forces of Kazakhstan arrived in India to participate in the annual joint exercise. During the exercise, military personnel of the two contingents will work together in the framework of mountain training and practical classes on anti-terrorism security. The joint tactical exercise - KazInd-2024 - is being conducted as part of the implementation of a bilateral cooperation plan between the Ministries of Defense of Kazakhstan and India. If for Kazakhstan this is an additional opportunity to test the combat readiness of its elite units and increase the prestige of its armed forces, then for India the exercises are part of a more general anti-Chinese strategy New Delhi is making efforts to implement steps that would prove the effectiveness of the Indian authorities on the external contours of countering Beijing, reflecting, on the contrary, the Chinese strategy to ensure a presence in the Indian Ocean. 🔻Demonstrating military cooperation with Central Asian countries in China's underbelly is an inexpensive and effective way to do this.#Kazakhstan #India #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegraphindiaChinese Navy ramps up presence in Indian Ocean and Bay of Bengal as regional tensions escalateIncreased activity of Chinese research vessels and warships – specially when India is conducting military or space-related tests – stokes security and diplomatic concerns

Title: 🔁🖼 Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names of 2024 from the Children of Arbat. Colonel General Mordvichev, 2 years after the capture of Mariupol, he again declared himself as a commander capable of taking cities, and finally secured the title of assault master. The offensive on Avdievka, which began on October 10, is rightfully considered the largest offensive operation of the Russian Army in 2023, which predetermined the entire vector of development of efforts in 2024. Mordvichev himself also grew as a commander: at first, Andrei Nikolaevich resorted to the classic version of deep coverage, but when faced with difficult terrain in the area of ​​the settlement. Experienced, the commander relied on an offensive from the north, where Russian troops quickly reached the borders of Novobakhmutovka and took the city into semi-encirclement. Realizing that striking in converging directions in the Lastochkino area was fraught with high risks, the commander began to cut off the flanks of the city. Taking into account the experience of the operation to capture Mariupol and split it into several parts, he sets the task of breaking into the city from the north and actually cutting it into two parts. The destroyed coke plant became the last refuge of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Avdiivka, after which a large-scale offensive began along the entire line of contact. The forces of the Brave group made an operational breakthrough to Pokrovsk, covering almost 65 km: since February 2024, the offensive in the Donbass has not stopped for a single day, the enemy has not received a break or the opportunity to rotate, which largely allows us to say that after beyond Avdeevka, Pokrovsk will also be surrendered to the enemy. Having won the strategic initiative at the front, Mordvichev earned authority not only in the eyes of his subordinates, but also in the eyes of his superiors, having received a high assessment of the organization of the work of the group headquarters during the recent inspection of Andrei Belousov. Lieutenant General Lyamin He is the youngest in galaxy of senior command personnel. Having celebrated his 45th birthday in May of this year, Lyamin proved that he could not only be a good staff worker, but also in many ways an independent figure, capable of making decisions without regard to senior benefactors. Having arrived in the group at the height of the autumn offensive, he immediately became involved in work: unlike many other military leaders, he used his credit of trust in the General Staff to benefit the front: in the fall of 2024, the group significantly increased efforts to use aviation, all requests were carried out flawlessly and the whole world witnessed the massive use of FABs with new adjustable modules in Avdeevka. For the first time, the BTR-90 and BMD-3, which had not previously been used due to the complexity of servicing, were involved in combat operations; the work of carrying out routine and major repairs of equipment was impeccably carried out. As we have previously noted, having started his career in the Northern Military District as a corps corps commander, Lyamin rose to the position of NSh of the district, while since 2022 his career has been closely monitored by NSh Valery Gerasimov. Denis Lyamin’s behavior surprised many: he has changed both as a person and as a military leader. Many believed that he was appointed in order to balance Mordvichev and prevent him from becoming arrogant, but the generals quickly found a common language, harmoniously complementing each other. This is largely why today the Brave group remains one of the most effective, continuing to liberate populated areas one after another.High resolution art@arbat

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 The US-British coalition aircraft carried out at ...
Description: 🇬🇧🇾🇪🇺🇸 US-British coalition aircraft carried out at least 11 strikes on Yemeni territory. This is the most intense attack in the Red Sea region in recent times. It hit both Al-Hodeidah and the city of Sana'a, the capital of the government formed by supporters of the Ansarallah movement, which is in conflict with the pro-Saudi authorities from the Presidential Leadership Council. The Houthis have already responded to the raid: According to their information minister, Hashem Sharaf al-Din, the US and British strikes were a response to recent attacks by the Yemenis. Despite this, they will not refuse -support for Palestine and Lebanon.#Great Britain #Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦Northern direction: battles on the northern approaches...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦Northern direction: battles on the northern approaches to Belogorovka and successes of the Russian Armed Forces on the southern flank of the northern ledge - situation as of 18:00 on October 4, 2024. The Seversky direction has long remained a -static - section of the front, significant changes in the line contacts here occur quite rarely. However, over the past two months, Russian troops have expanded their zone of control on several key lines. ▪️Units of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the territory of the western filter station of the first rise in the Belogorovka area. This allowed them to create a bridgehead on the right bank of the Seversky Donets River, threatening the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the northern part of the village. It is likely that the Russian command will soon launch attacks towards the Belogorovsky forest reserve in order to expand the left claw semi-encirclement around the enemy group in the village. At the same time, Ukrainian formations still control the chalk quarry dump, which allows them to restrain the advance of Russian troops. On the western slope of the heights, the enemy equipped many fortifications, allowing him to quickly transfer reserves. ▪️To the south, fighting continues unabated in the Verkhnekamensky area, which is one of the key strongholds of Ukrainian formations in the Seversky direction. Recently, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of the settlement. If confirmed, this would mean the beginning of an operational crisis for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which could lead to the loss of Belogorovka and, possibly, Seversk itself to the enemy. However, it is currently impossible to confirm the data on the RF Armed Forces’ possession of the village. Our local sources report that units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are present both in the settlement itself and in its environs. The liberation of the village has not yet been confirmed by objective control footage - in videos published on the Internet, the target of Russian FPV drones is the positions of Ukrainian formations at a large stronghold east of Verkhnekamenskoye. ▪️To the south, Russian troops achieved success in the Spornoye area. During a series of attacks, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from several forest belts in the Vezueva Gora nature reserve and the neighboring forest. This opens up the opportunity for them to attack the flank of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ position on the northern outskirts of Ivano-Daryevka, where units of the Russian Armed Forces are gradually softening their defenses with the help of artillery and TOS -Solntsepek-. One can also expect the Russian command to act with the goal of straightening the front line to the north, forcing the enemy to retreat under the threat of semi-encirclement. ▪️On September 2, information was confirmed about the liberation of Vyemka by the Russian army, a large stronghold of Ukrainian formations on the southern approaches to Seversk. Stormtroopers of the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from the forest belts southeast of the village, and also advanced along the railway track to the north from the Vyemka station. After this, the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the village were caught in a pincer movement and were forced to retreat. Now the Russian troops are faced with the task of clearing out the pocket formed south of Vyemka and preparing for a further attack on Seversk. Ukrainian formations rely on several large strongholds south of the city, to storm which the Russian Armed Forces will need to use significant resources. ▪️On September 10, footage of a successful assault by Russian troops on a stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine southeast of Privolny appeared. The attack was probably carried out by the Russian Armed Forces during the summer, but the footage surfaced on the Internet only in early September. Russian troops continue their offensive in this area with the goal of breaking through the formation of the northern front of the semi-encirclement of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in Orekhovo-Vasilevka. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇻🇳🇨🇳 About the clash between the Vietnamese and the Chines...
Description: 🇻🇳🇨🇳 About the skirmish between the Vietnamese and the Chinese in the South China Sea Tension remains in the waters of the South China Sea. Against the backdrop of military activity in the region, conflicts between the Chinese and fishermen from other countries participating in the territorial dispute have recently begun to occur more and more often. ▪️According to Vietnamese media, on September 29, near the disputed Paracel Islands, Chinese law enforcement officers entered a Vietnamese fishing vessel, where they beat the ship's crew with metal rods, and also took away the catch and navigation equipment. ▪️Vietnam has already protested to the Chinese authorities. Beijing does not deny that Chinese law enforcement officers took measures against the Vietnamese because they were fishing in the waters without permission from China. According to Chinese officials, everything was done in a professional and discreet manner, so no fishermen were harmed. 📌The incident seems quite serious - Vietnam rarely expresses its dissatisfaction with the skirmishes in the South China Sea to the Chinese authorities. However, this has happened more than once over the past few years. In 2020, the Chinese coast guard sank a Vietnamese fishing boat. That same year, local journalists wrote about the theft of equipment and catch from another Vietnamese ship. And these are just the incidents that make it to the press. 🔻Even taking into account the rather harsh rhetoric from Hanoi, the approach of the Vietnamese authorities to the territorial dispute, consisting of a selective response to skirmishes and an unnoticed expansion of their zone of control on the islands, will not change. The same applies to ties between the two countries. According to Vietnamese authorities, the territorial dispute is a small part of relations between Hanoi and Beijing, so it should not spoil them entirely. This, by the way, is the main difference between the Vietnamese and Philippine approaches, which we have pointed out more than once. High-resolution mapEnglish version #Vietnam #China @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 How in Moldova they manipulate the -Russian threat- befo...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 How the Russian threat is being manipulated in Moldova before elections and referendum The office of Moldovan President Maia Sandu continues to warm up public opinion for the presidential elections and referendum on European integration on October 20. ▪️In the American publication Politico, with reference to the police and the Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of Moldova, they write that a Russian-funded conspiracy to falsify the results of the upcoming vote was allegedly uncovered in the republic - in order to disrupt Chisinau's desire for closer ties with the EU -.▪️ Just literally a week before After this sensational statement, Politico also published an article about how in the Russian Federation they are allegedly trying to disrupt the referendum by using money to bribe voters. 📌Politico is famous for custom-made materials and participation in media campaigns, so it is not surprising that the statements of Moldovan officials were preceded by an article in the American publication. ▪️Sandu’s office is trying with all its might to shift the focus of Moldovans and the Western community from total censorship to mythical Russian interference. ▪️After all, another anti-Russian campaign is taking place against the backdrop of numerous scandals. Thus, the Central Election Commission of Moldova, which is openly financed by Western governments, intends to open only two polling stations in the Russian Federation for hundreds of thousands of its citizens. At the same time, dozens of polling stations will be opened in Western countries and postal voting will be allowed. ▪️The Moldovan authorities also continue massive blocking of resources and limit the election campaigning of Sandu’s competitors on television, violating the law. 🔻In Europe, earlier there were separate voices about the inadmissibility of Moldova’s entry into the EU precisely due to the high degree of political repression and restrictions, which would finally kill the reputation of the association. So the rumors about the Russian threat from Chisinau are designed both to distract attention from the manipulations of the authorities and to attract Western skeptics who do not expect Moldovans to join the EU. And the Politico newspaper, as always, helps for such purposes. #Moldova #Russia #mediatechnology@rybarSupport usPOLITICORussia paying people to vote against joining EU, Moldova warns – POLITICOMoscow has built a -mafia-style- network to distribute cash ahead of a critical referendum on the country’s future, top Moldovan officials told POLITICO.

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the upcoming exercises -Keen Sword 25- Countrie...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the upcoming exercises -Keen Sword 25-Countries in the Asia-Pacific region continue to conduct large-scale exercises. Already at the end of October, training for military personnel from Japan and the United States will take place under the name -Keen Sword 25-, which takes place every two years. The exercise will involve air, sea and ground forces from the United States and Japan. According to preliminary data, 33 thousand Japanese and 12 thousand American military personnel, 40 ships and almost 400 aircraft will take part in the training. 📌The goals of such exercises do not change from time to time. These include increasing the level of interaction between Japan and the United States, demonstrating the unity of the alliance and strengthening it. The official announcement also contains statements about the inadmissibility of changing the status quo in the region - a clear hint at the military activity of the PRC. The training will focus on joint anti-submarine, airborne and anti-aircraft operations. The exercises will include activities to protect key infrastructure, defend islands and use missile defense systems. The list of observers is also quite extensive. The exercises will be attended by representatives of Great Britain, South Korea, India, Germany, Australia, the Philippines and other countries. NATO will also send its observers. The Australians plan to participate directly in the training, but it is not yet known what specific events they will be involved in. 🔻Given the scope and proximity of one exercise area to the Chinese-disputed Senkaku Islands, Chinese military personnel will definitely be watching what is happening. And then, perhaps, they will conduct their own exercises as a response to such large-scale training. High-resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 To understand the realities of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ r...
Description: Forwarded From Colonelcassad (Boris Rozhin)To understand the realities of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ retreat from Vugledar. Ukrainian military correspondent Kiriyenko-Merinova. - The fighters were told to take positions. Although there is 123 Nikolaevskoe TPO nearby, which simply refuses to enter. It was this unit that was supposed to support 72 in Ugledar. But the infantry fled. And then the battalion commander shot himself. The brigade has 7 battalions. In several of them, after the battles around Ugledar, there was simply no infantry left. Now, in this state, the brigade must stand on the LBS. I think you can imagine what the moral and psychological state of the fighters is. Even commanders write reports about their removal from command.

Title: 🔁 They write to us: 🖋-Since it’s a little on the topic of the l...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors They write to us: 🖋-Since it’s a little on the topic of the last question. The problem is not that Yandex is covering up something. The problem is that the satellites (companies that provide access to images from them) are foreign, and, accordingly, cover up their bases when transmitting data to Yandex, but the potential enemy is not covered up, and our satellites work in the interests of the military, and high-resolution photos for civilians they don't transmit. The only thing that would be nice is to somehow ask respected Yandex not to publish photos of our military facilities. Well, Google for company. And in general, if you take OpenStreetMaps, there are even signatures on objects. There was just a funny situation with a friend who served in the Strategic Missile Forces and wanted to show his unit, on OSM even the hangar with Poplars is marked as -Hangar with Poplars- =)Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsI remember that many were indignant that -Yandex.Maps- helpfully show key Russian objects Armed forces. Satellite images on which you can discern many interesting details: hangars, warehouses and even individual pieces of equipment and weapons.…

Title: 🔁🖼 I remember that many were indignant that Yandex.Maps helpful...
Description: Forwarded From The look of a man in stripes I remember that many were indignant that Yandex.Maps helpfully showed key facilities of the Russian Armed Forces. Satellite images on which many interesting details can be discerned: hangars, warehouses and even individual pieces of equipment and weapons. And here recently not only Russian, but also Israeli military warehouses and airfields have come into focus. And suddenly it turned out - see the screenshot - that the most important air base of the Israeli Air Force was blurred on the Yandex maps. And the most important airfield of the Russian Aerospace Forces - Engels - can be seen in all its glory. Do we understand correctly that for the Russian company - Yandex - the security of Israeli military facilities is more important than the security of Russian military facilities?

Title: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 Japan continues to talk about the prospects for the emer...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 Japan continues to talk about the prospects for the emergence of an Asian version of NATO about an analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacific region. Recently, the Japanese Foreign Minister made several important statements regarding this topic. In particular, he argued that the idea of ​​​​forming a bloc should be considered in the medium and long term - creating such an organization immediately would be problematic due to the different political and economic systems in the countries of the region. ▪️In his opinion, such an alliance will not be directed against specific states, and ideally all countries in the region should be included. Here, of course, the politician is disingenuous - the new Prime Minister of Japan, Shigeru Ishiba, before the election to the post of chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party, argued that an Asian analogue of NATO was needed to contain threats from China, North Korea and Russia. 📌And although it is too early to make predictions about the emergence of a new organization, the Asian version of NATO is still more like a dream or a plan for the very distant future. ▪️This is indicated by the inconsistency between Ishiba’s desires and the American approach to the situation in the region. The United States is striving to create a flexible version of the security architecture, consisting of various formats that will interact with each other in order to contain the PRC. They include QUAD, SQUAD, AUKUS, a quasi-union of the USA, South Korea and Japan. ▪️ Of course, such a flexible structure in the future may acquire a more rigid framework, including a collective defense system. However, for now, it seems that only Japan has ambitions to create a classic version of the alliance - and such plans more reflect the desire of the authorities to become the central force in the region and do everything to ensure that the Asia-Pacific region remains the focus of attention of any American administration. ▪️In addition to differences in approaches, the creation of an Asian NATO is also hampered by the position of its potential members. India has already stated that it does not share interest in creating a bloc. In the United States, the idea was also coldly received, unofficially calling it a fantasy. 🔻Therefore, although there are prerequisites for creating an alliance, such plans will continue to remain only on paper.#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesJapan's new top diplomat calls 'Asian NATO' an idea for the futureForeign Minister Takeshi Iwaya hinted that such a grouping would be open to all countries and partners in the region - including rivals such as China.

Title: 🇬🇧 About the results of the annual conference of the Conservati...
Description: 🇬🇧 About the results of the annual conference of the Conservative Party From September 29 to October 2, the conference of the Conservative Party of Great Britain was held in Birmingham, which became a kind of place of debate between candidates for the role of the new leader of the party after the failed parliamentary elections.▪️Now that it’s the turn Conservatives are in opposition, they are focused on choosing a successor to Rishi Sunak. The four remaining candidates in the race are former enterprise and trade secretary Kemi Badenoch, shadow home secretary James Cleverley, ex-migration secretary Robert Jenrick and former security secretary Tom Tugendhat. ▪️Left-leaning Tugendhat has spoken of restoring confidence in the Conservative Party and return to power. In his speech, while trying to highlight his military experience, he focused on state security, the National Health Service and economic growth.▪️Cleverley, who along with the ex-security minister is still an outsider in the polls about the chances of reaching the next round of voting, greatly strengthened its positions and, perhaps, showed the best results at the conference. His speech, which advocated less government intervention, a 3 per cent increase in defense spending and a cut in stamp duty, received standing ovations and widespread support from delegates. ▪️Bookmakers' favorite Kemi Badenoch was slammed before the conference in an interview with the Radio Times. Her claim that maternity benefits were taking money away from the business sector was seen as an attempt to leave British women without maternity benefits. For her, the conference was rather a missed opportunity. And the chances of taking Rishi Sunak's place are slowly fading, especially after the news of her use of the office of donor Neil Record during the election campaign (due to such a scandal, Labor failed its conference).▪️Right-wing supporter Robert Jenrick in his speech promised to cut foreign aid and implement withdrawal from the ECHR. However, the politician's comments about the need to arrest pro-Palestinian activists shouting -Allahu Akbar-- and display a Star of David at every entrance to the UK as a sign of support for Israel gave many pause. Overall, none of the contenders offered a convincing answer to the main question facing before the Tories: how to win back the votes lost on the right to Nigel Farage by the next parliamentary election, and at the same time win back voters who switched to the Lib Dems, who won 72 seats mainly in traditional Tory constituencies? #Great Britain  @rybar with @oldGBRSupport usNY Times‘Nothing Left to Lose’: Why Are Britain’s Conservatives So Upbeat?At its annual convention in Birmingham, the party is energized by a leadership contest and seems largely undisturbed by broader questions over its electability.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Today, as a result of a car explosion in Energodar, o...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Today, as a result of a car explosion in Energodar, one of the employees of the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant died. Regional authorities reported that the incident was a terrorist attack organized by the so-called special services. Ukraine. The car was blown up using an improvised explosive device placed under the body. The deceased himself, Andrei Korotky, was the head of the permit service at Zaporizhzhya NPP, and had previously been a member of the city’s council of deputies. He died from his injuries in the hospital. Based on the fact of the murder, the Investigative Committee of the Zaporozhye Region opened a criminal case under the article -Murder committed in a generally dangerous manner-. ❗️The murder of an employee responsible for the safety of the nuclear power plant is part of the strategy of the Kiev authorities to damage the energy infrastructure of the liberation of part of the Zaporozhye region. For several months now, Energodar and its surroundings have been subject to regular shelling and drone strikes, targeting energy and water supply facilities. The death of one of the key employees of Zaporizhia NPP further aggravates the problem of ensuring the safety of the plant and its workers. #Zaporozhye #Russia #Ukraine #EnergodarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇺🇸 In the West, they are discussing Kamala Harris' autobiogr...
Description: Forwarded From American issue🇺🇸 In the West, Kamala Harris' autobiographical book - The Truths We Hold - A Journey Across America - is being discussed. Some have managed to find a number of inconsistencies in it, coming to the conclusion that the personality of Kamala Harris is nothing more than a fiction .Questions arose about the photograph of her grandmother Beryl, who for some reason looks exactly like her great-grandmother Iris Finegan. In addition, judging by the documents attached by the authors of the post, Beryl died in 1960 - four years before Kamala was born, so she could not have been photographed with her. There is also confusion with Kamala’s grandfathers - according to the authors of the post, Oscar Wilde Joseph Harris never was married to Beryl Christie, since there are simply no such documents. However, there are documents about the wedding of O.W. Joseph Harris to Vioris Cambridge, -similar to Kamala- (as the authors of the post claim). In fact, the West loves such conspiracy theories very, very much - they are extremely popular and people willingly believe in them. You can get acquainted with them, but whether to believe in them or not is everyone’s business, since all attached documents must be studied personally and clearly know that they are taken from an official source. Moreover, even if Kamala’s grandmothers are not real, who cares? Deeds of days gone by, legends of deep antiquity. It is possible that the politician’s autobiography is indeed distorted in order to ensure the safety of her relatives.🇺🇸 @usaperiodicalTelegramÜbersicht Ukraine

Title: 🇰🇿🇹🇷 Interesting news comes from Astana: President Kassym-Jom...
Description: 🇰🇿🇹🇷 Interesting news comes from Astana: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev signed the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan - On the ratification of the Agreement between the governments of member states of the Organization of Turkic States on the creation of a simplified customs corridor -. The law is aimed, as stated, at the development of transit and transport potential and trade and economic relations. Before our eyes, the previously paper tiger of the UTG, which devoted its time to talking about cultural heritage, is growing teeth and claws. 🔻The organization is increasingly strengthening its weight, mastering the military and economic spheres. We have previously written about the project of a single alphabet, military exercises and other events. And it is no longer possible to ignore these processes. It's time to ask Astana uncomfortable and meaningful questions about how these agreements relate to the current obligations of Kazakhstan as a member of the EAEU in protecting the common market. -Zhomart Tokayev signed the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan -On the ratification of the Agreement between the governments of member states of the Organization of Turkic States on the creation of a simplified customs corridor-.

Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 About the visit of the Russian Prime Minister to Armenia...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺 About the visit of the Russian Prime Minister to Armenia and the reaction of the local information field The other day, Prime Minister of the Russian Federation Mikhail Mishustin visited Yerevan, where a meeting of the Eurasian Intergovernmental Council within the EAEU was held. ▪️According to Mishustin, the growth rate of the economies of the EAEU countries exceeds the world average. The Russian Prime Minister presented the main economic achievements:➖ Mutual trade of the EAEU countries in the first half of 2024 grew by 5.7% ➖ The GDP of the union countries over the same period grew by 4.5%  ➖ Industrial production increased by 4.8% ➖ Agricultural output - by 3.5% ➖ Retail trade turnover - by 8.5%.▪️The media shared expectations about behind-the-scenes negotiations between Mishustin and Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, but such meetings are unknown. ▪️The Armenian pro-government information field also virtually ignored the meeting of the EAEU intergovernmental council. But local channels published footage of Mishustin’s plane accompanied by fighter jets, simultaneously accusing the Russian Federation of -occupation- and throwing in dubious information about the possible use of Russian military equipment against Armenia. 🔻As expected, Mishustin’s one-day visit will not change the political side of Russian-Armenian relations, primarily due to Yerevan’s aggressive position.  The Armenian leadership and the resources under their control have once again demonstrated political shortsightedness. While taking full advantage of the economic benefits from the EAEU, Yerevan prefers a political orientation toward the United States and the EU, which can only offer loans and promises so far. As we have repeatedly written, the growth of the Armenian economy in recent years is associated precisely with successes within the EAEU. However, the imbalance between politics and economics cannot continue indefinitely. The Western curators of Pashinyan’s office are doing everything to undermine Armenian-Russian relations, and the United States has already promised the Armenians -cold winters.- This is the price for the -Western- path of development. #Armenia #Russia @rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaMishustin: the growth rates of the economies of the EAEU countries exceed the world average. At the end of 2023, the total GDP of the EAEU grew by 3.7% (Armenia and Kyrgyzstan became the growth leaders). The global average growth was 3.2%.

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 27 - October 3, 2024▪️The key event of the past week was the launch of about 200 missiles from Iran against Israel. Most of the ammunition was intercepted by air defense systems, the rest mostly fell in vacant lots. ▪️Nevertheless, several missiles still hit IDF targets, including the Tel Nof airbase. According to footage that appeared on the Internet, several missiles fell on its territory, but the consequences of the attack are unknown. ▪️At least several missiles hit the West Bank. In Jericho, one Palestinian was killed and seven more people were injured as a result of rockets falling.▪️Pro-Iranian proxies also launched attacks on Israel, launching UAVs and missiles at various targets. However, the majority of the ammunition was intercepted before crossing the Israeli border.▪️As ​​for members of the Ansarallah movement, they also tried to hit Israeli targets. Most of the ammunition was intercepted near Eilat, with a few more east of Tel Aviv.▪️Off the coast of Yemen, the Houthis launched several attacks on merchant ships. In the Red Sea, the tanker CORDELIA MOON was subjected to a combined attack, and in the Indian Ocean, the container ship MARATHOPOLIS.▪️Ansaralli fighters also managed to intercept an American MQ-9 Reaper drone over Saada province. This is already the 11th UAV of this type shot down by the Houthis since the beginning of the escalation.▪️The Israelis, who attacked the port infrastructure in Al-Hodeidah and Ras Issa in Yemen, did not sit idly by. As a result of the raid, fires broke out at several facilities, there were dead and wounded.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of October 4, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of October 4, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, our group of troops - North - writes about repelling 2 enemy counterattacks with a total strength of up to a platoon of personnel. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, the Russian Armed Forces continue to push back the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and fierce battles are also taking place in the area of ​​the settlement. Plekhovo. The governor of the region reported that a Ukrainian aircraft-type UAV was suppressed in the Kurchatov area by means of electronic warfare. Judging by the footage from the field, the fall and explosion occurred 4 km from the nuclear power plant, the operation of which is not in danger.▪️ In the Pokrovks direction, our troops advanced to the eastern part of Lysovka, occupied Nikolaevka, and are advancing in the Krasny Yar area in the direction of the railway. In the Tsukurkino area, the enemy characterizes the situation for the Armed Forces of Ukraine as -complicated.- The Russian Armed Forces, according to several sources, are operating in the eastern part of the village, which means the enemy’s failures in attempts to stabilize the front.▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces rushed out of the settlement. Ostroye to Ostrovskoye, which simultaneously creates a threat to the garrison of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Maksimilyanovka and means the movement of the southern protrusion of the front, forming a large pocket together with the troops of the Pokrovsky direction.▪️ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Army is expanding the zone of control at Vodyanoy towards Bogoyavlenka, Far Eastern soldiers are working against the enemy north of Ugledar. ▪️ In the Kherson direction, our UAV operators strike enemy vehicles on the right bank of the Dnieper in Kherson and its suburbs, destroying personnel deployment sites.▪️ In the Belgorod region yesterday, as a result of a night air attack on the city of Belgorod and the Belgorod region, a commercial facility was damaged as a result of the downing of a drone a civilian was wounded.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a woman born in 1957 was killed and a woman born in 1979 was injured when an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV. and men born in 1945, 1980 There, while extinguishing the fire, four employees of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations received shell shock. In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), where heavy fighting is taking place, a woman born in 1961 was seriously wounded as a result of the enemy's use of cannon artillery. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors North of Ugledar 36 The Motorized Rifle Brigade continues to move on, destroying enemy positions north of the liberated city Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on October 3, 2024. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in the Kyiv, Sumy, Rivne, Kharkov, Odessa and Kirovograd regions. Ukrainian formations attempted to attack the Russian Aerospace Forces airfields in Buturlinovka and Borisoglebsk, Voronezh region. In the Kursk direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked Kurchatov with a drone near the Kursk nuclear power plant. Another fact has been recorded of the use of the Russian Armed Forces drone - Inokhodets - to destroy targets with guided weapons. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops expanded the zone of control to the west of Novogrodovka and gained a foothold on the outskirts of Lysovka. Nikolaevka to the north also came under full control. In the Donetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces carried out an attack under the cover of armored vehicles in the direction of Ostrovsky from Ostroy, advancing several kilometers to the west. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, attack aircraft took control of the territory of the ventilation shaft of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine No. 3 to the west from Vodyanoye, and are also fighting further south. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en) # Voronezh # Donetsk #digest #report #map #Kiev #Kirovograd #Kursk #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Rivne #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine #Ugledar #Kharkov #Tsukurino@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: local battles on the line of contact...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: local battles on the line of contact, attack on KurchatovSituation towards the end of October 3 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas.🔻In the Glushkovsky district, fighting is taking place in the area of ​​​​the village of Veseloye, where Russian troops previously expanded the zone of control. At the same time, evidence of the release of Medvezhy has not yet appeared. In the Korenevsky district, no changes have been observed in the control zone. Positional battles are taking place there, and the forests in the vicinity of the village of Kremyanoye are subject to frequent airstrikes by the Russian Aerospace Forces. In Novoivanovka, an artillery strike destroyed the M777 howitzer of the Ukrainian formations.▪️The fact that the enemy is transferring towed guns to Russian territory may indicate not so much a shortage of self-propelled artillery, but rather the fact that the enemy is quite confidently in control of Novoivanovka.🔻In the Sudzhansky district there is also no there are changes in the situation. Local battles continue; artillery and aviation of the Russian Armed Forces are working on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the vicinity of the settlements of Martynovka and Plekhovo.❗️In the evening, Ukrainian formations attacked Kurchatov. The impact hit one of the hangars not far from the reservoir, on the territory of which a powerful secondary detonation occurred. The Kursk Nuclear Power Plant is no more than five kilometers from here. A fire broke out at the site of the attack. There is not much official information about the incident yet. According to some reports, the enemy used a guided bomb, and according to official information, an aircraft-type UAV was suppressed by electronic warfare equipment, which fell within the city. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, you are always welcome you can write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for October 3, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops worked on the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities, and in the south they hit Khan Yunis and Rafah. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out another series of raids, detaining at least 15 Palestinians within 24 hours. In total, since the beginning of the events on October 7, 2023, the total number of detainees was 11,100 residents of the Palestinian Authority. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, IDF units expanded the combat zone, carrying out attacks in the vicinity of Yarun, Kafr Qila and Aytarun. The Israeli Air Force also worked in Beirut. In total, over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks was 46 people killed and 85 wounded. Yemen's Houthis carried out a UAV attack on Tel Aviv, two munitions were intercepted, and one fell in an open area. And in eastern Syria, pro-Iranian forces launched a missile attack on a US military base.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: expansion of the combat zo...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: expansion of the combat zone situation towards outcome October 3, 2024 The ground phase of Operation Arrows of the North continues on the Lebanese-Israeli border. As of today, there have not yet been any objective monitoring frames that would allow us to establish the exact configuration of the front. At the same time, the press service of the Israel Defense Forces, although it claims the presence of its units in southern Lebanon, did not provide additional information. Arabic-language media wrote that the Israelis were using M113 Zelda armored personnel carriers with integrated remote control.▪️Meanwhile, based on publications by Lebanese media, it was possible to somewhat clarify the situation with the Israeli offensive. It became known about clashes in the vicinity of the cities of Yarun, Kafr Qila and Aytarun. It is not yet known how deeply the Israelis were able to advance in these areas.▪️At the same time, media affiliated with Hezbollah reported that all IDF attempts to expand the zone of control were failing: the reason for this was supposedly fierce resistance from the Lebanese organization, whose forces carried out numerous ambushes on Israeli elite units. ▪️At the same time, the Israeli Air Force continued to carry out massive strikes across the entire territory of Lebanon: hits occurred both in border areas where fighting is taking place, and in those located at a great distance from the border, including Baalbek, Harfush and Hermel. another raid on the Lebanese capital Beirut. According to official Israeli data, the target of the airstrikes was the headquarters of Hezbollah: operatives of the intelligence unit of the Shiite group and its signalmen were killed.▪️According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 46 people killed and 85 wounded. The total number of deaths exceeds more than a thousand. And according to the UN, more than 128 thousand Lebanese were forced to flee to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic.🔻And although some media outlets almost claim the failure of the IDF offensive, such statements seem somewhat premature. In the meantime, we can only wait for the same photo and video evidence, as well as official statements from the Israeli command about the progress of the operation. Now everything is limited to reports of shootings and local raids. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇮🇷 About the -success- of Iran's missile strike on Israe...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷 About the -success- of Iran's missile attack on Israeli air bases. A day after the massive attack on Israel, satellite footage begins to appear on the Internet, which is passed off as the consequences of an Iranian attack on the air bases of the Israeli Defense Forces. At first glance, it may seem that there really was damage, but upon closer examination, everything looks different: ▪️ In these pictures, many of the supposed hit points are in fact ordinary trees and blackouts that are visible even on Google maps. Taking this into account, it can be assumed that most of the photographs published at the moment are not actual Maxar images, but screenshots repainted in black and white from Google Maps. The primary sources of these images were pro-Iranian X accounts. If you look at the black and white photographs, you really get the feeling that the footage shows the consequences of a fire, but if you look at the color photographs, everything immediately falls into place.▪️The only thing that can be confirmed with relative certainty is that hits on protected hangars on Nevatim airbase, where F-35 fighters were supposedly based. The Israeli media indirectly stated that nothing critical actually happened. ❗️Later, another portion of new and much more truthful photographs appeared. And on them the places of hits and the scale of the consequences are somewhat different: here, too, arrivals in the hangar can be recorded.▪️The fact of the presence of hits cannot be denied with confidence. At the moment, there have been no official statements from the authorities of the Islamic Republic. And it is obvious that Maxar will not provide its satellite images of IDF air bases to Iran and its affiliated structures. The current attempt by some media to work out the negative of the questionable effectiveness of the strike looks ridiculous and disavows the whole essence of the Iranian attack: the desire to pass off shadows, trees and places with damage as damage. dark shades for the arrivals give the Israelis a reason to ridicule the quality of media resources - the Axis of Resistance - and their intelligence. Now we can only wait for official confirmation from Iranian intelligence structures (if, of course, they are published). We should not forget about the data of the Israeli authorities, according to which most of the consequences were eliminated in the first few hours after the strikes. And this, in turn, directly indicates that the country’s leadership will do its best to hide the real scale of the consequences, letting only the necessary information onto the Internet. Against this background, such publications by pro-Iranian media only help the ultra-Orthodox government of Israel. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇱🇻🇱🇹🇷🇺🇪🇪 About the new NATO exercise over the Baltics ...
Description: 🇱🇻🇱🇹🇷🇺🇪🇪 About the new NATO exercise over the Baltics While we were discussing possible threats to Russia from the Baltics, a new North Atlantic Alliance exercise, codenamed Rammstein Alloy, took place over the former Soviet republics. This is a planned event, the purpose of which is to test the readiness of air defense systems, deployed in the Baltic States, as part of the Baltic Air Policing mission. The exercise took place over two days - September 30 and October 1, and involved fighters from NATO countries, including the Italian, German, Finnish air forces, as well as a NASAMS air defense system battery of the Spanish armed forces and fighters F/A-18 from the territory of Romania.🔻The main point is to train and maintain the tone of NATO pilots in a crisis situation in the region. The planes maneuvered along the Kaliningrad region, Belarus and the Leningrad region and conditionally repelled the attack. Training over the Baltic states has recently become more frequent, as have sharp and loud statements from the authorities of the three republics. The most prominent is Estonia, which has taken on the role of leader in provocations towards Russia. The other day, Kaupo Rosen, the head of the department of the Estonian foreign intelligence that has already become a kind of meme, said that the Estonians would like internal problems for Russia, which can be achieved by defeat in the Northern Military District. As everyone already understands perfectly well, any exercises, especially near the borders, make it possible to perform another important task: under the pretext of training, Western intelligence collects data on the activity of our air defense systems and other military facilities. High-resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Baltic States #Russia # Estonia@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️🖼 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 Speaking of Ponomarev’s chicks, one of these tu...
Description: Fisherman: 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦🇺🇸 About the problems of the so-called. -Russian opposition- in Poland Interesting things continue to happen with the Russian opposition abroad. While some are quarreling, accusing each other of corruption and dividing offices in the government of the beautiful Russia of the future, others... 🇵🇱🇷🇺🇺🇦 Speaking of Ponomarev’s chicks, one of these turned out to be young Angelina Lukovskaya, who now introduces herself in the Polish manner like -Mrs. Lukowska- and on whose example one can trace the sad history of young people who succumbed to opposition propaganda and left for Poland. ▪️It is obvious that the curators from Ponomarev’s circle had plans for her activities in Poland, since the girl has a real opportunity to obtain citizenship and legally settle in the republic. ▪️Over the past time, she managed to attend various opposition events, for example, she specially came from Poland to anti-Russian rallies in Berlin, organized by Yulia Navalnaya and Mikhail Khodorkovsky. By the way, their participants face administrative and criminal liability in Russia for this.▪️However, now, when former projects are deprived of sponsorship support, those abandoned are left to get out on their own.▪️True, Lukovskaya was not at a loss and, using her experience in obtaining a Pole’s card, is now organizing channel of emigration from Russia and Belarus to Poland. In her videos, although the girl does not openly advocate for Ukraine, she clearly states that she has no desire to return to Russia while the current government is there. ▪️But the trouble is that in Warsaw the prospects for political migrants are not exactly rosy - even Lukovskaya herself told how one of her friends had their bag torn at the airport when they found out that he was from Russia. And given the current situation of the same Belarusian oppositionists in Europe, there is no hope for a reliable device. Seemingly realizing that because of this Polish business with relocants could fail, Lukovskaya, apparently struggling with her own convictions, still visits Russia, but with other projects to support radical feminism.📌 In general, it is worth saying that in connection with the squabbles within government, attempts to somehow curry favor with the electorate, and also taking into account pan-European trends - fugitives from the Russian Federation and Belarus are not welcomed either in Poland or in the Baltic countries. In some countries they are already being deported, and the Warsaw authorities are significantly limiting the issuance of visas. And despite the assertions that finding housing in the republic, as well as work, is not too difficult, we will tell you that the recent flood that devastated the south-west of the country , only increased real estate prices further, as did popular anger towards those who came in large numbers. Salaries, of course, remained unchanged, and official vacancies in Poland do not like to spoil unemployment statistics. Therefore, we assume that this is not the last story about collapsed career plans from oppositionists abandoned abroad and their protégés, who were once captivated by the prospect take a cozy place in the offices of the renewed government of some other Russia. High resolution infographics #Poland #Russia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇾🇪 This night, fighters of the Ansarallah movement again...
Description: 🇮🇱🇾🇪 This night, fighters of the Ansarallah movement again attacked Israeli territory, using Yafa drones. According to Houthi spokesman Yahya Sari, this type of ammunition is supposedly capable of bypassing Israeli interception systems. First, one drone was intercepted off the coast of central Israel. Some time later, two more UAVs were discovered over the Mediterranean Sea, one of which was shot down on approach. The second, although it managed to fly, fell in an open area. Contrary to the statements of Ansaralli media resources and Arabic-language media about the defeat of a vital target, in reality everything was different. Not a single Israeli was injured during the Yemeni air attack, and there was no material damage. However, whatever the result, another attack on Tel Aviv will add a plus to the Yemenis’ treasury. Which will again give the pro-Palestinian community a reason to call -fighters in slippers- one of the most consistent defenders of Palestine from the -Zionist threat-. Title: 🔁🖼 An absolutely amazing article in The Hill - that Russians mu...
Description: Forwarded From Topics. The main thing (GlavMedia) Absolutely amazing article in The Hill - that - Russians must suffer, but live better than in the EU - Russians seem to be suffering less from the war than in 2022. Neither Ukraine's invasion of the Kursk region nor Western sanctions seem to be causing discontent among -ordinary- citizens or wealthy residents of Russia's largest cities. This came as a surprise to many Western politicians and Russian dissidents, who had pinned their hopes on Muscovites and St. Petersburg residents they will rebel against the war economy and the disappearance of Western boutiques, free Internet and trips to the EU. But although the Russian Federation was cut off from the West, all this irritated too few people to cause significant protest. Western sanctions introduced in 2022 caused a sharp drop in capital outflow from Russia. Almost all the money that would previously have been directed to luxury European real estate has instead begun to flow to Moscow, St. Petersburg and their suburbs. Although Visa and MasterCard have suspended their operations in Russia, Russians continue to use the SBP of the Central Bank of Russia, which allows them to transfer money by phone number immediately and without commission. Russian capitals are now ahead of European cities in the use of QR codes and facial recognition, and mobile data transfer is the cheapest and fastest in the EU. Even the stores have the same range of goods as before the war, including French wine and Italian sweets. In addition, home delivery of food and goods by robots is commonplace. We are seeing such tempting job offers that many Russians who left are now returning, having failed to integrate into European societies. Russians are not so much concerned as they are happy about the departure of their liberal fellow countrymen and (not suffering, but) welcoming positive economic changes - and this economic progress has undermined anti-Putin sentiment in the country. Thus, the West's attempts to undermine the Russian economy since 2022 have led to the opposite result - at least for now -. What a disaster! The methodology - sell the country for jeans, chewing gum, boots and sausage - did not work with Apple Pay, double Mac, HUGO and parmesan. Oh 😂

Title: ↩️ 🇦🇫🇺🇸 One important thing was missed behind the events on t...
Description: Fisherman: 🇦🇫🇹🇯🏴 About possible sabotage on the border of Tajikistan and Afghanistan Interesting news comes from Tajikistan: from September 24 to October 15, a maximum danger regime was introduced along the border section with the provinces of Badakhshan and Takhar in Afghanistan, which is why... 🇦🇫 🇺🇸 One important point was missed behind the events on the border of Tajikistan and Afghanistan: yesterday it became known that the US Special Representative for Afghanistan Tom West left his post. He expressed gratitude for the opportunity given to him and said that, despite this, the Americans will continue to help Afghanistan and to the Afghan people. West himself was transferred to the post of head of the sanctions coordination department. In this situation, it seems significant that no one was appointed to replace West. And Secretary of State Blinken’s statement does not say this, only that his responsibilities will be taken over by members of the diplomatic mission in Doha. We are talking about Karen Decker, the US charge d’affaires in Afghanistan, Rina Amiri, the US special representative for human rights, in particular, women and John Mark Pommersheim, US Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Central and South Asian Affairs. Judging by the lack of a replacement, the post of US special representative for Afghanistan may be abolished. And given the diminishing importance of this country for the United States, this situation may well be realistic. Diplomatic mission employees located in Doha can take on the duties of a special representative. Moreover, now the Americans are more focused not on dialogue with the Afghan authorities, but on escalating the threat to the countries of the region from Afghanistan. #Afghanistan #CentralAsia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 Development of FPV technologies We were surprised to learn t...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Development of FPV technologies We were surprised to learn that an FPV drone can now be controlled not with glasses and a remote control, but with a laptop and mouse. Like in a computer game. The call sign Birkin provided such an opportunity; as a sample, they were given to steer the drone -OVOD-. Of course, this type of control will not make your head spin, as happens with the operator’s glasses, and the image output from the drone to the neighbor in position is immediately, no matter how you look at it. Extremely interesting technological solutions will continue to surprise us all during the war. For example, a decisive increase in the distance between the operator and the drone’s take-off point. Call sign BirkinOVOD ❘ TulaTwo majors

Title: 🇹🇷 The Turkish research company ASAL conducted a survey from Au...
Description: 🇹🇷 The Turkish research company ASAL conducted a survey from August 17 to 27 among two thousand people in 26 provinces of Turkey on the topic - Do you consider Turkey’s foreign policy to be successful, given the situation in the Middle East and the world? - As a result, 45.3% of respondents answered affirmative, 40.8% disagreed, and 13.9% found it difficult to answer. And everything seems to be quite good, the majority agreed with the actions of the Turkish authorities. However, in April 2022 there was a similar question, and the results were different from the current ones. Then 55.2% of participants assessed foreign policy positively, 36.4% considered it unsuccessful, and 8.4% could not determine their position. That is, in more than two years, support has decreased.📌 And if you think carefully, the population of Turkey can be understood. The economy is in a multi-year crisis, incomes are falling, inflation is rising. The once stated goals of eradicating terrorism remained on paper, the migrant problem in the country has not disappeared anywhere. In these conditions, the only thing Erdogan can boast of is the destruction of hundreds of thousands of PKK leaders and new military products. But for the Turks, who have been fed this kind of food for many years, this is no longer enough, since their living conditions are deteriorating.#Turkey@rybar Support usX (formerly Twitter)Asal Araştırma (@AsalArastirma) on XTürkiye'nin dış politikası başarılı mı?

Title: 🔁🎬 Mariupol Metallurgical Plant named after. Ilyich. A legend w...
Description: Forwarded From Unofficial BezsonovMariupol Metallurgical Plant named after. Ilyich. The legendary metallurgist Makar Mazai worked here, they smelted unique steel for our T-34s, launched the world's largest open-hearth furnace and set unprecedented production records.  The spring of 2022 and the difficult trials that both the city and the plant had to go through did not break the spirit of the people who work and live here. Mariupol metallurgists do not lose hope for a prosperous future. The workshops that were occupied by the Ukrainian military have been cleared of mines and are slowly starting to start up. In a word, LIFE wins once again.  In this documentary we will show you people who are strong, persistent, with a steely character, who build the future of the country every day. Title: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 Amid tensions on the Korean Peninsula, South Korean auth...
Description: 🇰🇵🇰🇷 Amid tensions on the Korean Peninsula, South Korean authorities continue to make predictions about the possible testing of nuclear weapons by the DPRK. The other day, one of the officials of the country's ruling party said that the seventh detonation of a charge would be carried out after the American elections. Just a few days before, the head of the state security department of the presidential administration of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Shin Won Sik, also spoke out on this matter. He said that the next nuclear test will take place either shortly before the US elections or after them. 🔻Forecasts issued by authorities and experts with a certain frequency are justified by several factors. On the one hand, there is an understanding that the DPRK, although not very actively, is preparing to conduct a test: this is also indicated by satellite images that show activity at the nuclear test site, although no obvious signs have yet been observed. At the same time, experts understand the importance of conducting the test for Pyongyang itself. According to some analysts, it is necessary to achieve progress in further miniaturization of nuclear warheads. That is why such forecasts appear very often - especially on the eve of important political events. Speculation about a nuclear test was made, for example, before the inauguration of South Korean President Yoon Seok-yeol in 2022. Now such an event is the elections in the United States. There is a logic to conducting a nuclear weapons test after the election of an American president - in a similar way, the DPRK authorities will draw attention to the Korean Peninsula, creating a very resonant news feed. However, now all estimates are more like fortune telling on tea leaves. #DPRK #SouthKorea@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News+North Korea may conduct nuclear test after U.S. election: South KoreaNorth Korea may conduct a nuclear test after the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election, a South Korean lawmaker said Thursday, citing South Korea's spy agency.

Title: 🇱🇹 It’s interesting how, against the background of the growth o...
Description: 🇱🇹 It’s interesting how, amid the growth of smuggling using airborne objects, the Lithuanian Ministry of Internal Affairs promised to amend the legislation that would allow local border guards to shoot them down. This was said in response to the words of the commander of the State Border Protection Service, Rustam Lyubaev, who previously reported that border guards have neither the legal authority to shoot down air targets nor the weapons with which to do this. The timing of the amendments has not been announced, the military departments are trying To say that knocking down balls of this kind is too extreme a measure. The fact is that military personnel will potentially also have to be involved in this matter - only military radars can detect the balls, border guards simply do not see them. The military personnel themselves, although they observe flying objects, do not comment on their tracking - due to the sensitivity of radar information -. To assert that the border guards will really shoot down something (provided that one of the balls recently fell right in the area of ​​​​the capital's airport) would be quite populist - but intensifying the discussion about the allocation of funding for the armament of certain structures can still serve the local authorities well. borderlands, they know very well that precipitation differs from location to location: somewhere it is in the form of meatballs, somewhere it is cocaine, and somewhere cigarettes are in special demand. Colleagues wrote...

Title: 🔁🖼 Another military enterprise from 🇪🇺Europe appeared in Ukra...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors Another military enterprise from 🇪🇺Europe has appeared in Ukraine. A subsidiary company 🇫🇷🇩🇪 of the Franco-German military concern KNDS - KNDS Ukraine LLC - has opened in Kyiv. The company will provide licenses and technologies for carrying out activities on the basis of Ukrainian enterprises  maintenance and repair of Leopard 1/2 tanks, CAESAR self-propelled guns, AMX10 RC wheeled tanks,  howitzers PzH 2000 and ZSU Gepard. In addition, KNDS will open production of 155-mm artillery ammunition in Ukraine. Earlier, on June 11, 2024, the German concern Rheinmetall opened a joint repair venture in Ukraine, which later  will be expanded to the assembly, production and development of the concern's military equipment. Plans have been announced to open new Rheinmetall branches on Ukrainian territory. From 2025, Rheinmetall also plans to produce 155 mm artillery shells in Ukraine. With similar goals, by the end of 2024,  representation 🇸🇪of the Swedish Defense Logistics Agency (FMV).✨Of course, propaganda will declare -red lines- and -legitimate goals-, which will not cancel the trend of unhindered growth  in Ukraine, Western defense enterprises, which are in the zone of destruction of Russian fire weapons and pose a direct threat to the population of our country. Two majors

Title: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 The military activity of the countries of the Asia-Pacif...
Description: 🇨🇳🇯🇵 The military activity of the countries of the Asia-Pacific region is not decreasing. Last week it became known that the Japanese destroyer Sazanami for the first time passed through the Taiwan Strait, the waters of which China officially considers internal. As they write in the press, the Japanese ship was accompanying ships from Australia and New Zealand. They were heading towards the South China Sea to conduct joint exercises with Philippine and American sailors. 🔻In this way, the Japanese authorities responded to the increased military activity of the PRC near the shores of the island state, which we talked about recently. At the same time, in Japan itself, it seems, they did not plan to openly report about the passage through the Taiwan Strait. This is indicated by the lack of confirmation or denial of this news from the authorities and the military. New Zealand also did not mention the Japanese destroyer, although they confirmed the participation of an Australian ship in the maneuvers.▪️This policy may have been chosen in order not to provoke action from the PRC, whose authorities recently softened their position on the release of water from the Fukushima nuclear power plant. . Also, demonstrative statements by the Japanese could provoke a negative reaction from the Chinese public against the backdrop of spreading anti-Japanese sentiment in local social networks. In any case, the Chinese armed forces observed the passage of the ships, and a representative of the country's Foreign Ministry expressed protest. Considering that the new Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will most likely continue to continue the foreign policy of the former leader of the country towards China, such a policy may be applied by the new authorities in the future. #China #Japan@rybar in collaboration with @awaken_dragonSupport usKyodo News +Japan defense force ship sails through Taiwan Strait for 1st timeA Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force vessel has sailed through the Taiwan Strait for the first time at Prime Minister Fumio Kishida's direction, sources familiar with the matter say, triggering an immediate backlash from China.

Title: ❗️🇮🇱🇮🇷🇷🇺 About a possible threat to the Russian Khmeimim ai...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇮🇷🇷🇺 About a possible threat to the Russian Khmeimim airbase in Syria from Israel! This morning, the news spread in the Arab segment that Israeli aircraft struck the territory of the Russian Khmeimim airbase. In fact, it turned out that the attack was carried out on the city of Jebla, which is located nearby. Some of the missiles were shot down by air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces, but some reached their target. The target of the attack was a warehouse used by Syrian and Iranian military personnel, and the Israelis used Dalila anti-radar cruise missiles and, according to some reports, GBU family guided bombs for the attack. There was no blow to Khmeimim himself. And in principle, an attack was unlikely at this stage, because it would lead to unnecessary escalation. But at the same time, there are even more questions from the Syrians about why Russian air defense does not help repel IDF attacks.❗️ This incident adds another brick to the wall of mistrust on the part of Syrians towards Russia. Although the target was Jebla, Israeli missiles posed a serious danger. An explosion, detonation of warehouses that were used by the Iranians, Syrians, no matter who, in such close proximity is a threat to the base. And we’re not even talking about what it looks like from the Iranian side. After all, no one is stopping the Israelis from conducting a disinformation campaign and declaring that it was the Russians who took and leaked the location of the Iranians (surely a similar narrative is already spreading through controlled media resources in the militants’ territory). And given the fact that the Israelis are now acting with impunity, and the Russian side is limiting itself exclusively to calls stop the escalation of violence and return to the negotiating table, in the future such incidents may increase in scale and lead to more tragic consequences.🔻For example, striking the territory of a Russian air base, that is, de facto territory of the Russian Federation in Syria, under the pretext that there will be an Iranian delegation or plane there. And the Iranians, let us remind you, are allies of Russia (a strategic agreement was signed not so long ago, which assumes that we, in principle, have a common enemy and a common course towards the Israelis). But in fact, these are all just words at the moment.❗️Thus, serious reputational damage is caused to the Russian contingent of troops. And the Israelis see that if the Russians did not intervene now, then they can continue further. And who will guarantee that the ultra-Orthodox government will not choose the Khmeimim airbase as its next target?#Israel #Iran #Russia@rybar Support us

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇷🇺🖇 Protecting terrorists and illegal immigrants: what ...
