Title: 🇬🇪 Georgian authorities for the first time since the entry into...
Description: 🇬🇪 For the first time since the law on foreign agents came into force, the Georgian authorities have added to the register of organizations receiving foreign funding. The list includes nine structures, including the Youth Organization of Ukrainians in Georgia - Svitanok and the Jewish Cultural and Educational Fund. In accordance with local regulations, the criteria for a foreign agent include media or NGOs that received more than 20% of income due to milestone. In total, 476 organizations submitted documents for voluntary registration in the register, although the total number of such legal entities in Georgia is estimated at 31 thousand.📌 In this case, we can say that Tbilisi has begun practical steps to reduce the capabilities of various grant-eating organizations that have been active in the last 20 years took root in Georgia and actually created the collective West’s own electoral base. The goal is, through long-established methods, to bring to power a radically minded pro-Western government that would open a second front against Russia, nullifying all beneficial economic cooperation. So for the ruling party in Georgia, the fight against such NGOs and media is almost a matter of sovereignty. Of course, the addition of foreign agents to the list will not go unnoticed by the European and American sponsors of the Georgian opposition. Therefore, in the near future we can expect a further increase in external pressure on the country, especially in anticipation of the parliamentary elections scheduled for October.#Georgia@rybarSupport usVedomostiIn Georgia, the first organizations were included in the register of foreign agentsThe first organizations included in the register of foreign agents in Georgia were the youth organization of Ukrainians and the Jewish fund .

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of October 3, 2024 ▪️ Night strikes o...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 3, 2024▪️ Night strikes on enemy targets occurred in the enemy’s capital region, Kharkov, Vinnitsa, Rivne, Khmelnytsky, Cherkassy, ​​Ivano-Frankivsk, Poltava regions. In Kharkov, the enemy is trying to pass off the destruction in a high-rise building as a strike by a Russian FAB with UMPC, but the footage shows that for such a powerful type of weapon the destruction is very limited. Apparently, this is an erroneous work of air defense or the enemy’s own artillery of the Kharkov garrison, as evidenced by data from local residents who recorded the work of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ artillery in their residential areas.▪️ In the Kursk region in the Glushkovsky district, 4 enemy soldiers of the 47th were captured brigades. Heavy fighting continues in the south of the Sudzhansky district. The Russian Armed Forces advanced in the area of ​​the settlement. Plekhovo and adjacent forest areas. The commander of the group - Aida - Special Forces - Akhmat - and several of his soldiers were injured. -Hades- refused hospitalization. The enemy is not abandoning plans to build up the group in the region.▪️ In the Seversk direction, the front began to move. Ours advanced from Sporny towards Verkhnekamensky, Belousov at night congratulated the 6th Guards Omsbr on the liberation of Verkhnekamensky. There was no news from this section of the front for some time, so the news about the capture of this settlement came as a pleasant surprise to information resources. A new ledge has formed on the map, now towards Seversk.▪️ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), fighting continues on the northern outskirts of New York (Novgorod), in the Nelepovka area and for the western part of Druzhba. In Toretsk, shooting battles continue for blocks of multi-storey buildings in the central part of the city. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction they report the ongoing coverage of Tsukurino. Our troops advanced north of the village. crossing the railway. To the south, our troops took the waste heap of mine No. 40, which is a significant height. ▪️ Fighting continues in the Kurakhovsky direction near Katerinovka (Ekaterinivka). To the south we are clearing out Ugledar, regrouping and replenishing our troops. ▪️ In the Belgorod region at night over the city of Stary Oskol, our air defense system worked - a UAV was shot down, a woman was wounded. Earlier, in the village of Yasnye Zori, a drone attacked a car, injuring a man. In the evening, Yasnye Zori, Belgorod region, came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, hitting an agricultural enterprise. One person was killed and 13 workers were injured. On the Belgorod-Shebekino-Volokonovka highway section, two FPV drones attacked two trucks moving along the road, one driver was killed, the second was injured. In the village of Krapivnoye, Shebekinsky urban district, a civilian was killed and four civilians were wounded, including two children. In the Belgorod region in the village of Cheremoshnoye yesterday morning, a truck was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, the driver was injured.▪️ In the DPR, in Gorlovka, when an IED was dropped from an Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV onto an official vehicle, employees of the DPR State Unitary Enterprise - Donbass Water - - men born in 1971 and 1978 - were injured. Also, as a result of the use of cannon artillery by the enemy, a woman born in 1945 was injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Kursk region, footage of UkropHunter: The 51st Guards Parachute Regiment of the Russian Airborne Forces is photographed against the background of captured soldiers of the 47th separate mechanized brigade of the Airborne Forces two majors

Title: 🖼 🇳🇱🇹🇷🇹🇷 As a bonus, we can add that employees took part i...
Description: 🇳🇱🇹🇷🇹🇷 As a bonus, we can add that the meeting was attended by employees of the Dutch company MipMap Techmologies, which also deals with digital 3D mapping. The headquarters of this structure is located in the Netherlands, but offices are represented in various countries, including the USA and Turkey. And the sponsors are the World Bank and the American Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). With their help, the Organization of Turkic States will be able to visualize all the information received from the participating countries and create a full-fledged GIS system with all the details. In the context of the increasing transformation of the OTG into a supranational military-political bloc this change can seriously simplify the interaction between members of the organization. #Netherlands #OTG #Türkiye@rybar Support us

Title: 🇹🇷🇹🇷 Yesterday a very unusual, at first glance, meeting of th...
Description: 🇹🇷🇹🇷 Yesterday in Ankara a very unusual, at first glance, meeting of the Organization of Turkic States took place - the 1st meeting of the heads of cartographic institutions of the OTG. As a result, a declaration was adopted, according to which a single map of the Turkic world will be created, as well as a working group of representatives of civil and military cartographic institutions. It would seem that there is nothing special about the exchange of cartographic information and the expansion of cooperation in this area. However, if you think carefully, thanks to such accurate data you can obtain a huge array of important information. This includes, for example, key transport arteries, large mineral deposits, terrain, and key government facilities. As well as military institutions, military units and other information of interest.📌 That is, in the OTG (and, therefore, in Turkey and the UK), there will be all the necessary information about each member of the organization, down to 3D maps of the area. Such data, as is easy to see, is used by Western countries when planning attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Russian territories. So, increased attention should be paid to these meetings with the participation of military cartographers from the OTG member countries, which will now be held regularly.#OTG #Türkiye@rybar Support us

Title: 🔁🖼 Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024 from the Children of Arbat. Colonel General Yevkurov A man who has been through many difficult political vicissitudes, but always emerged victorious. In the fall of this year, unexpectedly for everyone, he formed the most unobvious tandem, which not only brought a lot of new things into the organization of border defense work, but also largely changed the balance of forces in the military bloc of the Ministry of Defense. Evkurov began to be interested in the work of cover groups in the border region long before the Kursk events. During one of his working trips to Bryansk, he met with the commander of the cover group and also his old acquaintance from the Purvo Military District, Major General Zolotukhin. They were never friends, even in those years when Zolotukhin was the deputy chief of the district, and Yevkurov was the deputy chief of intelligence. They did not become friends later, when Zolotukhin became the leading combatant of the Western Military District, and Evkurov became the ZMO, but everything changed in July-August of this year. In the shortest possible time, taking into account the change in the disposition in the regions, it was necessary to build work with the regional governors, build interaction between security agencies and border departments, and also balance the created border security council, which Yunus-Bek Evkurov quickly dealt with. It is generally accepted to say that Evkurov today does not belong to any group and keeps to himself, which of course cannot but affect the attitude of a number of other high-ranking bosses towards him and therefore he needs support from below. Having taken one call sign between them, Evkurov and Zolotukhin managed to find a common language, which was a discovery for the old Moscow commanders and largely predetermined the further development of events: even after the Rostov events of June 2023, it became clear that Yevkurov had something to say and therefore he would play an important role in the upcoming transformation of the General Staff. Major General Zolotukhin He has no authority and does not tolerate rudeness towards himself. Most likely, under other equal circumstances, he would have long been a big boss, but his freedom-loving character openly irritates those whom he remembers as simple colonels. Vladimir Zolotukhin was among the first who, as the commander of the cover group, signaled the build-up of the enemy group in the border area. With the start of active hostilities in August, realizing that units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine could go on the offensive in the sector entrusted to him, he began to act forward: at that time, the construction of a third echelon of defense was already actively underway in the Bryansk region, but this was not enough, it was important to show the enemy intentions, and most importantly, multiple superiority in forces. To this end, having kicked out the old shielded 62s from the posts, Zolotukhin began to nightmare the gray zone, with his entire appearance showing the enemy not only his readiness to repel the attack, but also to engage in a counter battle, pushing forward the advanced units of the first echelon against the forces moving in the direction Rylsk. The Bryansk region today remains the calmest border region, and Zolotukhin himself was already publicly buried by the enemy twice during the Northern Military District. The commander himself is unlikely to seriously think about any career prospects, preferring to remain the boss in his place, but it seems that the current situational tandem can have far-reaching consequences for each of its participants. High-resolution art @arbat

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Ukrainian formations regularly carry out strikes usin...

Today, as a result of enemy actions, at least three civilians were killed, and another 19 people received various injuries. In the village of Yasnye Zori, artillery shelling hit the territory of a local agricultural enterprise. One person was killed and 13 civilians were injured. On the road between Belgorod and Shebekino, Ukrainian Armed Forces drones attacked two trucks, killing one of the drivers and wounding the second man. Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the airborne exercises of the USA and Japan The...
Description: 🇺🇸🇯🇵 About US and Japanese airborne exercises Japan's Self-Defense Forces continue to conduct exercises with military personnel of other countries. Literally a week after the end of the Japanese-French training, a new activity was launched aimed at practicing airborne operations. According to an official announcement from the Japanese military, it plans to use US Air Force aircraft to improve the tactical skills needed to conduct airborne landings and increase the level of cooperation between the parties. The main goal of the training is to develop an effective response to various situations, including an attack on remote Japanese islands. This is the third time such exercises have been held this year; the last one took place in August. 📌 As can be seen, amid increasing tensions in the Asia-Pacific region, Japan continues to strengthen its defense capabilities through active cooperation with the US military. It is also important to note that the exercises demonstrate the Japanese desire to respond to potential threats from China. Indeed, in the event of a hypothetical outbreak of conflict in the Taiwan Strait, Japanese territories located near the island also risk coming under attack. High resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🖇 On Monday, a statement was published on the resources of t...
Description: 🇷🇺🖇 On Monday, on the resources of the Kommersant Publishing House, a statement was published by the editor-in-chief of the newspaper, Mikhail Lukin, regarding our article, where many uncomfortable questions were asked about the nature of Elena Chernenko’s contacts with British intelligence. In Lukin’s statement, it was stated in a boorish manner that bloggers , unable to compose a text longer than 15 lines, wrote a denunciation against his subordinate. At the same time, the authors, according to him, allegedly demonstrated ignorance of the basics of journalistic and operational work. 📌 Therefore, we consider it important to state the following: ▪️ Rybar’s team conducted its own investigation using open sources and information provided to journalists of federal Russian media by the Central Election Commission of the FSB of Russia. ▪️ Working with information, first published on September 13, was reflected in a series of articles involving several journalists, oppositionists and public figures. ▪️We believe that Russian counterintelligence understands perfectly well what journalistic activity is, and they would hardly demonstrate operational materials regarding ordinary correspondents performing their official duties. However, the public (including on the main television channels of the country) was shown footage of a meeting with a British intelligence officer of this particular woman.🔻In this regard, we would like to ask the editor-in-chief of Kommersant a few questions.➖Why is it not Elena Chernenko herself who answers, but Mikhail Lukin?➖ Are Kommersant 100% sure that Chernenko’s meetings with Christopher Joyce are part of journalistic duties (or maybe an editorial assignment?), or is there something the publication doesn’t know? Elena Chernenko was generally asked about the content of the meetings or in the newspaper in absentia decided to take the line of justification?➖What will the editors do if it suddenly turns out that the journalist handed over to the enemy information entrusted to her during meetings of our government structures, highlighted the people the enemy needed and helped to reach them? Will the ID still protect such a person after such information? Or is the high rank of a journalist and a reputable publication a universal cover in any situation?➖According to Lukin, Chernenko is a highly professional journalist, and in journalism they understand perfectly well what the work of an intelligence officer is. That is, based on logic, she should have perfectly understood who she was communicating with, where the information provided could go, and what consequences this could lead to for people. Taking into account this entire list of questions, we come to the main thing: why Elena Chernenko has not yet come out from the shadows and did not tell the public about the content of the meetings? Was it an interview she conducted with an Englishman (if that was it, where are the articles?), or did he interview her, carefully recording the information he provided? We are absolutely convinced that the results of the investigations into the British spy scandal are public information and sweeping it under the rug, guided by the notorious shop-floor solidarity, means devaluing the work done and playing along with Russia’s opponents. You can get acquainted with materials on this topic by following the links:➖About British spies in Russia and the intelligence activities of the British Foreign Office➖About the propaganda department of the British Foreign Office➖Evidence for the British Foreign Office➖How Russian NGOs lobbied for migration with money from the British Foreign Office➖What unites the journalist -Kommersant- and representatives of Mi-6? To be continued. #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramKommersant On September 20 and 29, the Telegram channel -Rybar- (1.3 million subscribers) and the website of the same name published a series of anonymous articles dedicated to Kommersant special correspondent Elena Chernenko. The anonymous author of the articles focuses on the contacts of the journalist - Kommersant - international department...

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 What kind of wooden crap is that NATO secretaries general ...
Description: Forwarded From Topics. The main thing (GlavMedia) What kind of wooden crap is that NATO secretaries general pass on to each other - they ask on social networks. This is the so-called NATO hammer, a smaller copy of the Viking hammer. It was transferred to the alliance by Iceland in 1963 and is considered a visual reflection of the alliance’s right to judge, punish and the embodiment of indomitable power. This gavel is used at special meetings and special sessions of NATO - for example, according to former participants in such meetings, it was with it that the secretaries general of the Alliance knocked after -sentencing- Yugoslavia and Libya. In a letter leaked to Wikileaks, one of the Western diplomats reasoned - probably one day he will knock about (an attack on) Russia. Also, for some reason, the former head of NATO took this hammer to a meeting with... Russian journalists. Stoltenberg, who had recently left office, handed over this hammer - for special matters - to the new head of NATO - Rygge, who immediately used it. Iceland (the birthplace of the Althing - the great-grandfather of all parliaments) donated the same chairman's gavel to the UN in 1962. It differs only in the engraved phrase - The world must be built on the basis of laws - (we know this - a world based on rules -, thank you). The blow of the gavel announces the beginning of the meeting and its end, the approval of the agenda, the election of officials, the adoption of a resolution. And the UN gavel broke when the former chairman of the General Assembly broke it - trying to calm down Khrushchev, who had gone into a rage with his shoe, by knocking. In 2005, it turned out that the gavel of the UN chairman had disappeared - a copy of it is now in use, the original has not yet been found. During excursions around the UN, you can hear a story that at that time the UN was discussing the -Gypsy issue-, but there is no official confirmation of this. However, Russia has its own miracle hammer. More precisely - a fucking sized sledgehammer (not a fake!), which is always located in the central control center of the Strategic Missile Forces - to guarantee missile launches -. Video is too big

Title: 🇺🇸🏴 In the West, they haven’t talked about the threat of ISIS ...
Description: 🇺🇸🏴 The West hasn’t talked about the IS threat to the whole world for a long time, so they decided to remind about it in the USA. Thus, in the United States, a ministerial meeting was held on the problem of the Islamic State, at which Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke. In his speech, he emphasized the importance of international cooperation in the fight against terrorism and noted the successful work of the coalition against the Islamic State, which has grown from 12 to 87 countries. At the end of the speech, the Secretary of State announced the allocation of $148 million for operations in Africa, as well as $168 million for reconstruction in Iraq and Syria. The event as a whole shows how Americans are working to achieve their interests. They themselves created the problem (IS), they themselves set out to solve it, and now they themselves are reviving it again. By the way, in his speech Blinken also mentioned the assassination of Hassan Nasrallah, saying that this will bring peace to the region. Apparently, he forgot what an important role Hezbollah played in the destruction of ISIS in Syria in 2014-2017. And the words about the allocation of money, of course, may sound good in the media, but the amounts mentioned are simply meager in comparison with the destruction that they brought behind the USA and the extremist animals they created.#USA #terrorism@rybar Support usUnited States Department of StateSecretary Antony J. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺 We, of course, have already complained many times in vari...
Description: 🇷🇺 We, of course, have complained many times in various conversations about the need for Russian business to be more actively involved in the political agenda and take into account new realities, but we thought that everything would be limited to payments for knocked-out Leopards and Abrams. We are of course curious how exactly CaseGuru will monitor the political preferences of its clients and how the FAS will look at such measures. But the very fact of the appearance of such restrictions on the Russian electronics market looks like a precedent. It’s even more interesting whether this case will become the beginning of a flash mob for other companies that might want to hype in the same way. We'll find out soon.#Russia @rybarSupport us

Title: 🇰🇿⚛️ On Sunday in Kazakhstan there will be a vote on the constr...
Description: 🇰🇿⚛️ On Sunday, a vote will be held in Kazakhstan on the construction of a nuclear power plant. At the same time, as we said earlier, we are not talking about one nuclear power plant, but about the development of the industry as a whole, since Kazakhstan will need two or three stations in different regions of the country in the future.▪️The campaign period passed quietly and calmly. Supporters of the construction of the nuclear power plant formed a people's headquarters and held events in different regions of the country. The number of supporters of the construction of a nuclear power plant has grown to 72.9%, the turnout should be more than 60% of voters.▪️However, this blissful picture is spoiled by one circumstance. All protest activity was concentrated on social networks and pro-Western Internet sites. Title: 🖼 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: the beginning of the IDF g...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 Lebanese-Israeli border: the beginning of the IDF ground operationSituation as of 16:00 October 2, 2024 In recent days, the situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border has significantly worsened - the reason was the announcement by the Israeli command of the ground phase of the operation - Arrows of the North -. Then there was no rapid advance by the IDF, and the media reported information about exchanges of fire in the border zone. However, today for the first time there was confirmation of Israeli units crossing the Lebanese border - they entered the settlements of Al-Adisa and Maroun al-Ras. The battles in these settlements were confirmed by Hezbollah representatives, although they focused on the significant losses of the Israelis. ▪️The day before, the 36th division of the Israel Defense Forces was deployed to the Lebanese-Israeli border, which includes the 1st Golani infantry brigade and the 188th armored brigade, previously involved in combat operations in the Gaza Strip. At the moment, forces of 98 and 36 divisions are operating near the border with Lebanon, while units of the 162 division are located in the border - Philadelphia corridor - in the south of the Palestinian enclave. Units of another reserve division (252) are located in the Netzarim corridor. ▪️Yesterday, the IDF press service called on civilians to evacuate from more than 20 settlements in Lebanon, located both near the border and on the Mediterranean coast. It is noteworthy that Marun al-Ras fell into the evacuation zone, but Al-Adisa did not. ▪️Throughout the night and morning, the Israelis attacked the border and rear settlements of Lebanon. More than ten hits hit the southern suburbs of Beirut, where two communication stations were destroyed.▪️In the afternoon, confirmation of the presence of members of the Egoz unit in the settlements of Maroun al-Ras and Al-Adisa appeared. Hezbollah fighters responded with ambushes, incursions and missile launches at nearby IDF targets. At the same time, the Israeli media published information about the outbreak of a shootout in southern Lebanon, which resulted in the death of two IDF fighters. The incident was commented differently in Arabic-language media, reporting a successful ambush, which allegedly wounded 35 Israelis. This information has not been officially confirmed; indirect evidence of this is the footage of eyewitnesses who filmed the evacuation of wounded military personnel by helicopter and the same statements by the IDF press service about the death of two IDF fighters during an operation in southern Lebanon. 🔻And although the incident with the successful ambush instilled in the Arabic-language media some confidence in the positive outcome of the conflict with the Israelis, such statements, to put it mildly, are very premature: one successful ambush is just a drop in the ocean. Moreover, against the backdrop of the absolute superiority of the Israelis in the air, numbers and the quality of weapons, as well as heavy losses of Hezbollah command personnel as a result of previous Israeli operations. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Moreover, a considerable part of these operating enterprises of the Ukrainian military-industrial complex are located not even in the deep rear somewhere in the western regions, but in large front-line cities at a relatively short distance from the LBS. In Kharkov, since the beginning of the Northern Military District, they have been producing all kinds of components for UAVs and missiles, including electronics. Armored vehicles and aircraft are repaired in Nikolaev. Well, in occupied Zaporozhye they are producing aircraft engines with all their might.🔻That is, if the same factories in Kyiv or production exported to Transcarpathia can only be reached with cruise and aeroballistic missiles, then enterprises like Motor Sich or Kommunara are in the affected area not only OTRK, but also in some places even new aerial bombs with UMPC. But there has been no systematic fire attack on these objects since the beginning of the Northeast Military District. From time to time they became targets of the Russian Armed Forces, but the attacks were most often single and greatly extended in time, which allowed the enemy to repair the damage and continue working. Yes, it is not easy to destroy them, but a one-time large salvo of missiles at key workshops of a particular enterprise will solve this problem. The effect will not be long in coming: for example, in past years, one very good raid had previously significantly slowed down Ukrainian developments in the field of missile technology. However, for a combination of reasons, priority in systematic massive strikes is now apparently given to other objects in the territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. Although everything can change.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramCall sign Bruce📌The Ukrainian Defense Minister said that next year or by the end of this year Kyiv will present an -extensive missile program-. Title: 🇺🇸 About the results of the debates of candidates for vice pres...
Description: 🇺🇸 About the results of the debates of candidates for vice-presidential candidates of the United States In the States, important debates of candidates for vice-presidential candidates, Republican J.D. Vance and Democrat Tim Walz, have ended. The meeting, which took place on CBS, was very different from similar events involving Trump, Biden and Harris: to everyone’s amazement, both speakers demonstrated a high level of political culture and competence on many pressing issues. ▪️J.D. Vance was very confident and cultured - he did not interrupt his opponent , skillfully parried his attacks, competently attacked and skillfully handled the facts. Years of work as a lawyer taught him to behave well and maintain composure while delivering a speech, so the politician never misspoke or hesitated. Importantly, Vance demonstrated a high level of awareness of current American economic indicators. In doing so, he made a significant contribution to winning over Trump's undecided voters who were concerned about their wallets. He also prevented the host from casting doubt on the migrant crisis in Springfield, Ohio, by citing statistics showing that illegal immigrants had become illegal overnight. make up 25% of the city's population. The answer turned out to be so inconvenient for the presenters sympathetic to the Democrats that the politician was turned off.▪️Tim Walz, against the backdrop of Kamala Harris’ speech, showed himself clearly better - he defended himself well, was well versed in the pressing problems for the United States, and treated his opponent with respect, without making mocking faces and without throwing disdainful glances. And yet, the politician often repeated memorized theses, resorted to populism and had difficulty adapting on the fly, which ultimately played a cruel joke on him. Thus, he confused Iran and Israel, blurted out that he had good relations with many school shooters. . Walz also noticeably swam when he was reminded of his own lie about being in China during the events in Tiananmen Square: he could not get out of it, giving an incoherent speech about his childhood in Nebraska.🔻As a result of the event, the entire American press recognized that the debate was outstanding - like in the good old 60s. Few people doubted Vance’s victory—even the pro-democracy CNN recognized his triumph, albeit with the caveat that it would not have a significant impact on the results of the presidential election. However, here CNN is clearly disingenuous—even though the debate discredited the previous confrontation between Trump and Harris, which was quite primitive and downright radiated mutual hatred and disdain, Vance brought the necessary composure, civility and the highest level of competence on all issues to the Trump campaign. #USA@rybar with @usaperiodicalSupport usCNNTakeaways from the vice presidential debate between Vance and Walz | CNN PoliticsThe vice presidential debate between Ohio Sen. JD Vance and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz was something that’s becoming increasingly rare in modern American politics: Normal.

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the secret operations of the Israelis in the ...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 About Israeli secret operations in southern Lebanon Yesterday, the Israeli command announced that in recent months, IDF units have conducted several dozen raids in the border area of ​​southern Lebanon, where they discovered caches of weapons and underground structures allegedly created by Hezbollah to invade northern Israel. The Israelis confirmed their words with footage from operations in Aita al-Shaab, Kafr Kil and Mays al-Jabal. The footage shows how IDF fighters enter the underground structures of the Lebanese group, where they discover neatly stacked weapons and ammunition, as well as a fairly extensive network of tunnels. All this reinforces the general message of the statements of the Israeli command - Hezbollah planned to attack Israel like the invasion of Hamas militants on October 7, 2023, thereby implementing a certain plan for the occupation of the Galilee. So that the listeners are left with no questions, they are told what would await them if it were implemented - - the massacre of innocent men, women and children -. And everything would be fine, but an attentive viewer should have questions, the general essence of which will boil down to misunderstanding the absence in the video materials of clashes with the Lebanese group during the capture of such important objects. If they were empty, then why were they abandoned and why leave weapons and ammunition there in that case? Be that as it may, the Israelis are once again trying to play their favorite card with the status of a victim, this time only a potential one. This, among other things, justifies the current operation - Arrows of the North - as a result of which the number of dead and injured amounts to thousands of Lebanese. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

In addition, Soros is a financial -megadonor- of the US Democratic Party and, according to open data, donated through organizations controlled by him to Democrats' electoral needs in 2024 are at least $15.6 million. Title: 🖼 🇦🇫🇹🇯🏴 About possible sabotage on the border of Tajikistan...
Description: 🇦🇫🇹🇯🏴 About possible sabotage on the border of Tajikistan and Afghanistan Interesting news comes from Tajikistan: from September 24 to October 15, along the border section with the provinces of Badakhshan and Takhar in Afghanistan, a maximum danger regime has been introduced, which is why vacations have been canceled for personnel. The reason This was prompted by information received about the activity of militants - Jamaat Ansarullah - in the north of Takhar province. In mid-September, a group of extremists arrived in the Navabad area and have already carried out reconnaissance at the border posts of Ai-Khanum and Kaflotun. The militants, Jamaat Ansarullah, intend to conduct a similar assessment of vulnerabilities in the security system of border areas at the border crossing of Hamadoni in Khatlon province in the next few days. Against this background, the Tajik authorities have strengthened control over the border, established additional patrols, organized drone surveillance and limited foot traffic between the countries. A very non-trivial turn considering recent years, when the Taliban movement came to power in Afghanistan. From that moment on, such events practically stopped happening. But in this case we are talking about Jamaat Ansarullah, a group that has long been trying to destabilize the situation in Tajikistan, and its militants previously took refuge in Afghanistan before 2021. Although the leadership of the Taliban announced the destruction of terrorism, individual cells continue to function on the territory of the country, and given the difficult situation inside Afghanistan, there is no escape from them yet. In addition, it is worth remembering the currently popular trends about the danger of IS and other terrorist groups for the countries of Central Asia. -An unexpected attack by militants in the border area could serve as another reason for the United States and allies to lobby for their services in the region. High resolution mapEnglish version#Afghanistan #Tajikistan #terrorism@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇲🇽🇱🇹🚬Those who are interested in the situation with smugg...
Description: Forwarded From Sex, cartels, Frida Kahlo🇲🇽🇱🇹🚬Those who are interested in the state of affairs with smuggling in the American borderlands know very well that the precipitation differs from location to location: somewhere it is in the form of meatballs, somewhere it is cocaine, and in some places cigarettes are in particular demand. Colleagues wrote about how, for many years now, various types of flying objects have been penetrating Lithuanian territory and are being used by smugglers to deliver cigarettes to the desired address. Strictly speaking, cigarettes are very popular both in Lithuania and neighboring Latvia - at one time it was considered good manners to grab a block as a gift, since you were traveling from Russia or Belarus. Then this block could even reach Ireland - along with a large number of Baltic citizens working there. Strictly speaking, there is no sensation in the topic. If we talk about the methods of delivering contraband, they have been diverse since ancient times and are constantly evolving - otherwise this craft would have died out long ago. We also observed the air delivery of prohibited goods on the US-Mexico border - I don’t remember them being shot down there, there are simply patrolled points where the goods can be picked up from the ground faster than the customer. And the border there is bare, unlike Lithuania, surrounded by forests, where it is much easier to go to one of the residents of border villages who sell smoke with much less risk. As for the story about the scandal among Lithuanian officials on the topic of who will deal with the problem, two facts are overlooked: Some of the local officials are clearly involved in smuggling (including cigarettes), without the participation of border services, separate episodes they don't roll. 🔸In two weeks, elections to the Lithuanian Seimas are due to take place, against the backdrop of which the political situation in any country is worsening, shifting responsibility onto each other and other delights begin, designed to highlight the shortcomings of the characters, which theoretically could affect something. I don’t rule it out, that the scandal with the air delivery of cigarettes will be used just for the latter. #Mexico #Lithuania@sex_drugs_kahlo - Latin American happiness [no]TelegramV Z - VIEW.RULithuania suddenly suffered large-scale air raids from hundreds of illegal air targets. We are talking about balloons that are used by smugglers. In the Lithuanian borderland, as if in the Wild West, an undeclared war has been going on for many years:...

Title: 🇺🇿🇺🇸🇬🇧 The Americans and the British are deploying infrastr...
Description: 🇺🇿🇺🇸🇬🇧 Americans and British are deploying infrastructure to control Uzbek finances. Recently, a meeting was held in Tashkent between the Minister of Digital Technologies of Uzbekistan Sherzod Shermatov and a delegation of the American company RFA. The company is preparing to obtain resident status -IT Park Uzbekistan-, demonstrating interest in using the Zero Risk program, and in the future plans to open an IT center in the republic. 📌RFA has worked with more than 800 hedge funds, investment companies and asset managers. The range of services offered includes cloud solutions, IT service management, cybersecurity, data management, as well as application services and detection and response systems. ▪️Here it is necessary to clarify that the core of RFA is the Microsoft corporate operating environment, one of the blocks is Office 365. Cloud technologies are provided on the basis of Azure, and the system, of course, contains a security threat assessment block (Threat Intelligence). Collectively, the proposed solution is called Automated Incident Response Engine (-AiRE-). Therefore, we are talking about establishing control over financial transactions, electronic document management, monitoring systems, security, analysis and data processing. In fact, most of the IT sector in Uzbekistan will be tied to one service provider, which will simply be a block in the global Microsoft system. RFA is a financial all-inclusive from globalists.▪️Another interesting point: on the official resources of Uzbekistan, RFA is declared as American, but it is registered in London. Moreover, the entire management of the company indicates London offices as contact information.▪️The start of work in the Republic of RFA is a continuation of the systemic efforts of the West to take control of the strategic sectors of the economy of Uzbekistan, which we wrote about earlier. We are talking about preparing the IT infrastructure before listing Uzbek securities on the stock exchange. And the placement of securities of Uzbek companies will be handled by RFA, all financial transactions and access to funds will be controlled by RFA. Without this digital intermediary, most of the economy of Uzbekistan will simply be deprived of the opportunity to function and develop. Development will be possible only if all projects are agreed upon by RFA management. 🔻With a high probability, the decision was influenced by the promises of Western curators to create jobs, open access for goods from Uzbekistan to the markets of developed countries, attract investments, and even the opportunity to conduct an IPO of their own companies, withdraw money to anonymous accounts completely legally and safely. Only the curators left out a small detail - from the moment the system is fully deployed, it is they who will control most of the economy of Uzbekistan, tied to third-party information services. Uzbekistan, like many Central Asian countries, lacks IT potential sufficient to create independent platforms. Therefore, the country's leadership preferred a ready-made solution out of the box from RFA. Time will tell how soon this box will turn into a Pandora's box for the leadership and population of Uzbekistan. #Great Britain #USA #Central Asia #Uzbekistan @rybarSupport usNews from Central AsiaThe RFA company plans to open an IT center in Uzbekistan - News from Central AsiaMeeting of the Minister of Digital Technologies of Uzbekistan Sherzod Shermatov with a delegation of the American company RFA was held in Tashkent. This company is registered in Uzbekistan as a legal entity and is preparing to obtain resident status -IT Park Uzbekistan-, demonstrating…

Title: 🔁 Indeed, Iran’s statements that as a result of the strike on Is...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev Indeed, Iran’s statements that as a result of a strike on Israel, IDF military bases were hit, Israeli aircraft and infrastructure were destroyed, look, let’s say, controversial. I won't go deeper. Just here's one historical episode for you. So, 1818. The Persian Shah Abbas Mirza writes to the Russian ambassador in Tehran, General Ermolov (yes, the one who fought in the Caucasus) about his victories over the Afghans. The Persian-Afghan war was just going on. -Our victorious troops are always protected by the cavalry regiments of the heavenly forces, and therefore the actions of the enemy on the battlefield have the same power against us as the stars of heaven against the rising sun. Our flaming sword, aimed at defeating the enemy, is lightning, burning everything. From the dust carried by our invincible cavalry, the battlefield became so dark that if the fire opened by the sarbaz had not illuminated it, the arrows that took life would not have found a way to pierce the enemy’s hearts. The battle lasted for five hours, and the combatants could not distinguish between white and black. Finally, at sunset, from the fire of the cannons crushing the Caucasus Mountains, the foundation of the enemy troops was destroyed, and the unfortunate banner of the enemy was overthrown. Ermolov, of course, knew perfectly well how everything really was there. But it was completely the opposite. Ermolov reported the following to the Russian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Count Nesselrode: -The Khorosans, together with the Afghans, defeated the Persian troops, and the damage was terrible. The commander of them bought his head with a large sum of money, and the Shah, although he continued to command the troops, but, having gathered large forces, himself went to the enemy. The inhabitants of Tehran believe, however, that he will not go far, fearing that the slightest failure under his own leadership will make a bad impression among the people. Despite the failure, however, false news of victories is announced and celebrations are celebrated. Now Iranian statements are somewhat reminiscent of a letter about a flaming sword. Although, in fairness, it is worth noting that even if some important targets were hit in Israel, no one will ever know about it. Israeli media, bloggers, LOMs, are extremely disciplined in this sense. https://t.me/vysokygovorit/17510Telegram Older than the Edda In assessing Iran’s evening strike on Israel, I probably trust Israeli data more. Iran, of course, did not destroy any 20 F-35 aircraft (as Iranian news agencies stated), even simply because the Israeli General Staff is no fool and naturally...

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of October 2, 2024 ▪️ The main event ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of October 2, 2024▪️ The main event of the past day was the liberation of Ugledar, heavy and sometimes tragic battles for which lasted more than a year. The surrounding area still needs to be cleaned up. At the same time, enemy channels report that our troops have come close to Ekaterinivka from the south, and are also beginning to prepare a strike in the direction of Novoukrainka and Bogoyavlenka. The latter, according to the Russian Armed Forces, will have to break the powerful Ukrainian defense line. ▪️ In the Kursk region, the North group of troops reports, the most active military operations took place in the south of the Sudzhansky district, where our troops continue to squeeze the Ukrainian Armed Forces out of the settlement area. Plekhovo (the settlement itself is still behind the enemy). On the Korenevsky sector of the front there are also advances in the forest. On the section of the state border in the Glushkovsky district, the enemy did not take active actions, but carried out regrouping and replacement of losses.▪️ Fierce fighting is taking place in the Kharkov direction in the settlement. Volchansk. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to increase the size of the group on the right bank of the river. Volchya.▪️ In the south of the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Ministry of Defense unexpectedly announced the liberation of the settlement from the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Cherry, Kharkov region. Previously, the offensive went north and south. Apparently, a new ledge of the front is being formed.▪️ In the Krasnolimansky direction, our troops are advancing from Makeyevka to a forest plantation located to the west.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces have gained a foothold in the southeastern part of Tsukurino and occupied a mine located to the southeast. Clashes continue in the Nikolaevka area, north and west of Novogrodovka and north of Selidovo.▪️ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ facilities in Orekhovo and Zaporozhye are destroyed every day by our aviation and rocket artillery. The enemy is hiding in urban areas. The civilian population on the Ukrainian side should think about how to leave the front-line zone, or find shelters with a supply of food and medicine.▪️ The Belgorod region continues to suffer from terrorist attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The enemy attacked the village of Tishanka, Volokonovsky district, with an FPV drone, wounding two civilians. Earlier, Tishanka came under artillery fire. Yesterday morning, our air defense system went off over the Belgorod region - an aircraft-type drone was shot down. There were no casualties. In the village of Dubovoe, the façade of a commercial building was damaged.▪️ In the DPR, in Gorlovka, a man born in 1957 was injured as a result of a cluster artillery strike. They also write about the victim, a man born in 1975. when dropping an explosive object from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Ugledar STORM detachment. The 40th Separate Guards Marine Brigade captured a block of high-rise buildings on the western side of Ugledar. For the first time, the vest is raised, which is considered a symbol of the courage and bravery of the Pacific warrior.✨GLORY TO THE FAR EASTERN WARRIORS!!!…

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for October 1, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched another series of attacks, including hits on public buildings where refugees lived. And in the south of the enclave there were clashes again east of Al-Fokhari. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out operations in at least ten localities in the region, detaining suspects with links to Hamas. Violent clashes took place in Nablus, where four IDF fighters were wounded. The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border has further deteriorated as the Israelis announced the ground phase of the operation. Nevertheless, so far everything is limited to skirmishes along the border and strikes by the sides on each other’s targets. During the night, Iran launched about 200 ballistic missiles into Israel. Most of them were intercepted by air defense systems, the rest mostly fell in vacant lots. At the same time, preparations are being made for a retaliatory attack by the IDF. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine # report@rybarSupport us

Title: ❗️🇮🇱🇮🇷 Interim results of Iran's strike on Israel Two months ...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇮🇷 Interim results of Iran's attack on Israel Two months after the assassination of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh and four days after the death of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah, the Iranians decided on the promised massive attack on Israel. ▪️According to recent estimates, about 200 ballistic missiles were fired into the country, but a significant number were intercepted by Israeli air defense systems. At the same time, American air defense systems were also involved in repelling the attack. ▪️Videos were distributed on the Internet that confirmed hits in individual areas, but at the moment the list of military targets hit is unknown. According to the footage, it is much more likely that the main place where the missiles will fall is wasteland. Although video footage of the aftermath of the strikes has already begun to appear in the media, Israeli censorship works well enough that only fallen debris or destruction of civilian objects leaks onto the Internet. ▪️Nevertheless, statements about the effectiveness of the raid are circulated in Arabic-language and Iranian media. Fars observers claim that at least 80% of the missiles reached their targets, and Shafaqna reported that at least 20 Israeli F-35s were destroyed. Another target was allegedly a cluster of tanks near the Netzarim intersection in the center of the Gaza Strip.▪️At least several rockets fell in the West Bank - one of them killed one and injured seven local Palestinians. Two more Israelis were wounded by shrapnel in Tel Aviv. There are also reports of victims who were injured on the way to bomb shelters. ▪️The Iranian attack could have been significantly more effective in the event of simultaneous launches also from Lebanon and the Gaza Strip, but this did not happen. ▪️All sorts of fakes have circulated on the Internet, including reverse footage of air defense missile launches, posing as arrival footage, and even the arrival of a Ukrainian UAV in Moscow City. ▪️It is noteworthy that literally before the Iranian attack in Tel Aviv, there was a terrorist attack in the Jaffa area: there, two men with machine guns shot people on a tram, after which they opened fire on passers-by. According to the latest information, eight people were killed, and the attackers were killed by Israeli security forces. Against the backdrop of the incident with the missile strike, speculation appeared on the Internet about the connection between both events - allegedly the terrorist attack could have been used as a distraction. However, such a version raises questions rather than trust. 🔻Despite the relatively small amount of information about the consequences of the attack, its overall results are clear and do not differ significantly from the April Iranian raid on Israeli territory. And the point here is that for Iran the main goal was not so much to inflict significant damage, but to create the desired picture for its audience, wounded by the latest actions of the Israelis. At the same time, we must pay tribute: the mostly outdated missiles launched by the Iranians are much cheaper than those spent by Israel and allied missile defense and missile defense systems. So, in economic terms, the attack was beneficial: another question is that this is unlikely to be enough in the current conditions.#Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇲🇱 The situation in northern Mali: an attempt at revenge for...
Description: 🇲🇱 The situation in northern Mali: an attempt at revenge for Tin-Zautin Ambush, staged at the end of July by the so-called separatists. Azawad, with the support of radical Islamists from a group affiliated with Al-Qaeda - Jamaat Nusrat al-Islam wal-Muslimin - caused serious damage to the prestige of both the local armed forces and Russian military instructors.🔻With the goal of still conquering the last major stronghold of militants in northern Mali, government forces have recently stepped up operations in the region. ▪️After the accumulation of forces in the area of ​​the Kidal airport, a column consisting of fifty cars and armored personnel carriers moved towards Tin-Zautin. It is noteworthy that pro-government Tuareg militias also participate in it, who helped develop the route. ▪️At the moment, the convoy passed through the village of Tin Essako, where it stopped briefly due to the fact that militants were spotted at the point. After the latter escaped, the convoy continued moving, reaching the Amshaknshnar Valley.▪️This time, the leadership chose a more competent approach in planning the operation, spending most of the time outside the heights from where they could be detected or behind which militants could hide. In addition, the movement of the columns was preceded by active airstrikes against militants and reconnaissance sorties.❗️The unique case of using mock-ups in African operations also speaks to the quality of preparation. So, the militants, following the convoy, came across a model -Pantsir-S1-, which was considered real.🔻So far, all the observed action gives us hope that past mistakes in underestimating the enemy and overestimating their own capabilities were taken into account, and, given that before the ill-fated There are less than 100 km left of the city, in the coming days we will learn about the results of this operation. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #Mali #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: attack on Selidovo ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: attack on Selidovo and successes of the Russian Armed Forces in the Tsukurino region Situation as of 21:00 October 1, 2024 Russian troops are working to liberate the territories of the Donetsk People's Republic on a front section with a total length of more than 80 kilometers. The most significant advances are recorded both on the northern flanks and southeast of Kurakhovo. ▪️West of Novotoretsk, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces pushed the enemy to the right bank of the Kazenny Torets River, and in the Grodovka area they broke through the defenses of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, occupying two large strongholds. Now the path to Moscow and Mirnograd located behind it is open for the Russian army.▪️To the south, during the battles at the Nikolaevka-Sukhoi Yar line, units of the Russian Armed Forces advanced west of the Novogrodovskaya mine, gaining a foothold in the forest belt on the approaches to Lysovka. According to some reports, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have also lost control over the waste heap of the Novogrodovskaya No. 2 mine, but this information has not yet been confirmed by objective control personnel. ▪️West of Marinovka, an armored group of Russian troops attacked Ukrainian formations along the M-30 highway at the northern entrance to Selidovo. And on the southern outskirts of the city, paratroopers of the Russian Armed Forces landed near the city hospital, where they had not been able to gain a foothold before.▪️ At the same time, Russian troops started fighting on the southern outskirts of Tsukurino and in the area of ​​the St. Basil the Great mine. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces are knocking out the enemy from the forest belts along the railway track, moving from the Selidovskaya mine and launching attacks from Ukrainsk. ▪️To the south, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from positions between Ostry and neighboring Maksimilyanovka, creating the preconditions for reaching the northern outskirts of the latter. At the same time, strikes continue to be launched against the few Ukrainian Armed Forces groups remaining in Ostroy, and unmanned aircraft are systematically destroying enemy equipment and infrastructure facilities in the Kurakhovo area.❗️The situation in the fields west of Nevelskoye has become somewhat clearer, from where no reports have been received for a long time, no frames. And the published statements of certain media about the occupation of this area by fighters of the Russian Armed Forces caused a certain skepticism, especially against the backdrop of the repeated liberation of the settlement in the Network. Nevertheless, in light of the incoming information about the advance of Russian troops in the lowlands near Zhelanny First and the eponymous Second, we can talk about the long-awaited occupation of the fields west of Nevelskoye, albeit with the assumption of a focal presence of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. If you have additions to the situation, you want we highlighted the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kurakhovo #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Israeli air attack on southern Syria We didn’t have...
Description: Rybar: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 New Israeli air raid on Damascus Last night, the Israeli air force from the occupied Golan Heights launched missiles at Damascus. Local residents reported several series of attacks across the city, which began at approximately 02:00. To the Ministry of Defense... 🇮🇱🇸🇾 Israeli aviation attack in southern Syria We had not even finished writing about the night raid on Damascus when the Israelis launched another missile launch in southern Syria, where the target of the attack was aviation facilities and air defense positions in the provinces of Daraa and Es-Suwayda. Judging by reports from the field, the large At-Takala airbase and a rural airfield south of the city of Izra, as well as the positions of Syrian anti-aircraft gunners located in their vicinity, came under fire. Arabic-language media published information about the work of air defense in these areas, however, as a rule, this does not mean the interception of even the majority of the ammunition, especially taking into account, to put it mildly, the battered Syrian air defense and the constant decommissioning of the remaining systems. Apparently, a possible reason for the raid on aviation facilities could have been Iran's supply of ammunition for supported forces, which is not surprising in the context of the unfolding events in southern Lebanon. Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️NATO continues to form new threats to the Black Sea Fleet ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️NATO continues to form new threats to the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian NavyFrom September 10 to 27, the alliance's annual maritime exercises REPMUS 24 took place in the territorial waters of Portugal. The exercises included testing of sea and air unmanned systems during anti-submarine, mine countermeasures and reconnaissance operations. The results of the maneuvers and the best weapons will be used in the NATO anti-submarine barrier concept, which involves the deployment of a network of autonomous vehicles to detect and track the activity of submarines. An interesting point was the active use of Portuguese TEKEVER AR3 and AR5 UAVs for reconnaissance, surveillance and reconnaissance on land as part of these exercises and at sea. For the first time, a new modification of the AR5 was tested, capable of installing sonar buoys, which made it possible to detect and track underwater targets. In addition, the capabilities of radar, cameras and communications have been improved, which has increased the reconnaissance characteristics of TEKEVER drones. Since 2023, this type of UAV has been actively used by the Ukrainian side for reconnaissance of the Black Sea and the Crimean coast. TEKEVER was repeatedly recorded during missile attacks in Crimea, escorting BEC, as well as attacks by Ukrainian DRGs on the peninsula. Now, the new capabilities of the drone will allow the enemy to deploy a network of sonar buoys in the Black Sea and organize tracking of the movement of submarines of the Black Sea Fleet, which are the only ones protected from Ukrainian attacks naval drones.✨While the bureaucratic war of the Black Sea Fleet with orders and instructions is still ongoing, the enemy is improving its weapons and the tactics of their use. Two majors

Title: 🇦🇲🇦🇿🇺🇸 How Armenia is preparing to change the Constitution ...
Description: 🇦🇲🇦🇿🇺🇸 How Armenia is preparing to change the Constitution under pressure from Azerbaijan Last week, the Constitutional Court of Armenia approved the regulation on commissions for the demarcation of the Azerbaijani-Armenian border, recognizing its activities as consistent with the Constitution. ▪️The main issue at the meeting of the Constitutional Court was the applicability of the norms of the Declaration of Independence of Armenia, which in Baku is called the main obstacle to signing peace due to the presence of territorial claims against Azerbaijan. ▪️The Constitutional Court came to the conclusion that if the norms from the Declaration are not directly enshrined in the Constitution, then they have no force.▪️However, the judges of the Constitutional Court left a loophole, pointing out that part of the preamble of the Declaration on the Reunification of the Armenian SSR and Nagorno-Karabakh of 1989 is not canceled and requires further study. ❗️Nevertheless, Armenia took a significant step in disavowing the Declaration of Independence. As the signing of the peace treaty approaches, one should wait for additional decisions of the Constitutional Court, which will actually allow changing the Constitution of Armenia without a referendum and without the adoption of amendments by parliament.▪️It is significant that the decision of the Constitutional Court was on the same days when Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan was in New York and held talks with Turkish President Recep Erdogan. On the same day as the decision of the Constitutional Court, a meeting of the foreign ministers of Armenia and Azerbaijan was also held with the mediation of US Secretary of State Antony Blinken. 🔻The Americans, portraying the role of a mediator in the signing of the Armenian-Azerbaijani peace treaty, are persistently rushing Pashinyan with the constitutional changes that are required in Baku. When an obvious slippage began with the constitutional referendum, which would have delayed the conclusion of peace for another couple of years, the administration of the Armenian Prime Minister, through the mediation of the West, decided to take the path of least resistance, relying on amendments to the Constitutional Court. #Armenia #Azerbaijan #USA @rybarSupport usAnadolu AgencyThe Constitutional Court of Armenia approved the regulation on commissions for the demarcation of the Azerbaijani-Armenian border. The regulation was discussed on Thursday in the Constitutional Court and was recognized as consistent with the Constitution of Armenia

Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Representatives of the Moldovan Congress of Russian Comm...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Representatives of the Moldovan Congress of Russian Communities held a rally on September 30 near the building of the Central Election Commission of Moldova. Protesters demanded the opening of more polling stations in Russia for the presidential elections and referendum on European integration. ▪️The protesters came with posters that read: -CEC, stop following the criminal orders of the authorities-, -Open more polling stations in Russia-, -Maya, are you afraid of the voice of the people?-.▪️Chairman of the Congress of Russian Communities Valery Klimenko said that he would appeal to the President of the Russian Federation, the State Duma and the Federation Council of the Russian Federation with a demand not to recognize the election results if the Central Election Commission of Moldova refuses to open additional polling stations on Russian territory. 📌 Let us remind you that the Central Election Commission of Moldova has radically reduced the number of polling stations in Russia for the upcoming elections and referendum on October 20. Initially, 29 sites were to be opened in the Russian Federation, then the number was reduced to five, and a few days ago - to two. At the same time, the Moldovan authorities are ready to open several dozen sites in European countries. Thus, in Chisinau, the Russian part of the Moldovan diaspora is deprived of the right to vote. #elections #Moldova #protests #Russia @rybarSupport usTelegramMoldavian CarAt the walls of the Central Election Commission there is a protest action of the Congress of Russian Communities. People are unhappy that too few polling stations will be open in Russia for the October 20 elections. They say it infringes on voters' rights. It should be recalled that our diaspora in Russia also...

Title: 🇰🇿🇺🇸 An interesting publication appeared in the American maga...
Description: 🇰🇿🇺🇸 An interesting publication appeared in the American magazine The National Interest about bilateral relations between the United States and Kazakhstan and the need for their calibration.🔻The point is that the authors propose that the American leadership concentrate on several aspects of policy towards the Central Asian republic:➖Non-proliferation of nuclear weapons, that is, from -due to deteriorating relations with Russia, the option of using Kazakhstan as a neutral intermediary in negotiations with the Kremlin is proposed.➖Mining Americans should be more actively involved in the extraction of resources in Kazakhstan, especially rare earth metals, which are necessary for the development of American industry.➖Strengthening trade tiesLeadership The United States needs to establish stronger trade relations with the republic in order to increase the use of transit routes through Kazakhstan, bypassing Russia and China. Recalling the previously concluded agreement on the strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and Great Britain, the United States also decided to designate its zones of influence in Kazakhstan.🔻Using this article as an example It’s clear to see how Kazakhstan is seen in the White House - as a gas station and as a transit station, through which dependence on Russia and China can be reduced. Therefore, the struggle for Kazakhstan is quite understandable, given the country's access to critical resources, such as uranium. #Kazakhstan #USA@rybar Support us The National InterestCalibrating U.S.-Kazakh CooperationU.S. policy toward Kazakhstan should focus primarily on nuclear nonproliferation, rare earth minerals, and enhanced trade routes.

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 New Israeli air raid on Damascus Last night the Israe...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 New Israeli air raid on Damascus Last night, the Israeli Air Force launched missiles at Damascus from the occupied Golan Heights. Local residents reported several series of attacks across the city, which began at approximately 02:00. The SAR Ministry of Defense reported that most of the ammunition had been intercepted. The hits occurred in the western part of the Al-Mezze area, where foreign embassies are located and a military airfield is located. According to footage that appeared on the Internet, at least one of the targets of the attack was a certain car. However, it is currently unknown who was in it. Also killed during the raid was the famous Syrian TV presenter Safaa Ahmed, who lived in a building not far from the struck car. The Arab media have already announced that she died not from a rocket fragment, but from a targeted strike on her apartment (however, why spend a missile on a TV presenter is unclear). Syrian opposition sources also disseminated information about a series of hits on the positions of air defense crews, who tried to repel the attack. However, it is not possible to confirm these statements given the lack of personnel. 🔻So far, Israeli troops have been able to quite successfully combine ongoing operations in the Gaza Strip and southern Lebanon with sporadic strikes on Syria, gradually gaining political points and eliminating everyone who could pose a danger to the ultra-Orthodox government. It is noteworthy that the combination of massive strikes on the same Lebanon, with periodic raids on Syrian territory, allows it to strongly influence public sentiment and use this as leverage on Iran’s positions in both countries. Map in high resolutionEnglish version#Damascus #Israel #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: liberation of Ugledar, adv...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: liberation of Ugledar, advance of the Russian Armed Forces to Katerynivkasituation as of 15:00 on October 1, 2024. The Russian army liberated Ugledar, as evidenced by massively appearing footage of Russian Armed Forces soldiers on the roofs of high-rise buildings and administration with the flags of Russia and Victory banner. Flags are already flying at Molodezhnaya 9 and 10, and at the garage cooperative on the western outskirts of the city at 16 Molodezhnaya there is a Marine Corps vest. In the east and in the center, banners were raised on houses 19, 23 and 25 on 13 Paratroopers Street. The center is occupied by administration buildings and a high-rise building on Trifonova, 26. At the same time, scattered enemy groups may remain in the city; the cleansing has not yet been completed. In addition, there are several places in the city where the local population is hiding; they have yet to be removed. This is not the only area where the advance of the Russian Armed Forces is recorded. At the Katerinovka-Konstantinovka line, Russian attack aircraft advanced north of the Solenenkaya gully, taking several forest belts, and, in fact, reaching the outskirts of Katerinovka. Title: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸 About the current situation on the Lebanese-Israeli bo...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸 About the current situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border Tonight, the Israeli command announced the transition of the operation under the code designation - Arrows of the North - to the ground phase. The operation itself has been going on for a week - previously everything was limited to air raids on Hezbollah targets in both border and rear settlements. However, the expected rapid advance of the Israeli troops did not follow; at the moment, only relatively familiar skirmishes are reported in the border zone, including near the small village of Rmeish, where maneuver groups of Israelis operated at night. At the same time, false information is being spread on the Internet about the entry of IDF units into a particular locality or about the complete withdrawal of Lebanese units beyond the Litani River. However, such reports are refuted by both Israeli and Arabic-language media. At the same time, judging by the increasingly frequent statements by the press service of the Israel Defense Forces about the need for all residents of southern Lebanon to urgently evacuate to the north of the country and remain there until the end of hostilities, the Israeli offensive may begin in the near future after observing the necessary politeness. Moreover, That approval for the ground operation has already been received from the United States - last night, American Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, after a conversation with his Israeli colleague Galant, expressed support for the IDF offensive in southern Lebanon. The stated goal of the operation is the destruction of Hezbollah infrastructure near Israel's northern border. #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar❗️🇮🇱🇱🇧 The IDF launched a limited military ground operation against Hezbollah targets in the border zone of southern Lebanon. Title: 🇺🇸🌏 We would like to slightly add to the comment of our collea...
Description: 🇺🇸🌏 We would like to slightly complement the commentary of colleagues from Systemic Pesticide about the ministerial negotiations -C5+1- with the participation of US Secretary of State Antony Blinken and representatives of Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan.▪️The meeting marks the main directions of US activity in the region: here both critical minerals and the notorious -agenda-, and the fact that there was time for it shows the priority of these issues in the run-up to the elections.▪️The Central Asian leadership is taking the opportunity to compare notes, understanding the importance of coordination right now, when integration processes have intensified in the region. ▪️And for the United States, and specifically for the Democrats, this is an opportunity to -fix profits- on the eve of the presidential elections and present the results of the meeting as a success on the path to containing -Russian aggression-. It is no coincidence that Blinken has already rushed to express support for the independence and territorial integrity of the countries of the region. Regardless of the potential change in the presidential administration, Russia's allies are already hoping for a continuation of the banquet: Foreign Minister of Kazakhstan Mukhtar Tleuberdi proposed holding the next meeting in this format in Astana. And they are unlikely to be mistaken: the -C5+1- format worked calmly during the presidency of Donald Trump, as the Western media kindly recalled following the meeting. #USA #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegram Systemic pesticide🇺🇸🇹🇯🇺🇿🇰🇿🇹🇲🇰 🇬 As part of the regular session of the UN General Assembly, a ministerial meeting of the -C5+1- format was held with the participation of US Secretary of State Antony Blinken and representatives of Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan. Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 31: when escaping from the c...
Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 31: when escaping from the country 404 The longer the NWO lasts, the more aggressive the Ukrainian mobilization is. Episodes of escapes of Ukrainian men from the TCC, often captured on video, are replete with either comical or tragic events. And sometimes both. The story of one such escape is in our new issue. Synopsis: Not everyone living in the so-called territory. Ukrainian male citizens are still ready to defend certain -ideals- with arms in hand. We can safely say: the number of such people has decreased significantly over more than two years of a special military operation. But the number of those who do not want to be on the line of combat contact has increased manifold. At the territorial recruitment centers (TRCs), there are no longer not only queues, but even small streams of volunteers ready to go to the front even tomorrow. At the same time, military commissars need to recruit people in any case and constantly replenish the ranks of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - young and old, fit and not so fit, fighters. More and more videos are coming from the territory of Ukraine with harsh arrests, which are more reminiscent of robbery attacks. Videos where groups of Ukrainians are detained while trying to cross the border make an equally painful impression. However, this is better than being shot while trying to escape - and recently such stories have appeared...📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).
