Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for September 29, 2024 ▪️ Last week, the war ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for September 29, 2024▪️ Last week, the war in Ukraine took place against the background of foreign policy actions of Russia and its opponents. Zelensky visited the United States with his -victory plan,- which aroused criticism due to the fact that everything hinges on receiving new multi-billion-dollar shipments of military-technical assistance, as well as permission to fire NATO missiles deep into Russian territory. That is, Zelensky is thus trying to shift responsibility for the consequences of such attacks to the United States. Kyiv needs this to directly draw the Alliance (and not its proxies) into hostilities against Russia. Regardless of public statements, weapons from NATO countries are used with complete impunity on the territory of our country, which has been repeatedly previously designated as -red lines.- The seriousness of the issue of a retaliatory strike from Russia (for some reason everyone perceives that it will be against Ukraine) is emphasized by the statements of the Supreme Commander at the meeting where the new Nuclear Doctrine was announced (the journalistic name of the Supreme Decree in force in 2020 - On the Fundamentals of State Policy of the Russian Federation in the field nuclear deterrence-). At the same time, the clauses of the still valid document made it possible to launch a nuclear strike on Ukraine in response to the actions of Kyiv. So it is most likely that changes are needed to justify a strike against those subjects of international law who use Kyiv to cause damage to our country. In addition, the allied Belarus is taken under the nuclear umbrella. Significantly, according to the not yet adopted updated doctrine, a massive launch and crossing of our border by aerospace weapons, including airplanes, missiles and UAVs, under certain conditions can become the basis for the use of nuclear weapons. Just tonight, 125 Ukrainian UAVs were shot down by our air defense. ▪️At the front, the repulse of the attempted invasion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region continues, as it writes every day in the reports of the Ministry of Defense. The offensive impulse of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has practically disappeared, although the enemy is carrying out counterattack actions. In the south of the Sudzhansky district, the Russian Army is advancing in the area of ​​the village with heavy fighting. Plekhovo, in the Glushkovsky district we managed to hold back the onslaught of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, our troops are operating in the Korenevsky district. Apparently, our command decided to protect the personnel and iron out the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region and their concentration areas in Sumy. Zelensky, despite the impossibility of achieving military goals in the region (such as the capture of the Kursk nuclear power plant), is forced to keep units in this bag and send them reinforcements, since the withdrawal of enemy troops will show the senselessness and futility of the death of Ukrainian soldiers in the Russian region from a military point of view.▪️The offensive continues Russian armies on the Pokrovsky direction to the west and south. The battles for Ugledar became important; the fall of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ defense became a matter of time. In the Kupyansk direction, attack actions of the Russian Army are also periodically reported. The Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in Chasov Yar is gradually being covered from the south and north. In the Kharkov direction, the enemy, with the help of elite GUR units, occupied the aggregate plant in Volchansk, which led to its powerful bombing by our aircraft. Heavy fighting is taking place in Toretsk.▪️Despite the successes of the Russian Armed Forces, the advance is proceeding extremely cautiously, which is explained by the difficulties in supplying advanced units under fire from enemy drones. There were assessments from enemy deputies about the insufficient level of preparation of defensive structures in the depths of the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the future, this may play into the hands of our advancing troops. However, it is important to understand the severity of the battles and the pace of advance of several hundred meters per day of the Russian Army, which is due to the new technological way of war. continued belowTelegramTwo majorsstarted above ▪️ This week, a meeting of well-known public military correspondents/military bloggers took place with the Minister of Defense Belousov. Feedback suggests that the minister is aware of the current problems at the front and is making practical efforts to improve the situation. Nevertheless…

Title: 🖼 🇫🇷 About the third stage of the Poker-2024/3 exercise Septem...
Description: 🇫🇷 About the third stage of the Poker-2024/3 exercise September turned out to be quite fruitful for events surrounding nuclear weapons. In addition to the United States, training of the nuclear component took place recently in France, where the third stage of the Poker-2024 exercise took place. This year, unlike previous years, the French command conducts training of strategic nuclear forces throughout the year as part of this series of exercises. In accordance with a plan, Rafale B/M aircraft (carriers of nuclear warheads) and Triumphan-class nuclear submarines are working out the scenario of deployment in an armed conflict.🔻Against the background of increasing tensions in relations between Russia and the North Atlantic Alliance, changes in the Russian nuclear doctrine, the French are trying with all their might to keep keeping their units in good shape. By the way, according to the Fifth Republic, the French have restored the center for coordinating nuclear forces in Taverny, mothballed since 2011. So the new stage of the Poker exercise may be associated with testing its readiness. These seem like understandable measures, but if you remember that a similar training took place in the USA, and before that in Russia, and they also started talking about testing nuclear weapons in the DPRK, then it turns out a very alarming picture. To complete it, only a few powers - the nuclear club - are left to join the general trend. High resolution mapEnglish version#France@rybar Support us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: the situation in the Korenevsky dist...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: the situation in the Korenevsky district the situation is coming to an end September 28, 2024 In the Kursk region, heavy clashes continue on several sectors of the front.🔻In the Korenevsky district, an enemy International MaxxPro armored fighting vehicle was ambushed at the eastern entrance to Kremyanoye at the crossroads. Judging by the published footage, a group of reconnaissance officers fired at the vehicle at once from four RPG-7s on both sides. After this, hardly anyone inside the armored car survived. It is worth noting that previously this area was considered more of a rear area and the presence of Ukrainian Armed Forces units was not expected here. So far, in the absence of new personnel from the field, it is not possible to clarify the current front line. At the same time, the enemy maintains stable control in Olgovka, from where today he published footage of his damaged BMP-1 and Ukrainian servicemen killed by a drone strike. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, meanwhile, clashes were noted at the Darino-Ivano-Daryino border, where Russian troops are trying to take stable control of both settlements. On the opposite flank there are battles on the approaches to Plekhovo, there are no significant changes yet. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version #digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇯🇵 About the victory of a hawk and a NATO supporter in the Japa...
Description: 🇯🇵 About the victory of a hawk and a NATO supporter in the Japanese elections On September 27, the election of the chairman of the Japanese Liberal Democratic Party took place. Shigeru Ishiba won them - next week he will officially become Prime Minister of Japan instead of Fumio Kishida. ▪️Many people call Ishiba a -hawk- - he is a supporter of increasing the potential of the Self-Defense Forces and increasing the military budget. In this, he will continue the policy of the former leader, who actively advocated for strengthening Japanese troops. ▪️Speaking of foreign policy priorities, relations with the United States, of course, come first. In his speeches, the politician pointed out the need for joint management of bases and the deployment of the Japanese army on US territory in order to make the alliance more equal. 🔻Ishiba’s most resonant statement in the election campaign was the proposal to create an Asian analogue of NATO. The new prime minister explains this initiative by the need to protect Japan, as well as the tense situation in the region. American authorities, according to Japanese media, reacted rather coldly to this idea. There is no doubt that a new alliance is needed to contain China. However, some observers claim Ishiba's pragmatic approach to relations with his neighbor. This is indicated by his intentions to balance between diplomacy and defense in foreign policy. Ishiba's approach to Russian-Japanese relations remains unknown. The local press expresses hopes for progress in the issue of Japanese visiting the graves of their ancestors in the Kuril Islands - the Russian authorities have canceled the simplified visa regime for them in 2022. However, there are so far no prerequisites that the new prime minister will be able to achieve its return, as well as move away from the anti-Russian policy that is now characteristic of the Japanese authorities. #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesFifth time's a charm: Shigeru Ishiba set to be Japan PM after LDP poll winIshiba, who has also served as party secretary-general, won the LDP presidential election on Friday, defeating economic security minister Sanae Takaichi in a runoff vote.

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇺🇸 Almost immediately after the first rumors about changes...
Description: ❗️🇺🇸 Almost immediately after the first rumors appeared about changes to Russia’s nuclear doctrine, a training session of strategic nuclear forces took place in the United States. Two B-52N aircraft with nuclear weapons flew into the Pacific Ocean. One flew south of Unimak Island, and the second turned around off the coast of the United States. At the same time, a nuclear submarine was located along the western American coast, and coordination with the control point was carried out by an E-6B control and communications aircraft. Periodically, the Americans carry out such maneuvers that allow you to maintain the strategic forces of your country in combat readiness, but this does not happen very often. For example, a similar training on the West Coast last took place in May 2023 year, so enough time has passed. And there is practically no information on the Internet. Taking into account quite significant changes in Russian doctrine, as well as growing tensions in the Asia-Pacific region, this flight appears to be politically motivated in order to show the readiness of American nuclear forces. High-resolution mapEnglish version#USA@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: the mur...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: assassination of the Hezbollah leader during an attack on Beirut situation as of 18:00 September 28, 2024 The press service of the Israel Defense Forces announced the neutralization of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah: he was killed as a result of another Israeli Air Force raid on the Lebanese capital. Condolences in connection with the death of His Eminence Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah were expressed by almost all participants of the so-called. -Axis of Resistance- and its allies. These are both Palestinian formations and various groups in Iraq, the Yemeni Houthis and Iran.▪️At the same time, one of those killed during the strike on Beirut was Iranian Brigadier General Abbas Nilforoushan, commander of the Quds Force from the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps in the Republic of Lebanon . This is confirmed by government media. Nilforushan himself is known for his participation in several military campaigns, including in Iraq and Syria. At the same time, his statement from 2021 is being circulated in the media, when he spoke on state television about Israel’s weakness and inability to pose any threat to Iran. ▪️Meanwhile, according to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of a series of strikes by the IDF Air Force, the number of casualties has amounted to about 700 dead and 2,600 wounded. Of these, six killed and 91 injured were residents of the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital. At the same time, the UN stated that more than 50 thousand Lebanese fled to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic, a total of 200 thousand were internally displaced. Also, representatives of the international organization reported that humanitarian needs had reached an unprecedented level.▪️Against the background of what happened in Hezbollah, they reported launches on about ten Israeli Defense Forces targets. Nevertheless, such attacks cannot boast of effectiveness: most of the ammunition is either intercepted by air defense systems or falls in wastelands, often on the territory of Lebanon itself. It is noteworthy that the total number of missiles launched today also remains at a relatively low level - only a few dozen, whereas previously their number could be measured in the hundreds. 🔻The killing of the leader of the Lebanese group was one of the most effective Israeli strikes as part of the recently launched air operation - Arrows of the North -. This was preceded by the death of other Hezbollah commanders, such as Fuad Shukri, Ibrahim Aqil and Ali Karaki. Despite the loss of almost all top leadership, most allied Hezbollah media indicate that the movement as a military-political organization will not disappear anywhere. Nevertheless, Hassan Nasrallah’s successor cannot be envied against the backdrop of the significant damage the Israelis have inflicted on the group in recent days and their virtual complete dominance in the conflict. At the same time, everyone is waiting for a response from both Hezbollah itself and Iran. However, what it will be like and what the Israelis will do in the future is difficult to predict. At the moment, the parties are doing what is already familiar to them: hitting each other’s positions, maintaining the already high degree of tension. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Zaporozhye direction: successes of the RF Armed Force...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Zaporozhye direction: successes of the Russian Armed Forces on the Rabotinsky salient and attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Energodarsituation as of 17:00 on September 28, 2024. The Zaporozhye direction, which has recently fallen out of the information field, remains one of the key sectors of the front. Russian troops exchange artillery, UAV and aviation strikes with the enemy, and also conduct local attacks in several sectors at once. ▪️On the Kamenskoye-Novoandreevka section, Russian units are fighting on the approaches to Pyatikhatki. To the east, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control north of Nesteryanka. During the attack, they knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from their strong point and occupied part of the forest belt. In parallel with this, the Russian Aerospace Forces regularly strike places where enemy personnel are concentrated in Novoandreevka and Novoyakovlevka. ▪️To the northwest of Rabotino, units of the Russian Armed Forces squeezed the enemy out of several forest belts. Thus, Russian troops managed to knock out the enemy from the ledge, which had previously threatened the left flank of the Russian Armed Forces units in the village. To the east of the settlement, Russian troops, during several assaults, expanded the zone of control on the approaches to Chubenkova Gully. Features of the landscape slow down the advance of the Russian Armed Forces and turn battles for each strong point into battles that can last for weeks. The beam itself, towards which Russian attack aircraft are approaching, is used by the enemy as a concentration point for their units and plays an important role in the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ❗️Over the past two months, Ukrainian formations were forced to abandon a significant part of their positions on the former Rabotino ledge. Successful offensive actions of the Russian troops not only secured the flanks of the Russian Armed Forces group in Rabotino, but also led to the beginning of the formation of half-coverage around the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the area from the northern approaches to the village to Chubenkova gully. Nevertheless, it is clearly not worth expecting large offensive operations in this area with the aim of breaking through the front. Both sides have equipped powerful defensive lines here, the assault of which will be resource-intensive and will probably not lead to significant successes. ▪️At the same time, last summer was marked by an increased intensity of attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Energodar and its surroundings. As a result of drone strikes and artillery shelling, the city and surrounding communities experienced water supply disruptions three times. Recently, one of the schools in Kamenka-Dneprovskaya came under fire from Ukrainian forces. There were more than a hundred students in the building at the time of the attack, but there were no casualties. The region's energy system is also suffering. Following massive attacks by enemy drones on local substations, significant power outages have been recorded several times since the end of July. This also affected the neighboring Kherson region, where, as a result of enemy attacks on the energy sector of Zaporozhye, several thousand people were left without electricity in August. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot communications @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Zaporozhye #map #Russia #Ukraine #Energodar@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🎬 Dear friends! Six months of development, testing, calibratio...
Description: Forwarded From Older Edda Dear friends! Six months of development, testing, calibration and other things have come to an end. The Ural craftsmen from the team -Turned in War-, the creators of the famous folk kamikaze drone -Ghoul-, already noted at the highest level, have created the product that our troops so desperately lack. Heavy drone -Berdysh-. This is a combat drone, there is nothing superfluous in it and it has one task - war. Berdysh is, first of all, a front-line drone, a weapon of assault troops. It can easily carry 20 kilograms for at least 15 km, that is, it can fully ensure the supply of assault groups and reinforcement groups with everything necessary, in conditions of isolation of the enemy battlefield. Berdysh can engage in mining, ensuring the laying of anti-tank and anti-personnel mines at any time of the day. Berdysh can drop a powerful landmine on enemy dugouts, can conduct reconnaissance and, most interestingly, can inflict fire damage from the RPO -Shmel- or RPG-30 -Hook-. Berdysh is a modular drone, that is, through simple manipulations and in the shortest possible time, the miner turns into a supply worker, and on the next flight into a combat unmanned helicopter. The guys made it relatively compact so that it could be transported in a UAZ, the deployment time is like that of the Ghoul, that is, within a couple of minutes you can unfold and collapse the bird. Plus, as noted in the video, Berdysh is a repeater drone for the FPV family -Ghoul-. And most importantly, Berdysh was able to be made as cheap as possible, cheaper than Chinese agricultural drones, but more functional and suitable for combat operations. Dear friends, we are now announcing a BIG collection for Berdyshi. This will be the people's second drone. You, dear Brothers and Sisters, have already turned the people's drone - the Ghoul - into a real weapon, which is now being used by the troops. Now we ask you to help with the implementation of this machine, which is so necessary for our army. Anyone who wants and has the opportunity to help can do so on the card of Radio Russia presenter Dmitry Konanykhin 2202206288336105 The enemy will be defeated, humiliated and destroyed, and Victory will be ours! Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇸🇾 For the second night, Israeli troops have been striki...
Description: 🇮🇱🇸🇾 For the second night, Israeli troops have been striking the Damascus countryside. This time, the small settlement of Beit Saber, located near the occupied Golan Heights, came under fire from the Israel Defense Forces. There, an Israeli drone attacked one of the residential buildings, as a result of which Ahmed Muhammad Fahd, one of the leaders of Hamas in the south of the Syrian Arab Republic, was eliminated. organized missile attacks on IDF targets. His wife died along with him, and another person was injured. It is noteworthy that the Israeli press service exclusively reported on the liquidation of Fahd, who allegedly planned to carry out a new attack in the near future. Also, around midnight, Israeli aircraft intercepted a drone launched by pro-Iranian groups near the small village of Quneitra. According to statements by the Islamic Resistance in Iraq, the drone's target was a certain target in the Golan Heights. High resolution mapEnglish version#Damascus #Israel #map #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️ 🇮🇱🇱🇧🌍 On the reaction to reports of the death of Hezbolla...
Description: Rybar: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the interim results of the Israel Defense Forces’ operation in Lebanon Last night, Israeli aviation carried out another strike on Beirut: more than 30 explosions thundered in the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital, and warehouses were the presumed target of the raid... 🇮🇱🇱🇧🌍 About the reaction to reports of the death of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah▪️The IDF press service officially announced the liquidation of the head of the Lebanese movement as a result of yesterday's raid on Beirut, accusing him of organizing terrorist attacks against Israelis. The Israeli media are also disseminating information about the death of the daughter of Secretary General Zeinab Nasrallah in the Lebanese capital. However, this information remains unconfirmed. In addition, according to the Israel Defense Forces, from the Hezbollah leadership, only the commander of the Badr unit, Abu Ali Rida, is currently alive. Hezbollah published an official statement confirming the death of Hassan Nasrallah. Representatives of the movement promised to continue the path of their deceased leader in supporting Palestine, defending Lebanon and confronting the enemy. ▪️In Iran, they did not comment on the official information, expressing only support for Lebanon. Previously, billboards with the inscription -Nasrallah is alive- were installed throughout Tehran. At the same time, according to Reuters, amid the attack, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Republic, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, was transported to a safe and secure place. Also, the Iranian media denied reports about the death of the commander of the Quds Force, Brigadier General Ismail Qaani - earlier on the Internet it was stated that he was in the underground headquarters of Hezbollah in Beirut. ▪️Despite Israeli claims that the United States was informed before the bombing of Beirut, several American media outlets claim the opposite. Previously, the Pentagon also stated that there was no information about the Israeli Air Force attack. ▪️Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov strongly condemned the actions of the Israelis, as they grossly violate the sovereignty of Lebanon. According to him, the Russian side is making every effort to avoid further escalation of the conflict in the Middle East. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇦🇺 About protests in Sydney against censorship on social net...
Description: 🇦🇺 About protests in Sydney against censorship on social networks Today there were mass demonstrations in Sydney against the disinformation bill proposed by the Australian government under the leadership of Prime Minister Anthony Albanese. 📌The essence of the bill: Australian authorities want to introduce fines for digital platforms, which, according to the authorities, do not effectively combat so-called disinformation. If the law is adopted, social networks could be fined up to 5% of annual turnover. 🔻Of course, the law will primarily become a tool for suppressing freedom of speech, allowing the authorities to interpret what constitutes disinformation and put pressure on social networks to remove incorrect content. The main blow will probably fall on X (formerly Twitter), since the majority of bloggers with alternative opinions broadcast on this site. Therefore, one of the prominent opponents of the law is Elon Musk. We have already observed similar measures in post-Soviet countries, where local authorities, under the supervision of Western NGOs and USAID, are fighting Russian propaganda, but still cannot overcome it, demanding new subsidies and tightening legislation. 🔻And recently, against the backdrop of anti-migrant protests, the British government has sharply tightened censorship. Looking at British law enforcement practices, where migrants are given relatively lenient sentences for rape and other serious crimes, while native Britons are given exemplary harsh prison sentences for making jokes on Facebook, Australians have something to fear. #Australia #UK #protests@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🇪🇬 The US State Department has approved the potential sale of 7...
Description: 🇪🇬 The US State Department has approved the potential sale of 720 modernized Stinger systems to Egypt for $740 million.▪️ It is worth remembering that recently, in order to strengthen the Egyptian army, Cairo received $1.3 billion. Some of these funds went to strengthen the mission in Somalia. In fact, this example again marks the deepening of American-Egyptian ties in the military sphere. And, despite accusations of human rights violations, Washington notes Cairo’s role in the security sector.▪️ -Stingers are widely used against drones, as the experience of the Northern Military District has shown. And various aircraft can be used both by terrorists within the country (although the Sinai branch of IS is inactive) and by the Houthis. In the latter case, the fall of a UAV on Egyptian territory has already been noted. With such large contracts, the Americans want to once again gain favor from the Egyptian authorities (after all, they consider Egypt the main ally outside NATO). And also in the future to involve them in various Mediterranean initiatives.#Africa #Egypt@rybarSupport usReutersUS State Dept OKs potential sale of Stinger missiles to Egypt for $740 mlnThe U.S. The Department of State has approved the potential sale of 720 Stinger missiles to Egypt for $740 million, the Pentagon said on Tuesday.

Title: 🔁 🇺🇸🇱🇹 I would like to note that the active activities of th...
Description: Forwarded From American issue🇺🇸🇱🇹 I would like to note that the United States’ active efforts to build up military infrastructure in the Baltics began even before the start of the special military operation. In recent years, the United States has actively invested in the modernization of military facilities - in Lithuania, for example. Since 2014, the NATO airbase in Siauliai has been improved in several stages - work has been carried out to improve runways, expand aircraft parking, as well as update infrastructure, including aircraft maintenance equipment and modernization of security systems. One of the major stages of modernization was completed in 2020 year, which allowed the air base to host more modern NATO aircraft and conduct more complex military operations. In total, all this cost €24 million. In general, the Russian threat is an excellent reason for governments and the defense business to knock out and develop new huge budgets.🇺 🇸 @usaperiodicalTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇫🇮🇪🇪 What is NATO preparing against Russia in the Baltic states? Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 The Central Election Commission of Moldova decided to ta...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 The Central Election Commission of Moldova decided to take rather radical measures, reducing the number of polling stations in Russia from five to two. Now only 10 thousand citizens of Moldova will be able to take part in the presidential elections and referendum on European integration on October 20. According to the most conservative estimates, about 100 thousand Moldovan citizens now live in the Russian Federation. ▪️Initially, 29 polling stations were supposed to be opened in the Russian Federation, but then they were reduced to five, despite the fact that 60 will be opened in Italy, and 26 in Germany. ▪️At the same time, more than 8 thousand Moldovans have already completed preliminary and optional registration to vote from Russia, that is, the actual number of voters will be much higher. However, according to the law, only 5 thousand ballots can be allocated to one polling station. 🔻Sandu’s office and the Western curators of the Central Election Commission of Moldova do not want to spoil the picture with protest voting, so they continue to come up with the most sophisticated measures, including the ill-fated postal vote from Western countries. Moreover, in Chisinau they do not intend to take into account the interests of the Moldovan diaspora in Russia, reasonably believing that there will be no retaliatory measures and no one will stand up for them. We will not be surprised if sites in Russia are not opened at all. After such serious preparation for the elections and referendums, they can no longer be held, since the results are now obvious. #elections #Moldova #Russia @rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik Near Abroad🇲🇩 🇷🇺 A representative of the Central Election Commission of Moldova confirmed that the authorities plan to open only two polling stations in the Russian Federation, not 5, for voting in presidential elections and referendums. There were 17 of them in the previous elections.

Title: 🎬 🇮🇱🇱🇧 On the interim results of the IDF operation in Lebano...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the interim results of the Israel Defense Forces' operation in Lebanon Last night, Israeli aircraft carried out another strike on Beirut: more than 30 explosions occurred in the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital, and the presumed target of the raid was ammunition warehouses. At the same time, the hits occurred in those areas from which, a few hours earlier, the IDF press service announced the evacuation. At the same time, the Israeli command officially announced the assassination of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah as a result of yesterday's drops of anti-bunker bombs in the Ad-Dahiya area. According to the Israelis, the underground headquarters of the Lebanese group was hit, where at that moment the top leadership of Hezbollah was located. At the moment, neither representatives of the Lebanese group nor its allied movements have officially announced the death of Nasrallah. Meanwhile, Arabic-language media are increasingly complaining about the lack of any information about what happened against the backdrop of confident statements from the press service of the Israel Defense Forces. 📌Be that as it may, a consistently tense situation remains along the Lebanese-Israeli border: the Israelis are launching massive strikes across the entire territory of Lebanon, while Hezbollah responds by launching missiles at Israeli military facilities, which, however, do not lead to significant damage. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧About the results of the annual conference of the Labor Party...
Description: 🇬🇧About the results of the annual conference of the Labor Party. On September 25, the three-day Labor conference in Liverpool ended. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer spoke at it for the first time as head of government. 🔻Instead of talking about a happy future, we had to talk about less pleasant things.▪️One of the main topics of Starmer’s speech was the decision to cancel fuel payments in the winter for some categories of pensioners, which was announced by the Minister of Finance of the United Kingdom Rachel Reeves at the end of July.▪️A stab in the back for the prime minister, on the last day of the conference, there was a defeat in the vote against the government’s decision to block subsidies on heating for millions of elderly people. Despite the fact that the decision of the delegates is not legally binding for Labor, the voting results had a negative impact on the positions of Keir Starmer.▪️Along with this, the Prime Minister also commented on the situation in the Middle East, calling for a de-escalation of the Lebanese-Israeli conflict and an immediate ceasefire in Gaza. However, at the same time, Foreign Minister David Lammy said that the UK would not impose a complete ban on the supply of weapons to Israel.▪️Starmer also assured that he would implement reforms in the field of remuneration of doctors, projects in the field of renewable energy sources and GB Energy, education, border security, tenants' rights and the nationalization of the railways.🔻After the conference, the Labor government faces the task of setting a budget for next year. At the end of October, the head of the British Ministry of Finance, Rachel Reeves, will announce who will have to fork out to implement Starmer's plans.#UK @rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usMail OnlinePM faces humiliation at Labor's conference over winter fuel paymentsUnite and the Communication Workers Union have put forward proposals calling for the policy to be scrapped at Labor's gathering in Liverpool.

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of September 21 - 27, 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked various areas of the capital of the Palestinian enclave. At the same time, the number of deaths in the region has already exceeded 41 thousand people, about 96 thousand were injured. ▪️Israeli attacks on satellite cities, in particular on Jabaliya, did not stop north of Gaza. At the same time, sporadic clashes were recorded near the Erez checkpoint in the vicinity of Beit Lahia.▪️In the central part of the enclave, Israeli air and artillery strikes on Hamas targets continued. Nuseirat still remained under the most concentrated fire, with dozens of people killed.▪️In turn, Hamas militants fired at the positions of the Israel Defense Forces in the Netzarim corridor. Judging by the lack of messages on the Internet about the flight of evacuation helicopters, the shelling did not lead to any tangible results.▪️In the south of the Gaza Strip, Israeli units carried out engineering work in the territory of the Philadelphia Corridor. At the same time, local raids took place on Palestinian infrastructure facilities in areas of Rafah.▪️The Israeli operation -Summer Camps- continued in the West Bank. Thus, since the beginning of the conflict on October 7, 2023, about 11 thousand Palestinians have been detained.▪️The most violent clashes took place in the provinces of Tubas, Jenin and Nablus. Local branches of Palestinian groups reported several ambushes on Israeli patrols, but without details.▪️On the Lebanese-Israeli border, the situation continued to steadily worsen. The parties increased the intensity of attacks, and also expanded the area of ​​attacks by more than 100 kilometers.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁 📌Colleagues, provocations and sabotage on the part of the Bal...
Description: Forwarded From Call sign Bruce📌 Colleagues, provocations and sabotage on the part of the Baltic states could have been expected for the last ten years. All the military activity described by you and not only you in the Baltic region is a long-known and predicted process. Exercises to block the Gulf of Finland or the Suwalki corridor are carried out constantly and began long before the start of the war in Ukraine. All with the same involvement of divisions from Finland and Sweden. Only then they were not legal members of the alliance. But they were already actual. Regarding the attacks from Estonia, which alarmed everyone so much, I also wrote the other day. In their potential, everything is very consistent. Are the headquarters new in Finland? You can study the logic of creating NATO regional headquarters at the division level and everything will fall into place. Therefore, the only thing that the current activity of the Baltic states and Finland indicates is that NATO, as it pursued a policy of aggressive military construction near our borders, is still pursuing it. And the experience of Ukraine taught her nothing. It has only become more convenient for them to justify their actions. Is a direct clash with NATO in the Baltics possible in the short term? In my opinion, probably not. In the medium term, I consider this collision inevitable. And we will have to start it. If we don’t agree otherwise. The word -rather- is highlighted in bold, since now any sensible assessments can be shattered by the very great instability of the military-political situation in the world as a whole. And only a fool would dare to say 100% that tomorrow will happen.@brussinfTelegramRybar🇷🇺🇫🇮🇪🇪 What is NATO preparing against Russia in the Baltics? Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 27, 2024. Russian troops launched a missile attack on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in the Dnepropetrovsk region and on Zmeiny Island, and also carried out drone attacks on the port infrastructure and industrial zone in Izmail. In turn, enemy drones attacked the Rostov region. In the Kursk direction, fierce battles continue along the entire line of contact, Russian troops are hitting enemy targets both in the occupied territory of the region and in the neighboring Sumy region. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing into the urban areas of Dzerzhinsk, gradually expanding the zone of control closer to the center of the population point. In the Pokrovsky direction, the attack aircraft established themselves in a forest belt on the approaches to Lesovka, several kilometers west of Novogrodovka. And in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces continue the operation to encircle the Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in Ugledar.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en)#Belgorod #digest #Dzerzhinsk #Dnepropetrovsk #report #Donetsk #map #Kursk #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine #Ugledar @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: Kursk direction: missile strikes on ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: Kursk direction: missile strikes on enemy targets in the Sumy region and Sudzhansky districtsituation to an end on September 27, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops continue to fight on several sectors of the front, while simultaneously hitting the positions of Ukrainian formations both in the occupied part of the region, and in the border area of ​​the Sumy region. 🔻In the Glushkovsky district, apparently, the enemy’s offensive has completely stalled. Footage of the consequences of battles in the area of ​​​​the settlements of Medvezhye and Novy Put, which depict burned columns of enemy armored vehicles and engineering vehicles, is increasingly being published on the Internet.🔻In the Korenevsky district, Russian troops repelled the attacks of Ukrainian formations in the direction of Lyubimovka, and in the Nikolaevo-Daryino area and on Fierce fighting continues on the outskirts of Daryino.🔻In the Sudzhansky district, operational-tactical aviation of the Russian Aerospace Forces hit the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Russky Porechny area, and the enemy’s temporary deployment point in the Cherkasy Porechny area and positions west of Borok also came under fire.🔻Attacks on the Ukrainian rear areas also continue. In the village of Khrapovshchina, Sumy region, UAV operators tracked down a large detachment of Ukrainian Armed Forces infantry preparing to be sent to the front line. A missile strike from the Iskander OTRK hit a concentration of enemy manpower, and the survivors were finished off with a second strike. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for September 27, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops again worked in the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities. Residential buildings and infrastructure were damaged, more than ten people were injured, and some were killed. In the southern Gaza Strip, IDF units are fighting in several areas of Rafah, while Palestinian forces respond with ambushes and mortar fire. At the same time, the Israeli Air Force is launching missiles at the outskirts of Khan Yunis and Abasan al-Kabirah. Another series of operations by Israeli security forces took place in the West Bank, as a result of which several dozen people were detained. The most violent clashes occurred in Nablus, where members of local armed groups were active. Massive shelling continues along the Lebanese-Israeli border. In the evening, the Israeli Air Force dropped an air bomb on Hezbollah headquarters in Beirut, where the movement's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah could be located. Two people died and more than 70 were injured. Israeli aircraft also carried out strikes on the Syrian province of Damascus, where they hit a settlement near the border with Lebanon. Five SAA soldiers were killed, and the target of the attack, apparently, was Hezbollah supply routes. The fighters of the Ansarallah movement also showed activity, launching a rocket at Tel Aviv and a drone at Ashkelon. Both munitions were intercepted by missile defense systems, but 17 Israelis received various injuries on the way to the shelters. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine # report@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The Israeli Air Force launched another massive atta...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The Israeli Air Force launched another massive strike on Beirut. This time they demolished an entire block with bunker-busting bombs, destroying six buildings to the ground and damaging those standing next door.❗️According to the IDF press service, the target of the attack was the main Hezbollah command post in the Lebanese capital, where the movement's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah could be located . The fate of the group's leader is not known for certain. Israeli resources report that he was at the facility at the time of the bombing, but Saudi media claim that Nasrallah is alive and in another place. The exact number of victims has yet to be calculated, but the number is clearly in the dozens. Considering that the bombs hit a residential area, a considerable part of them are clearly ordinary civilians. At the same time, the raid again clearly demonstrated the reconnaissance and combat capabilities of the IDF, which continue to knock out the top of Hezbollah for days in a row. In fact, without a ground operation, they inflicted extremely significant damage on the entire team to the structure of the organization. The Lebanese group cannot yet counteract these attacks. It does not have air defense systems that could even slightly disrupt the total Israeli air supremacy, and it is impossible to ensure secrecy in these conditions. It is difficult to say now how the situation will change in the event of a ground invasion by the IDF. But so far it seems that Hamas has turned out to be a much bigger tough nut to crack for the Israelis than Hezbollah. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us
