Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: attacks on enemy positions, the situ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: attacks on enemy positions situation as of 20:00 on September 25, 2024 In the Kursk direction, clashes continue along the entire front line.🔻Frames of repelling an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the direction of Vesely in the Glushkovsky district have appeared. Judging by the calm in the media space on the enemy’s side, the enemy cannot boast of any successes.🔻In the Korenevsky district, Russian troops launched an air strike on a forest belt south of Olgovka, using FAB-3000. Positions north of Novoivanovka were also hit. Fighting continues on the outskirts of Lyubimovka, where Ukrainian troops are trying to break into the defense of the Russian Armed Forces in the village. In the Sudzhansky district, the use of a Molniya UAV was noted in the Cherkasy Konopelka area, which was previously used only in the Pokrovsky and Seversky directions. As a result of a direct hit, one of the enemy's armored fighting vehicles was disabled. On the opposite flank there are battles on the outskirts of Daryino and Nikolaevo-Daryino.▪️In the Sumy region, a missile strike presumably destroyed the MLRS -Grad- in the Khoteni area. The intensity of use of the Iskander OTRK against enemy targets in this area remains quite high. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version #digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeti...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeting of the permanent meeting of the Security Council on nuclear deterrence🔻Main points: ▪️The use of nuclear forces is an extreme measure to protect the country's sovereignty. ▪️ Reliable information about the launch of aerospace attack weapons towards the Russian Federation will entail a nuclear response.▪️ A critical threat to the sovereignty of the Russian Federation and non-nuclear weapons will be the basis for a nuclear response.▪️ Russia is obliged to take into account the emergence of new sources of military threats and risks for itself and its allies. ▪️Russia reserves the right to use nuclear weapons in the event of aggression against Belarus. ▪️The Russian Federation may consider the use of nuclear weapons after reliable data on the massive launch of missiles and UAVs when crossing the border.▪️The Russian Federation takes a highly responsible approach to nuclear weapons issues, trying to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons and their components.▪️Russia has expanded the category of states and military alliances against which nuclear deterrence is carried out.▪️Today, the nuclear triad remains the most important guarantee of the security of our state.▪️In the updated version of the document, aggression against Russia by any non-nuclear state, but with the participation or support of a nuclear state, is proposed to be considered as a joint attack on Russian Federation.#digest #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇯🇵 About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Ja...
Description: 🇨🇳🇷🇺🇯🇵 About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Japan was marked by a loud news event - a Russian plane entered the country’s airspace. Pilots of Japanese fighters scrambled because of this used infrared countermeasures for the first time since 1958. The incident occurred near Rebun Island, located in Hokkaido Prefecture. Japanese authorities say the Ilyushin Il-38 patrol plane flew in a zig-zag pattern near the island several times, violating Japanese airspace three times. 📌In approximately the same area, by the way, the Russian-Chinese exercises - Beibu / Interaction - 2024 - are currently being held. Most likely, the Il-38 was also involved in training. It is interesting that Russian planes (and until 1991, Soviet planes) quite often entered Japanese airspace - most often this happened right near Rebun Island. However, this did not cause such a reaction from the military. Why did this happen now? The fact is that just a few weeks before this incident, a Chinese Y-9 reconnaissance aircraft violated the country’s airspace for the first time - this happened near the Danjo Islands in Nagasaki Prefecture. Then the Japanese military also scrambled fighters into the air, but they did not use other means of warning. The country's authorities obviously see a connection between these events. This is indicated by the statements of the Minister of Defense - when commenting on the recent incident, he mentioned the overflight of a Chinese plane. Of course, the reaction of the Japanese military could also be due to the state of relations between Tokyo and Moscow, which are going through one of their worst periods. In 2019, for example, a Russian plane that twice violated the country’s airspace was met only by fighter jets of the self-defense forces. However, China most likely played a role in the recent incident. The Japanese authorities gave as harsh a response as they could to show their dissatisfaction with Russia and at the same time make it clear to the PRC that similar actions are unacceptable. High resolution mapEnglish version#China #Russia #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇸💰 What is happening with Russian LNG projects amid sanctions? The decision was quite the expected reaction to unprecedented pressure and attempts by the United States to strangle the gas industry in Russia. We have already spoken in detail about the goals and objectives of this policy earlier. Now pressure is being exerted in two directions:➖Our Anglo-Saxon opponents are working to introduce restrictions for European vassals on the purchase of Russian LNG.➖The second vector of pressure is directed against LNG delivery vehicles. LNG carriers ordered by Novatek in Korea remain at the shipyards for now. Korean manufacturers use formal excuses, such as lack of sufficient labor, to not fulfill contract obligations. Formally, their actions do not directly comply with the demands of Washington and London. But in fact, they comply with sanctions restrictions.🔻How dangerous the current situation is and how to adapt to it - we tell you in our new article. #globalism #USA #Russia #article #economy@rybar together with @econopocalypseSupport usProject -Rybar -What is happening with Russian LNG projects against the background of sanctions? Title: 🔁 Espionage, lobbying, migration... It would seem, what does Lon...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Lugovoy. State DumaEspionage, lobbying, migration... It would seem, what does London have to do with it? An investigation into how the British planned to create a migration collapse in Russia through Russian NGOs confirms the scale and depth of the pit. Pay attention to the dates of the creation of the so-called human rights organizations. It's not even the day before yesterday. The Foreign Office has been entrenched in Russia for a long time and firmly. With money from the British Foreign Office, a whole network of organizations was created, the essence of which was not only the importation of migrants to the Russian Federation, but also their illegal settlement in the country. Migrants were supposed to become the electorate for the liberal party - Yabloko - it is clear that the electorate was protest and, most importantly, thoughtless and obedient in management. Migrants with full civil rights, a voice, capable of influencing political, social, and humanitarian decisions. Human rights activists collected this black force so that one day it could -shoot- and provoke internal conflicts in the country. Illegal immigrants were provided with support at various levels: from delivery to Russia to legal and financial assistance. The sponsors of the coming migration chaos were: Amnesty International, the European Commission, as well as the CAF-Russia Foundation, which itself is funded by the British Foreign Office. The fund acts as a financial cushion for the British Foreign Office to transfer money to Russian NGOs in order to conceal the foreign origin of the funds. In the 90s, it was the CAF that was the key structure that helped launch many NGOs in Russia. Not so long ago, the head of British military intelligence, Adrian Bird, reported on the priorities of his department. Among the top threats, even higher than Russia, which will remain the biggest threat to mainland Britain until 2030, is the migration crisis. That is, London is aware of the role of migrants who not only provoke a humanitarian crisis, but also create extremist communities and terrorist cells. If on their island they are trying (although they are doing poorly, as evidenced by large-scale protests and pogroms in Great Britain due to the dominance of migrants) to curb this force, then in Russia it is the other way around - the Anglo-Saxons are provoking a migration boom and want to use illegal immigrants to undermine society. Foreign investments - in the field of labor migration, lobbying for the priority of the rights of migrants, as well as the deliberate lack of adaptation and integration of those coming to Russia, must be stopped. And those involved in the operations of the British intelligence services to promote the migration boom have been prosecuted.➡️@lugovoyandrey | 💬Discuss in the chatProject -Rybar -How Russian NGOs lobbied for migration with money from the British Foreign Office Some time ago it became known that six employees of the political department of the British Embassy were expelled from Moscow - signs were found in their actions...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦Slobozhanskoye direction: oncoming battles in the Glub...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦Slobozhansk direction: oncoming battles in the Glubokoe area and the battle for Volchansk situation as of 16:00 September 25, 2024 Fierce fighting resumed in the Slobozhansk direction along the entire length of the front from Liptsy to Volchansk. The enemy is attacking the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in several areas, trying to divert Russian reserves from more dangerous directions. ▪️In the area of ​​the Deep unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, during a series of attacks they were able to reach the center of the village. Previously, footage of mechanized attacks by Ukrainian formations on the positions of Russian troops in forest belts south of the village had already appeared on the Internet, but it was difficult to assess the scale of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ advance. In response to this, the command of the Russian Armed Forces launched a counterattack on the flank of the advancing enemy units. To the north-west of the village, attack aircraft successfully occupied part of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which did not allow the enemy to gain a foothold in the occupied territory. Despite some successes in the area, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are unable to turn the tide of the battles for the village in their favor. Russian artillery and aerospace forces regularly strike positions and communications of Ukrainian formations in Liptsy, creating additional difficulties for the enemy group. ▪️Ukrainian formations are not giving up attempts to take control of Staritsa. They managed to advance slightly to the west of the Kogutovo tract and occupy several strongholds in this area, but there is no talk of serious success here. Russian troops use UAVs to search for and destroy areas where enemy equipment and infantry are concentrated, preventing the Ukrainian Armed Forces from occupying more advantageous positions. ▪️Yesterday, footage from the enemy appeared in the information field, demonstrating the entry of assault groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine into the territory of the Volchansky Aggregate Plant. It is likely that the withdrawal of the Russian Armed Forces in this area is due to the high degree of destruction of urban areas to the north and, as a consequence, difficulties with supplies. After units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine entered the territory of the plant, they were hit by TOS -Solntsepek-. Considering the high degree of ruination of the industrial zone and the lack of established crossings across Volchya, it can be assumed that the enemy will face similar supply problems when holding the territory of the enterprise. Separate groups of Ukrainian Armed Forces infantry were also seen to the north, in the area of ​​Shevchenko Street. Nevertheless, it is premature to talk about the enemy’s consolidation in the area due to the lack of reliable shelters for attack aircraft here that can protect against regular attacks by the Russian Aerospace Forces and drone strikes. ❗️Today, Volchansk is mostly ruins, the retention of which is expensive for both sides. The regular exchange of artillery strikes and the combat work of the Russian Armed Forces aviation destroyed most of the city blocks. And if the strategic importance of the city for Russian troops is to attract the attention of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, then for the enemy, control over it is primarily of media importance against the backdrop of failures in other sectors of the front. ▪️To the east of Volchansk, Russian attack aircraft established control over the northwestern outskirts of the Pacific, knocking out the enemy from several strong points. The center of the village is currently in the gray zone. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are also fighting in the vicinity of a populated area with the goal of taking the Ukrainian formations defending there into a semi-encirclement. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @ rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#Volchansk #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇹🇷 Colleagues from the DTM channel are absolutely right when th...
Description: 🇹🇷 Colleagues from the DTM channel are absolutely right when they talk about a wide range of cultural and educational reforms that the countries of the Organization of Turkic States are trying to implement, and the emergence of a single alphabet is only part of this process.📌 From the very beginning of the creation of the OTG, the political bloc chanted slogans about unification of the Turkic peoples, and cultural interaction became almost the main lever for the Turks and their patrons. However, from the moment of its creation until 2022, the UTG did not have truly significant achievements. The biggest event, I remember, was a photograph in which the Xinjiang-Uyghur region of the People's Republic of China and the Russian regions of Altai and Siberia were included in the so-called Turkic world. But since 2022, the organization has begun quite active work on the implementation of various programs in the fields of education and culture. While the Russian authorities were distracted by the West, the influence of the Organization of Turkic States in the region was strengthening. And it would seem that the Turks had already tried to do something similar, but it was all unsuccessful. However, from chaotic cries about the unity of the Turkic nations in the bloc they moved to a more consistent policy, first focusing on education, and now moving on to military cooperation, which creates quite tangible threats to regional stability.#OTG #Turkey@rybar Support usTelegramDTM🇹🇷 Not in alphabet united: about the scientific and educational expansion of Turkey in the post-Soviet space ▪️The summit of the Organization of Turkic States, which will be held in Bishkek on October 24, will by all signs be significant. Title: 🔁🖼 How ⚡️NATO countries use the experience of the military conf...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors How ⚡️NATO countries use the experience of the military conflict in Ukraine The general trend is to increase military budgets, the production of ammunition and military equipment, and the search for ways to attract recruits to the army. At the same time, there is an enlargement of units and a search for new technologies capable of suppressing the enemy’s capabilities in conditions of general awareness of the warring parties. NATO exercises held in the Netherlands from September 10 to 20, 2024, on combating UAVs (C-UAS), were indicative. As part of the exercise, electronic warfare stations, anti-drone drones and cyber interceptors were used. For the first time, specialists from Ukraine took part in them, which means a direct transfer of experience in countering Russian UAVs to the Alliance countries. All the best developments in counter-UAV technologies are planned to be included in NATO’s Integrated Air and Missile Defense (IAMD), elements of which are already being tested in Ukraine. In addition, the United States has begun implementing a special program -Replicator-, in August 2023, aimed at increasing production and accelerating the introduction of small UAVs (similar to DJI) into troops to create superiority over China. The Pentagon has already ordered 344 Teal 2 quadcopters from Teal Drones in 2023. As part of the program, in March 2024, the US Department of Defense ordered the first batch of unmanned surface vehicles (UAVs) Swiftships Swift-Sea-Stalker (S3). The UAV is capable of traveling up to 1,852 km and reaching speeds of up to 55 km/h. The device is designed for reconnaissance missions, but can carry up to 650 kg of payload. Its design visually resembles the BECs used in the Black Sea by Ukraine.🇵🇱The Poles also joined the race of unmanned technologies. Polska Grupa Militarna S.A. presented a prototype of a lightweight multi-purpose maritime drone, ReconSea, which can carry 80-140 kg of explosives over a range of up to 100 km. Thanks to the design features (presence of hydrofoils) it is capable of accelerating to 70 km/h.  The company has also developed the concept of the ground-based unmanned platform ReconPATROL.🇬🇧The British Navy is looking for solutions to introduce reconnaissance UAVs (helicopter-type) and UAVs into the fleet, which will complement and strengthen warships. BEC is being tested on the basis of rigid inflatable boats Pacific 24 and 950  with a 12.7 mm machine gun, which can also  be used as a kamikaze. ✨Ukraine remains a training ground for NATO to practice military tactics and test equipment in order to further direct this experience against Russia and China. Two majors

Title: 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the meeting of diplomats from the United State...
Description: 🇰🇷🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the meeting of diplomats from the United States, South Korea and Japan On September 24, a meeting of the heads of foreign affairs of the United States, South Korea and Japan was held on the sidelines of the UN. In addition to the already boring mantras about the need to respond to the rapprochement between Russia and the DPRK, the parties confirmed their intentions to formalize trilateral cooperation. In particular, they talked about a joint summit of the countries' leaders, at which it is planned to create a secretariat responsible for relations between Washington, South Korea and Japan and the implementation of concluded agreements. 📌This need is really overdue for them. The fact is that a quasi-union between states actually does not have a strong basis behind it. This means that a change of power in a particular country can, in the worst case scenario, nullify all the progress achieved. ▪️The likelihood of worsening relations in this triangle is very real. There will be elections in the United States in November, which Donald Trump may win. Considering his previous presidential term, he could create certain difficulties for South Korea and Japan.▪️In addition, elections for the leader of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party will be held at the end of September. Some of the most popular candidates for the position differ from current moderate conservative Fumio Kishida, for example by taking a hard line on the country's imperial past, a highly sensitive issue in South Korea. 🔻Therefore, it is now important for the parties to record the progress made in containing the DPRK. Well, to lay the foundation for an alliance that is interested not only in the Korean Peninsula, but also in the region as a whole. In this case, even under the worst scenarios, the trilateral format, which will already be based on specific legal agreements, will be difficult to pause. #Republic of Korea #USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(2nd LD) S. Korea, U.S., Japan to finalize trilateral secretariat when leaders meet this year(ATTN: UPDATES throughout; CHANGES headline, lead) By Song Sang- ho and Kim Seung-yeon W...

He’s a busy man, you have to understand.  They say that Filimonov was seen in active hostilities only with Shariy and a representative of his political party, but isn’t this a merit to the Ukrainian people? After all, who said that the commander has to be on the battlefield? The real Da Vinci wolf sits proudly in the operational headquarters and commands troops from a distance. A true champion! Title: 🔁🎬 -There is no greater love than that if someone lays down his...
Description: Forwarded From Older than the Edda - There is no greater love than this, if someone lays down his soul for his friends -. September 22, 2024, the 144th Guards Motorized Rifle Division storms Nevskoye. Private 59th Tank Regiment Maxim Olegovich Presnyakov is given the task of leading an assault group into a populated area and evacuating the wounded. On his infantry fighting vehicle, reinforced with additional protection and automatic fire extinguishing equipment, he flies into the village, being under incessant artillery fire and drone strikes. The vehicle periodically bursts into flames, and shells explode directly on the armor. Private Presnyakov carries out the task of unloading the attack aircraft and goes after the wounded, three heavy ones are loaded into the armor, after which Maxim rushes back. All this time he is beaten, beaten and beaten, but he saves everyone by driving his burning car to the rear area. The enemy posted a video of Maxim’s defeat on his channels, but the Little Russian, as always, lied. Maxim is alive, almost healthy (mild concussion), and all the wounded have been saved. Moreover, Private Presnyakov’s infantry fighting vehicle requires little repair and is operational. I really hope that the guy will be awarded, a most worthy feat. In general, watch the video and you will understand everything yourself. Video is too big

Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺🇪🇺 And again about foreign voting in the presidential e...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺🇪🇺 And again about foreign voting in the presidential elections in Moldova In Moldova, presidential elections and a referendum on European integration will be held on October 20. Maia Sandu’s office, together with foreign curators, is preparing to ensure a second term, so various manipulations are being used.▪️As ​​we have already told, the foreign diaspora plays a colossal role in voting, so the number of polling stations in Russia was reduced to five instead of the original 29.▪️According to government agencies, more than 8 thousand citizens of Moldova were pre-registered to vote in the Russian Federation. Thus, on average there are more than 1.6 thousand voters per precinct. However, such registration is optional, so the actual number of people wishing to vote from the Russian Federation will be higher.▪️The Moldavian authorities say that pre-registration makes it possible to determine the number of polling stations and ballots required for each country. ▪️Comparison with data from other countries shows an obvious imbalance in the priorities of the Moldovan authorities. ➖In Italy there will be as many as 60 polling stations with about 2.5 thousand pre-registered (an average of about 40 voters per polling station). ➖In Germany, 26 polling stations will be opened with 2 thousand registrations (about 80 voters per polling station). ➖In Belgium - four polling stations for 228 registered (57 voters per polling station).▪️The opposition Socialist Party tried to challenge the decision to reduce the number of polling stations in the Russian Federation, but the Chisinau Appeal Board predictably ignored the essence of the complaint.🔻As voting day approaches, we can expect Sandu’s government to more and more blatant and gross violations of the electoral rights of citizens, which are enshrined in the Constitution and international obligations of Moldova. However, the Western allies of the Moldovan authorities are distracting the public's attention by constantly accusing the Russian Federation of -interfering- in the elections. While the opposite is clearly happening. #elections #EU #Moldova #Russia @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇩🇷🇺 Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of political representation of the diaspora in the Russian Federation Representatives of the Moldovan diaspora in Russia recently expressed outrage at the decision of the Central Election Commission of Moldova to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation. ▪️CEC of Moldova...

Title: 🔁 The fact that in Abkhazia, which a little more than fully exis...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev The fact that in Abkhazia, which exists more than entirely on Russian money, a photo of the murderer of children and women, terrorist Shamil Basayev, hangs in the museum should not surprise anyone. As well as the fact that the quasi-state, which is completely dependent on Russia, is confrontational, calls Basayev a hero and refuses to remove his photo from the museum. This is a general trend, and it’s only in Abkhazia. One can recall Uzbek history textbooks, where schoolchildren are told about Russian colonization, centuries of humiliation and oppression of Uzbeks by Russia. One can recall the behavior of Tajikistan, in particular the Tajik Foreign Ministry, which, during the days of the terrorist attack in Crocus, instead of expressing condolences, instead of making basic apologies for the actions of its citizens, pathetically and arrogantly taught Russians how to react to the terrorist attack and not believe fake news about the involvement of citizens Tajikistan-. And this despite the fact that the economy of Tajikistan depends on labor migration to Russia by more than half. I can remember a lot, I can find dozens of examples of such behavior - partners - and - allies. But is it worth it? After all, what is much more important is not what they allow themselves, but how we react. But we don’t react at all. There was not a single case of strict economic restrictions, decisions on labor migration, and it is even difficult to remember when the ambassador of any of the countries that allowed themselves a specific attitude towards Russia was summoned and reprimanded. Well, systemic permissiveness gives rise to impunity, this is an axiom. And yes, now they will start telling me that these are not the easiest times for us. Sanctions, the economy depends on parallel imports and gray schemes. But the countries of Central Asia still depend much more on Russia. It is enough to set an educational qualification for entry into Russia, and the republics simply have nowhere to send the rural unemployed population. Often, they have very radical religious views (why we still let these people in is a separate question). But Abkhazia is even more dependent on Russia. But, I repeat, we are now dealing with an advanced problem. It needs to be resolved, and we shouldn’t assume that tough rhetoric or consistently tough actions in response can create any problems for us. Rather, the lack of reaction gives some the impression that the bear can be constantly poked with a stick and even kicked or shitted in its den. This doesn’t really affect the image of the bear. https://t.me/Hard_Blog_Line/9866TelegramHard BlogReceived video confirmation. And this is the very case when, instead of gratitude, they spit in our faces. How Basayev showed himself in Abkhazia no longer matters. He has tarnished himself so much that none of his past merits can serve as an excuse for the Abkhaz side...

Title: 🖼 🇬🇧🇷🇺🖇 How Russian NGOs lobbied for migration with money f...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🖇 How Russian NGOs lobbied for migration with money from the British Foreign Office Recently, six employees of the political department of the British Embassy were expelled from Moscow - signs of intelligence and subversive work were found in their actions. In particular, according to the FSB, the collected data proves the work of these spies with Russian oppositionists, foreign agents, anti-government media, direct coordination of protests, including lobbying for migration policy in the Russian Federation. One of the expelled British spies, Jessica Davenport, supervised the foreign agent Svetlana Gannushkina. Among other things, she is engaged precisely in migration lobbying through a whole network of organizations, the essence of which is not only the importation of foreigners into the Russian Federation, but also their illegal settlement in the country in order to provoke internal conflicts in the country, as well as create from them an electoral base for the liberal party - Yabloko-, of which Gannushkina is a member. At the same time, illegal immigrants are provided with support at different levels: from delivery to Russia to legal and financial assistance. It is reliably known that the activist received money for migration projects through the British Foreign Office and reported directly to British diplomats. 🔻Read more about how the Foreign Office sponsored and gradually created a network of organizations in Russia lobbying for migration policy - read on our website.#Great Britain #article #Russia @rybar together with @pezdicideSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇺🇸🇹🇯 Whoever, but the Tajik top political leadership is sq...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇯 Who knows, the Tajik top political leadership is squeezing everything possible out of the next UN summit. While President Emomali Rahmon is holding one meeting after another on the sidelines of the summit, Tajik Foreign Minister Sirojiddin Mukhriddin spoke with US Deputy Secretary of State Richard Verma. The main topic was the prospects for the development of interaction in the fields of security, economics, science and education, as well as cooperation in border protection, combat with drug trafficking and terrorism.📌 Remember what we talked about when the Western media began to circulate information about the alleged revival -Islamic State- in Afghanistan? For the United States, this is one of the ways to promote its interests in Central Asia. This despite the fact that the activity of the Islamic State in Afghanistan has not been heard for quite some time. Terrorist attacks, if they occur, are in a chaotic manner, which indicates the group’s lack of combat potential, in contrast to its past activities in Syria and Iraq. However, the Americans, taking advantage of Tajikistan’s strained relations with the Taliban, are consistently pushing their services to the Tajiks, increasingly trying to to gain a foothold not only through USAID, but also through the US Central Command. 🔻The sad thing about this situation is that for some reason the CSTO is inactive while Tajikistan - a CSTO member and the country where the Russian base is located - seeks security assistance not from the organization it belongs to, but from our geopolitical adversary.# USA #Tajikistan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 25, 2024 ▪️ By nightfall...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 25, 2024▪️ By nightfall, the enemy reported a missile attack on the port of Yuzhny in the Odessa region. In addition, for the third evening in a row, the Russian Armed Forces hit enemy targets in the city of Zaporozhye.▪️ Over the past days, important events have unfolded in Ugledar in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. After several weeks of offensive operations by the Russian Army, the city was taken almost completely; yesterday evening there remained a narrow corridor and one road to the north for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. According to some reports, the road is under our fire control; the only escape route for the enemy remains through the fields. Artillery strikes of all types and aviation on Ugledar have been seriously intensified, and footage of the presence of advanced groups of our infantry in the city has circulated. At the same time, front-line soldiers warn about the inadmissibility of victory reports before the combat mission is resolved: against the backdrop of the unsuccessful offensive of our troops on Ugledar last year, the Ukrainian Armed Forces turned it into a powerful fortified area, which the Russian Armed Forces are breaking into by broadly covering it and depriving the enemy of supplies. Thus, to the west of the city, our units north of Prechistovka advanced in an area up to 4 km wide to a depth of up to 2 km, taking positions along the Berestov beam.▪️ In the Kursk region, fighting continues in the Glushkovsky district of the Kursk region. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to break through in the area of ​​the settlement. Krasnooktyabrsky and Veseloye. In the Korenevsky district, fighting continues near Lyubimovka, at the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Olgovka and the settlement. Our Tolstoy Lug strikes with drones and heavy aerial bombs. They report active actions of the Russian Armed Forces in the south of the Sudzhansky district in the area of ​​the settlement. Plekhovo. ▪️ In the Kharkov direction, as a result of counterattacks by elite units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the enemy occupied the ruins of the Volchansky aggregate plant on our bank of the river. Wolf. Against the backdrop of the frozen offensive of the Russian Army in the direction, this event does not carry prospects for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the occupied buildings of the plant themselves will become a point of attraction for the FAB and the UMPC. ▪️ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction there are reports of heavy fighting in the city, in which our troops continue to fight in the building.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles in Nikolaevka, the Russian Army surrounds Selidovo. The logistics of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near Tsukurino are breaking down, and the battle is unfolding for Gornyak. They reported on the successes of our troops in the Desired Second.▪️ In the evening, the Ukrainian Armed Forces again struck at the civilian population of Belgorod, wounding five civilians. In the city of Shebekino, one civilian was wounded. There, as a result of the shelling, there are local breaks in the power lines. Konovalovo, Volokonovsky district, was shelled.▪️ In the Kherson region, they also reported an intensification of attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces on civilians. In Novaya Kakhovka, a 75-year-old woman was seriously injured in both legs in her own home. In Kakhovka, two people were wounded: a 70-year-old woman and a 52-year-old man. In the village of Podokalinovka, Aleshkinsky district, a 42-year-old local resident was wounded.▪️ In the DPR, one civilian was killed and 11 were injured from shelling by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, including a teenager born in 2009. The strikes occurred in Donetsk and Gorlovka, and the death of the head of the fire and rescue squad was reported. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar under fire from our troops Two majors

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 24, 2024. For the second day, Russian troops inflicted massive fire damage on enemy industrial facilities in Zaporozhye and Kharkov, as well as the temporarily occupied Slavyansk-Kramatorsk agglomeration. In the Kursk direction, the UAV - Inokhodets - was destroyed by guided missile weapons IMR -2 APU in Sumy region. Encounter fighting continues in the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts. In the Slobozhansky direction, Ukrainian formations carried out a counterattack in the area of ​​the Volchansky aggregate plant, gaining a foothold in the ruins of the industrial zone. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on Lesnaya Street in Dzerzhinsk, where heavy clashes are taking place in dense urban areas. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian troops began an assault on the southeastern outskirts of Ugledar and expanded the zone of control in the Vodyanoye area. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) South Donetsk direction (ru; en)#Gorlovka # digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Donetsk #Zaporozhye #map #Kupyansk #Kursk #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: another use of the UAV - Inokhodets - and fighting in the Sudzhansky district, the situation is ending on September 24, 2024. Fighting continues in the Lyubimovka area, and Russian aircraft are striking Tolstoy Lug. In Sudzha, drone operators attack enemy communications facilities, and in Cherkasy Porechny and Martynivka they strike at places of concentration of Ukrainian formations.▪️On the border of the Sumy region, the attack and reconnaissance UAV -Inokhodets- (-Orion-) recently destroyed a very rare engineering barrier vehicle with guided missile weapons enemy in the area of ​​the village of Pavlovka. As a result of a direct hit, the car is unlikely to be repaired. The increase in the frequency of URVP strikes from -Ambler- and -Forpost- is also associated with effective strikes on air defense and radar systems, which made it possible to use these types of drones relatively safely. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: worsening operational crisis...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: worsening operational crisis of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the assault on Ugledar situation as of 21.00 September 24, 2024 Over the past week, Russian troops were able to achieve significant successes in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, advancing in several sectors. And while today Ukrainian media resources were trying to somehow justify the depressing situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Ugledar area, footage of Russian attack aircraft entering the city from the dachas appeared on the Internet. ▪️On the northern flank, Russian units established full control over the territory of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 3 mine, on the roof of the administrative building of which the flags of several units were fixed. The area adjacent to the mine was also cleared. ▪️To the south, the situation in the vicinity of the waste heap at the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1 mine remains unclear. At the moment, the hill itself, as well as the area to the east of it, is in the gray zone. However, judging by the current situation in the direction, in the near future we can expect a quick transition to the control of the Russian Armed Forces of both the waste heap itself and the territory nearby. ▪️In Ugledar, Russian attack aircraft are present at least on the eastern outskirts of the settlement: according to footage that appeared on the Internet, military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the buildings of a former bakery and pumping station. And in the future we can expect an offensive towards both the city center and the garage cooperative, which is located in the northeastern part of Ugledar. It is noteworthy that the enemy’s media resources depict a much more depressing situation for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, increasingly hinting at the imminent fall of the Ukrainian garrison in the city. In particular, the description of the situation often comes down to one thought: it’s too late to talk about holding positions; the lives of members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are more important. Although no matter how much I would like to see the Ugledar epic end as soon as possible, without the appropriate personnel it is extremely premature to talk about the occupation of the city - the Ukrainian formations turned the settlement into one continuous fortified area and its loss would be quite a strong media blow for the enemy. ▪️The dachas located south of Ugledar are also highly likely to have come under the control of Russian troops. In their eastern part, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces gained a foothold a few days ago, however, given the start of the fighting for the city, it is virtually pointless for the Ukrainian Armed Forces units to hold the western half. ▪️In neighboring Pavlovka, Russian troops were able not only to level the control zone along the Kashlagach River, but also to occupy the territory of farms in the northern part of the village. Advancement in this area has already allowed the Russian Armed Forces to establish fire control over the C051134 highway towards Bogoyavlenka, significantly complicating the supply of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybar together with @voin_dvSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: IDF announc...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: IDF announcement of an air operation in Lebanon situation at the end of September 24, 2024 The Israeli Air Force continues to launch massive attacks on the territory of the neighboring Republic of Lebanon. Against the backdrop of what is happening in the Israel Defense Forces, they announced the start of Operation Hetzei HaTzaphon (Arrows of the North). Due to the peculiarities of translation from Hebrew into English and then into Russian, as well as in attempts to catch the wave, some resources reported already about the beginning of the offensive of Israeli units in southern Lebanon. In fact, the actions of the Israelis are so far limited to air strikes.▪️Today's Israeli air strikes occurred not only in the border areas of Lebanon: settlements located more than 100 kilometers from the border with Israel, including Ain Al, were also attacked. ▪️In addition, the Ad-Dahiya district, Hezbollah’s patrimony in Beirut, was once again struck. The IDF press service announced the liquidation of the commander of the missile unit of the Shiite group, Ibrahim Muhammad al-Kubaisi. At the same time, Arabic-language media have not yet commented on this message. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, 558 people have been killed and 1,853 injured since yesterday. The mass exodus of Lebanese from the southern part of the country also continues: they are fleeing to the cities of Tripoli and Beirut, as well as to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. Hezbollah fighters also do not stop shelling Israeli territory in response: more than 100 rockets have been fired since the morning. Most were either intercepted by Israeli missile defense systems or fell in open areas. Only a small number of shells managed to land within populated areas, causing minor damage. Based on the reported hits, the Lebanese group’s forces also expanded the shelling zone by more than 100 kilometers. This is confirmed, among other things, by yesterday’s arrivals of missiles fired by Hezbollah into the territory of the Palestinian Authority in the West Bank.🔻Despite the rather tense situation, so far the parties are limited to only massive strikes on each other’s positions. At the same time, the current ultra-Orthodox authorities in Israel do not stop their attempts to provoke the Lebanese to a more serious response. Until then, Hezbollah is trying not to give the far-right government of Benjamin Netanyahu a reason to unleash a full-fledged Third Lebanon War. Despite the accusations of Israeli propaganda, the beneficiary of an escalation of this magnitude will not be the Shiite group. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 There are few absolutely clear heroes in world history; ever...
Description: Forwarded From Tina Kandelaki There are few absolutely unambiguous heroes in world history; if you dig around, you can find some kind of black spot in each of them. But there are characters who, through their crimes, have completely undone everything good that they have ever done. It is sad that not everyone in Abkhazia understands this basic truth. Otherwise, there would not have been an exhibition dedicated to Shamil Basayev in the State Museum in Sukhum, restored with Russian money. Well, we will have to remind those who have forgotten that the Hero of Abkhazia Basayev in Russia most willingly fought with the unarmed, women and children. The terrorist attack at a Beslan school in September 2004 killed 333 people, including 186 children. The terrorist attack at the Dubrovka theater center in Moscow in October 2002 killed 130 people, including 10 children. The terrorist attack in Budennovsk in June 1995, when 129 people died in a hospital seized by terrorists. Basayev publicly and willingly took responsibility for all these terrible crimes, and personally led the raid on Budennovsk. I will not make generalizations and ask what kind of country is this if it has such heroes? I’ll just note that the State Museum of Abkhazia still has the opportunity to make an official apology to Russian representatives. Just apologize, there is no need to explain anything, everything is clear. The answer to the question of how it happened that a terrorist still bears the title of -Hero- in a country whose very existence is possible only thanks to Russia should not be given by museum employees, but by completely different people. UPD: The museum in Abkhazia quickly closed access to exhibition. That's what popular outrage does.

Title: 🇲🇩 About the demographic catastrophe in Moldova and why it is b...
Description: 🇲🇩 About the demographic catastrophe in Moldova and why it is beneficial to the West Moldova took first place in Europe in the outflow of citizens abroad. This was stated by the presidential candidate of the republic, Alexander Stoianoglo, promising, if elected, to ensure stimulation of the birth rate and conditions for a dignified return of fellow citizens home. ▪️Everyone admits that Moldova is moving towards a demographic catastrophe. Although in late Soviet times Moldova was in second place in the USSR in terms of population growth dynamics, and now its population has dropped to the level of 1956.▪️The mass outflow from the country has intensified in recent years due to the socio-economic crisis. More than 40% of Moldovans aged 15 to 34 chose to leave the country amid fears of becoming unemployed. For example, in 2023 the birth rate fell by 11% compared to 2022. ▪️However, President Maia Sandu, in the spirit of populism, assures that the outflow of young people is caused by the rule of her predecessors, who undermined -faith in democracy-. ▪️True, the demographic situation became critical during Sandu’s reign. Instead of concrete steps in social policy, the president prefers to intimidate the population by announcing the Russian threat and increasing the military budget by 70% at the expense of other areas, which certainly does not contribute to the birth rate. However, Sandu’s office’s recipe for solving the problem is a gradual merger with Romania , for which Moldovans are encouraged to identify themselves as Romanians. ▪️However, even a possible unification of the countries will not solve the problem, given that the Romanian authorities are extremely dismissive of the Moldovans who live even in eastern Romania, historical Moldova. The region is deliberately not being developed, and there are also colossal problems with demography and economics. 🔻From all this, it is clear that neither Sandu nor her curators simply need to solve the demographic problem. After all, Moldova is already considered as a gray zone between the Russian Federation and NATO and a convenient military training ground next to the so-called. Ukraine. As a last resort, the West will propose to populate Moldova with illegal migrants. New controlled countries on the periphery of Europe will do just that. At least such negotiations are already underway with Armenia. #Moldova #Russia #Romania #EU @rybarSupport usRIA NovostiMoldova has become a leader in Europe in the departure of citizens, Stoianoglo saidMoldova has lost about a third of its citizens due to the mass exodus of the population, the ex-Prosecutor General and presidential candidate said at a briefing on Monday... RIA News, 09/23/2024

Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇺🇸 On guarantees of security of the southern borders of...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇺🇸 On guarantees for the security of Armenia’s southern borders Anna Grigoryan, a member of the parliamentary faction of the opposition bloc -Armenia, said that the government of Nikol Pashinyan will soon put on the agenda the issue of the withdrawal of Russian border guards from the Armenian-Iranian and Armenian-Turkish border. 📌 Let us remind you that border control of the borders of Armenia is carried out by the FSB of the Russian Federation, since Armenians do not have enough personnel and resources to protect them. At the same time, Russian border guards have already been withdrawn from Yerevan airport - Zvartnots -.▪️The border with Iran in the south of Armenia is directly related to the issue of the status of the Syunik region, through which it is planned to open the Zangezur corridor connecting Turkey and Azerbaijan. ▪️According to Grigoryan, all statements by the Armenian side demanding respect for the sovereignty of Armenia have no relation to reality: in fact, they are aimed at ousting Russia from the region. ▪️The opening of the corridor is a matter of time and now a struggle is unfolding between global players for control over it. Pashinyan contradicts himself when he talks about protecting the sovereignty of Armenia in Syunik, since at the same time he declares that control over the road will be transferred to a third party - - private security organization - or troops of other countries. ▪️In Syunik, despite the deployment of the Russian garrison since 2020, there is an EU monitoring mission that is engaged in active PR on social networks, mastering the role of a guarantor of regional security (not always successfully). ▪️In recent months, Syunik has been actively visited by American and European officials. At the same time, it is known that the Armenian authorities are deliberately delaying the opening of the Russian consulate in Syunik Kapan, which should have opened at the beginning of this year. Obviously, the issue of ousting Russia from the region is key on the agenda for Pashinyan and his curators. It is not without reason that the Armenian prime minister recently decided to declare that the CSTO allegedly threatens the national security of Armenia, which foreshadows concrete steps in the future. Washington is openly talking about its ambitions to oust Russia from the region. However, such a castling will lead to much more unpredictable consequences, given the complex configuration of interests of other regional players larger than Armenia. However, the Americans themselves do not hide this, directly calling on Armenians to prepare for difficult times. #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport usVerelq NewsThe issue of ousting Russian border guards from the border with Iran will soon be put on the agenda. Grigoryan noted that the matter will not be limited to ousting the Russian side from this project.

Title: 🖼 ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Fisherman No. 30: Once upon a time at ...
Description: ⚡️🇷🇺🇺🇦🖍#Comic from Rybar No. 30: Once Upon a Time Since sea and air drones have become almost the main threat to Russian infrastructure, the Russian Armed Forces and volunteers are constantly looking for solutions on how to effectively counter them. But sometimes the solution becomes not the most obvious, but at the same time simple ideas. Shooting down BECs from helicopters is just one of those things. And our new episode is about how this idea was born and why pilots like it so much. Synopsis: The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying by all means to inflict damage on military - and, indeed, civilian - targets in Russia. Instead of effective long-range weapons, the Armed Forces of Ukraine use a large number of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and unmanned boats (UBC). Single BECs can damage port infrastructure or a sea vessel. They became a real headache, which turned out to be quite difficult to deal with. And so, helicopters proved to be an effective means in the fight against this type of weapon. They patrol the sea in search of targets and, hovering in the air, practice targeting BECs using onboard weapons. But not everything is so simple: the enemy does not sit idly by, he changes and improves both attack tactics and the devices themselves. In addition to the usual custom kamikaze boats, BECs armed with missiles, and BECs equipped with guides for MLRS projectiles, and BECs with reinforced hulls, whose task is to divert fire onto themselves while the rest of the flock of drones is trying to break through to the target...📌 You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of...
Description: 🇲🇩🇷🇺 Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of political representation of the diaspora in the Russian Federation Representatives of the Moldovan diaspora in Russia recently expressed outrage at the decision of the Central Election Commission of Moldova to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation. ▪️The Central Election Commission of Moldova will send only five thousand ballots to each polling station, that is, only 25 thousand out of almost 100 thousand representatives of the diaspora will be able to cast their votes. ▪️The Cultural and Educational Center of Moldova in Stavropol said that the authorities know that we are against it, that there are many of us, that’s why they do such dirty tricks. ❗️The foreign diaspora plays a colossal role in the Moldovan elections, given the large-scale labor migration of Moldovans. ▪️In 2019, 13,995 people voted in the second round of the presidential elections in Moldova in the Russian Federation.▪️In France, Germany and the UK, Moldovan citizens cast at least 20 thousand votes. For example, in Italy alone, the candidacy of incumbent President Maia Sandu received 80,140 votes.▪️In the parliamentary elections in the summer of 2021, Sandu’s now ruling PAS party won a crushing victory based on the results of foreign voting, receiving 182,654 votes - 85.98%.▪️Experience previous elections demonstrates the critical importance of foreign voting for Sandu's office. That is why the current president, throughout her entire term, met with representatives of the diaspora during any business trip to the West.▪️The election fraud of Sandu’s office is also voting by mail only for selected countries: the USA, Canada, Iceland, Norway, Finland and Sweden. Obviously, voting by mail was not provided for Moldovans in Russia, since Sandu’s office is unlikely to get the desired result from them than from countries of friendly democracy.▪️Let’s not forget that the Central Election Commission of Moldova is under the direct control of the American USAID and the British UK Aid, so there is no way to say that there is any transparency in the electoral process. 🔻However, along with such trends, it is necessary to note the passivity of the Moldovan diaspora in the Russian Federation, with which, unlike Western diasporas, no one is working systematically so far. Even despite the fact that pro-Romanian and anti-Russian forces have long come to power in Moldova. In this context, statements by Sandu and Western representatives about Russian interference in the Moldovan elections look especially ridiculous. #Moldova #Russia   @rybarSupport usSputnik MoldovaDiaspora - about the CEC’s decision to open only 5 polling stations in Russia: we were deprived of the right to voteCitizens of Moldova living in Russia are outraged by the CEC’s decision to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation.

Title: 🎬 🇦🇿🇵🇰 Speaking of the militarization of Azerbaijan: footage...
Description: 🇦🇿🇵🇰 Speaking of the militarization of Azerbaijan: footage of JF-17 fighter jets flying over Azerbaijan has appeared on the Internet. The authenticity of the video has not been officially confirmed, but against the backdrop of other events it looks quite plausible. Early this year it became known that the Azerbaijanis had chosen the Chinese-Pakistani JF-17C fighter as a replacement for the outdated MiG-29. In total, it was planned to purchase about 60 units. Updating the aviation fleet is an important component of any army, which is what they are doing in Baku. It is curious that their main geopolitical enemy at the moment, represented by Armenia, is doing practically nothing in the matter of real strengthening of the armed forces. Of course, fighters of this type were used only once in combat, and their real capabilities are in question. However, these are still new, completely modern aircraft, while the Armenians so far have only a chaotic purchase of everything in the world without any consistency. #Azerbaijan #Pakistan@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 24, 2024 ▪️ Activity con...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 24, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, enemy activity continues to the south of the settlement. Funny, the enemy does not stop wasting NATO armored vehicles, they report that a Swedish infantry fighting vehicle has been burned. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, the enemy is suffering losses as a result of the massive use of heavy aerial bombs by the Russian Armed Forces near the settlement. Tolsty Lug and Kamyshevka. Despite the intensity of the fighting, the line of combat contact has not undergone significant changes.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, the movement of our troops from the Peschanovsky wedge to Kruglyakovka is important. In the future, this will allow us to reach the line along the river. Oskol, and also forms a semi-encirclement of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on our bank of the river.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army, moving west from Ukrainsk, reached the northern outskirts of Tsukurino. To the south there are battles on the approaches to Gornyak, the Russian Armed Forces also fought in the neighboring Zhelanny Vtoroy, closing the pincers to Krasnogorovka. ▪️ Ukrainian Armed Forces forces in Ugledar are under threat of encirclement. The only road from the city to Epiphany is under our fire. They reported about our advanced units within the city.▪️ On the Zaporozhye Front, a significant element of the situation was the use by the Russian Armed Forces of new aerial bombs with UMPC and UPMB on targets in the regional capital. ▪️ Mutual strikes across the Dnieper River continue in the Kherson direction. On our shore in Kakhovka, a 38-year-old local resident received multiple shrapnel wounds, the wife of the head doctor of the front-line Aleshkinsky district hospital, Doctor, was killed, and the head doctor himself was wounded.▪️ In the Belgorod region, as a result of an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, three civilians, including a child, died in the village of Arkhangelskoye, Shebekinsky city district, four (including two children) were injured. Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, was shelled; in Shebekino, a kamikaze drone attacked a parked car. In the evening, in the Belgorod region, near the village of Yasnye Zori, a drone struck a moving car. In the Grayvoronsky municipal district, a drone attacked a combine harvester working in a field. In the village of Vyazovoe, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, as a result of an FPV drone attack, the glazing was knocked out and the façade of a social facility was cut. In the city of Shebekino, a drone attacked an apartment building.▪️ In the DPR in Donetsk, the Armed Forces of Ukraine used cluster artillery munitions, a man born in 1961 was injured. In Gorlovka, a man born in 1950 was injured as a result of a cannon artillery strike from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk regionIn the area of ​​the settlement. Tolsty Lug, the enemy is holding the defense, our troops are pushing back the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the west. The footage shows the use of FAB today on enemy positions. Two majors and a detachment of Smuglyanka

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation On September 23, 2024, Russian troops launched a missile attack on one of the workshops of the Motor Sich enterprise in occupied Zaporozhye. A series of explosions also occurred in Kramatorsk in the occupied part of the DPR. In the Kursk region, Ukrainian troops attack in the Glushkovsky district, and the Russian Armed Forces strike at the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Sudzhansky and Korenevsky. In the Kupyansko-Svatovsky direction, Russian troops advance in the direction of Kruglyakovka, advancing several kilometers to west. In the Alexander-Kalinovsky direction, Russian troops storm the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration, taking full control of Kirovo. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces made significant progress on the northwestern outskirts of Grodovka towards Nikolaevka. In the Donetsk direction, Russian troops liberated Zhelannye First, starting battles for Zhelannye The second, the capture of which will allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to encircle the fields east of Nevelskoye. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces are fighting on the approaches to Ugledar and attacking from flags, trying to encircle the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the city.🔻Detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction (ru; en)Donetsk direction (ru; en)South Donetsk direction (ru; en)#Gorlovka #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Donetsk #Zaporozhye #map #Kupyansk #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles in the Korenevsky and Glushk...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting in the Korenevsky and Glushkovsky districts situation towards the end of September 23, 2024 Fierce fighting continues in the Kursk direction on several sectors of the front. In the Glushkovsky region, the enemy does not stop attacks both in the vicinity of Vesely and advancing on the village itself. Russian troops fire at armored vehicles with drone strikes, also destroying another Swedish CV-9040 infantry fighting vehicle. During the fighting, the Ukrainian Armed Forces slightly expanded the zone of control south of the settlement. The operational-tactical aviation of the Russian Aerospace Forces strikes at Medvezhye and neighboring Obod. 🔻There are clashes in the Korenevsky district, and the enemy has transferred reinforcements to Olgovka, where the cluster was covered by a FAB-3000 strike. Meanwhile, fighting continues on the eastern outskirts of Lyubimovka, and air strikes are also carried out on Tolstoy Lug and surrounding forest plantations. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district in the area of ​​Novaya Sorochina, according to objective control personnel, an attempt to advance the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the direction of Kamyshevka is recorded. At the same time, extremely contradictory information is being received about Malaya Lokna - allegedly there is still a presence of detachments of the RF Armed Forces in the village. At the Martynovka - Kruglik border, it was possible to clarify the zone of control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The enemy occupied at least part of the forest in the gullies near the Smerditsa River north of Martynovka. There was no information from other areas about changes in control zones or attacks.
