Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for September 23, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched strikes on the southern and western quarters of Gaza. In addition, Jabaliya, located to the north, came under fire. In the south of the Gaza Strip, sporadic clashes were recorded in the eastern part of Rafah. Militants of the military wing of Hamas, meanwhile, reported an ambush on an Israeli armored column, again without providing evidence. Operation Summer Camps continues in the West Bank; 16 Palestinians were arrested by Israeli security forces in 24 hours. In total, the total number of Palestinians detained in the region since October 7, 2023 is 10,800. Israeli troops again launched massive attacks on Lebanon, including Beirut, where the target was another high-ranking Hezbollah commander. In response, the Lebanese group fired volleys at Israel, with some of the ammunition falling on the territory of the Palestinian Authority.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massi...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massive raid by the IDF Air Force on Lebanon and arrivals in the West Bank, the situation towards the end September 23, 2024 The situation on the border of Lebanon and Israel continues to deteriorate. Today, the Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the territory of the neighboring republic: not only border areas were under fire, but also cities located at a great distance from the border, including Baalbek.▪️According to statements by the IDF press service, the strikes were preemptive in nature and were carried out in order to to undermine Hezbollah's ability to bombard northern Israel. The target of the bombing was ammunition depots - there are many videos on the Internet of secondary detonations after the arrivals.▪️As ​​of the evening, there were at least 300 launches from fighters. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, 274 people were killed and 1,024 were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, it is not specified exactly how many casualties were among the civilian population and members of Hezbollah.❗Amid the raid, a mass exodus of residents of the southern part of Lebanon began - it occurred after people’s phones began receiving calls from Israel calling for an urgent evacuation. The IDF limited itself to asking them to stay away from Lebanese Hezbollah targets in order to avoid casualties.▪️In response to the strikes by Israeli troops, the Lebanese group fired several salvos, firing more than 100 rockets in the morning. Some of them reached Palestinian territories in the West Bank and fell in the vicinity of both Jewish settlements and Arab villages, leading to fires.▪️Not wanting to reduce the intensity of tension, the Israelis soon attacked the Lebanese capital Beirut once again: hits hit a residential apartment in the controlled - Hezbollah - Ad-Dahiya region. According to preliminary information, Ali Karaki, in fact the third person in the leadership of the organization, was eliminated. Expectedly, the current Israeli authorities, under previously stated pretexts, continued massive attacks on Lebanon. The goal here is not only to destroy Hezbollah’s combat potential, but also to try to provoke it into a response that would free the government’s hands to further escalate the conflict. Most likely, attacks of this scale will continue until the ultra-Orthodox authorities achieve the outbreak of a full-fledged Third Lebanon War , which guarantees the possibility of their continued stay in power. Moreover, this fact is understood on both sides of the front. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Official reports about the preparation of the seizure of...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Official reports about the preparation of the seizure of power in Odessa and the valiant work of the Ukrainian special services, in fact, legalize the fact of the presence of organized resistance on the territory of the so-called Ukraine. But this is exactly what the Kyiv authorities consistently denied for two and a half years, assuring everyone the world community in all people's love, support and legitimacy.📌And since there is organized resistance, we can purely hypothetically assume that it will still raise its head. Now imagine that this hypothetical resistance will not only set fire to cars, distribute leaflets, eliminate TCC employees, but will go further. Let’s say, seize a weapon supplied by the West - for example, one M270 or HIMARS - and direct it not to the north, but towards the conditional Romania, Moldova or Poland. These will turn out to be Houthis in the Odessa style. What a picture it would be: Russia, it turns out, has nothing to do with it, because this is popular resistance. And it turned out to be inconvenient, because what the West set up got out of control. It’s a pity that this is just a hypothetical scenario. Although there didn’t seem to be any resistance either. #Odessa #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost. The Ukrainian Security Service detained several people who allegedly tried to seize power by force in Odessa. As noted, more than 70 firearms with optical sights and ammunition, as well as body armor, were confiscated from the detainees...

Title: 🔁🖼 Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024. Colonel General Kuzovlev He did not ask for the position and, based on purely statistical indicators, did not have significant defeats. Having managed to command two districts at once in six months and eventually become the commander of the Moscow Military District, he did not spend a single day at the newly opened headquarters on Kosmodamianskaya Embankment, for which he immediately came to the attention of Old Arbat officials, becoming the object of personal hostility. Kuzovlev was among the first to promptly formed and sent personnel to stop the breakthrough in the Kursk direction. And although Kursk was and remains the area of ​​​​responsibility of the Grv (s) -North, the commander of the Moscow Military District did not fail to lend a helping hand to his comrade at the front. On September 11, 2024, Andrei Belousov arrived at the command post of the Grv (s) -West. The Minister of Defense tried to test the environment and understand what kind of mood prevailed at the group’s headquarters, for which he took Evgeny Nikiforov with him. The inspection not only did not reveal any violations, but was also fully satisfied with the group’s work. Today, the forces of the Grv(s) -West are destroying the enemy’s layered defenses on the approaches to Kupyansk and have already reached the Oskol River, and revenge for the events of the fall of 2022 will be the main thing a challenge for Sergei Kuzovlev himself. Colonel General Anashkin The command highly appreciated his services as commander of the 8th Army. Having become the chief of staff of the district in January 2024, just two months later Gennady Anashkin was appointed commander of the Southern Military District and awarded the Order of Merit for the Fatherland, 2nd class with swords. The South group of troops today has significantly increased its forces: back in July, enemy sources wrote on the accumulation of reserves in the Zaporozhye direction. Throughout the year, Anashkin has been increasing the combat and numerical strength of the district’s artillery brigades using cannon artillery, largely thanks to friendly relations with his neighbor in the operational direction and concurrently the deputy commander of the OGV (s) Mikhail Teplinsky. Despite the ongoing positional battles in the direction, the command of the OGV ( c) believes that it is the South group that will have to win the strategic initiative in 2025, but Anashkin himself strives not to appear in the information field and does not use hardware resources for PR campaigns, believing that a good commander is an inconspicuous commander. Art in high resolution@arbat

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 A few days after the raid on Beirut, the Israeli Air ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 A few days after the raid on Beirut, the Israeli Air Force again worked on the Lebanese capital: in the Ad-Dahiya district - Hezbollah's patrimony in the city - six missiles were launched from fighter jets. The hits hit a residential building. As the press service of the Israel Defense Forces stated, the target was another high-ranking leader of the Lebanese group, Ali Karaki, the commander of its southern front. He is nominally the third person in the leadership of the Shiite organization. According to Israeli media, after the death of special forces commander Radwan Ibrahim Aqil Karaki took his place as a result of a previous airstrike on Beirut. If the information is confirmed, this means that the Israelis destroyed the entire military leadership of Hezbollah. Against this background, the statement by Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant that the group's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah was left alone does not sound so far-fetched.#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇧🇫🇮🇷⚛️ As part of the next IAEA meeting in Vienna, representa...
Description: 🇧🇫🇮🇷⚛️ As part of the regular IAEA meeting in Vienna, representatives of the authorities of Burkina Faso and Iran signed a memorandum of understanding on cooperation in peaceful nuclear activities. The news once again indicates the intentions of the leadership in Tehran to expand the geography of uranium development. There is still not as much uranium ore in Burkina Faso as in neighboring Niger, but the Islamic Republic did not succeed with the latter due to Western intervention. There is another side to the situation - there is a possibility that Iranian companies may try to take a share in market, displacing Russian projects. And there is interest in the country in Moscow - Rosatom recently entered the final stage of agreeing on the construction of a nuclear power plant in Burkina Faso. Of course, the conclusion by the authorities in Ouagadougou of an agreement with a country close to Russia is much better than similar agreements with the West. And yet, a holy place is never empty; there are enough people willing to take advantage of our bureaucratic problems even among friendly states.#Africa #BurkinaFaso #Iran #energy@rybarSupport usenglish.news.cnIran, Burkina Faso sign MoU for peaceful nuclear cooperationTEHRAN, Sept. 19 (Xinhua) -- Iran and Burkina Faso have signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) for cooperation in peaceful nuclear activities, Iran's official news agency IRNA reported Thursday.

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction: a breakthrough to Kru...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction: a push towards Kruglyakovkasituation as of 17:00 September 23, 2024 In the Kupyansko-Svatovskoe direction, the offensive continues to develop from the previously taken Peschany, attacking in several directions at once. ▪️To the northwest of the village, the Russian Armed Forces are securing new positions in forest belts, from where about six kilometers remain to the outskirts of Novoosinovo. To the southwest, a significant advance of Russian troops was recorded in the Peschany area. Judging by the footage of objective control, Russian troops are fighting on the territory of one of the large strongholds, from where the northern outskirts of Kruglyakovka are less than two and a half kilometers away.▪️At the same time, there has been no information yet about the withdrawal of Ukrainian formations from the Volchy forest and nearby balkas, exactly the same as about the retreat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the -pocket- of Berestovoy. Considering the configuration of the terrain, it is quite possible that there will still be a focal presence of enemy forces in this zone.▪️To the north, the Russian Armed Forces established full control over Kislovka, repelling several attacks in the direction of neighboring Kotlyarka. They also improved the tactical situation in the forests near Sinkovka, and the Aerospace Forces aviation continues to systematically strike at the pontoon crossings of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Oskol River in the Kupyansk-Uzlovoy area. persist, then in the near future we should expect the Russian Armed Forces to reach the water barrier with a further cutting in two of the Ukrainian group on the left bank of the Oskol River. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kupyansk #Russia #Svatovo #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇺🇸🇹🇩 In parallel with the US Africa Command conference in Cam...
Description: 🇺🇸🇹🇩 In parallel with the conference of the US Africa Command in Cameroon, news flashed about mutual understanding on the issue of the return of American Green Berets to Chad, as stated by the head of the coordination headquarters for West Africa, General Kenneth Ekman. The Chadian Foreign Ministry denied statements with the wording that At the moment there are no such agreements, thereby not denying the fact that they are being worked out. That is, the leadership in N'Djamena, although it delayed negotiations on the renewal of agreements with the United States, was unable to cope with external pressure.📌 When in the spring of 2024 it became known about the intention of the Chadian authorities to end the American military presence, it resembled an electoral move to gain additional votes in anticipation of local presidential elections. When they took place, and the necessary results were obtained, then in N'Djamena they simply decided to play back. All this is another evidence that the influence of the collective West on Chad still remains significant and is clearly manifested in various things - from the deployment of a contingent from NATO member Hungary before external economic pressure.#Africa #USA #Chad@rybarSupport usVoice of AmericaUS general: US, Chad planning return of US troopsUS also moving forces into West African coast in reshuffle around Niger withdrawal

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces on the Konstantinovka-Vodyanoye and Novodonetskoye-Prechistovka borders; situation as of 13.00 on September 23, 2024. Russian troops continue to implement a chain of offensive actions in several sectors of the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. 🔻At the Konstantinovka-Vodyanoye line, units of the Russian Armed Forces were able to advance into the forest belts in the vicinity of the Solenenkaya gully, having traveled about half the way to the southern outskirts of Katerynovka.🔻In the Vodyanoye area, Russian attack aircraft reached the forest belt closest to the settlement from the west, and also continue to fight in the mine area -South Donbass No. 3-. By the morning of this day, the enemy was finally knocked out of their positions in the industrial zone. Artillery and aviation strikes continue in Ugledar and the surrounding area, as well as the arrival of attack UAVs. There have been no reports of an attack in the direction of the city itself from the south, which, however, is understandable given the experience of previous attempts. To the east there are battles in the dachas, which the Russian Armed Forces fighters latched on to a few days ago.🔻West of Pavlovka, halfway to Prechistovka, a slight advance of the Russian Armed Forces was again recorded. Judging by the footage on the Internet, Russian attack aircraft in an armored personnel carrier dropped into a forest belt not far from the Berestovaya gully, which runs parallel to the Kashlagach River. 🔻At the Prechistovka-Novodonetskoe line, the front also began to move: some time ago, Russian troops began to advance in the area of ​​the Shaitanka Grave mound 167.7, and by the middle of the week they had captured several forest belts towards Zolotaya Niva. ▪️The offensive was preceded by artillery preparation, including shelling from TOS-1A heavy flamethrower systems, and UAV operators hit the Caesar self-propelled gun. However, it was not possible to break through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces here, and some of the assault groups retreated to their original positions. Title: 🇺🇸 On the prospects of a shutdown in the US on the eve of the U...
Description: 🇺🇸 On the prospects of a shutdown in the US ahead of the elections, the US Congress is once again faced with the possibility of temporarily suspending the work of the federal government on September 30. The main disagreements between the parties, as before, relate to budget priorities, especially regarding funding for defense and social programs. Republicans, especially in the House of Representatives, are pushing for spending cuts and want to keep funding at 2024 levels. Democrats, in turn, support increasing them through 2025 to fulfill promises to improve social and defense programs. House Speaker Mike Johnson until recently pushed for a GOP-friendly stopgap spending bill that would fund the federal government for another six months. The bill meant maintaining spending at 2024 levels without increasing funding for some programs. 🔻In addition, it contained one very important point proposed by Donald Trump - a bill (SAVE Act) requiring proof of citizenship for voter registration in elections. In this way, the former president hoped to thwart the Democrats' plan to win the election by attracting thousands of illegal migrants to vote for Kamala Harris. However, on September 19, Johnson suffered a major setback: 14 Republicans, joining almost all Democrats, voted against the proposed bill. Conservatives felt that the act did not include sufficient measures to cut costs, hawks were concerned about the possibility of undermining the US defense potential, and moderates were worried about the threat of a shutdown too close to the elections. As a result, on September 23, Mike Johnson broke down under the pressure of his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called -Plan B-. It provides for the approval of a spending bill that extends the government until December 20 of this year, and also excludes the SAVE Act promoted by Trump. Despite the fact that Johnson, during negotiations with Trump, managed to convince him that the shutdown would have a much worse impact on the president's position in the election rather than repealing the SAVE Act, the consequences of the failure of Johnson's original plan are obvious. The absence of a law requiring citizenship to register voters in elections will allow Kamala Harris and Co. to attract hundreds of thousands of illegal migrants to vote for themselves.#USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican number⚫️ Yes, yes: Speaker of the House of Representatives, Republican Mike Johnson, broke under the pressure his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called Plan B. It provides for the approval of a spending bill that extends the work  government...

Title: 🇷🇺🇰🇿 About the project of the International Organization for ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇰🇿 About the project of the International Organization for the Russian Language Against the background of Turkey’s active actions to promote a single Turkic alphabet in Central Asia, many wondered: is there really no alternative on our part? Well, formally there is, and Maria Zakharova reminded about it during the briefing on the sidelines of the 15th Eurasian Women's Forum in St. Petersburg on September 20. 📌We are talking about the creation of an International Organization for the Russian Language, a decision about which was made about a year ago by the leaders of the CIS at a meeting in Bishkek. Zakharova was quite optimistic about the prospects for this organization to quickly formalize and begin work, and became in fact the first major Russian official to remember the project this year. According to the plan voiced by the President of Kazakhstan Tokayev, the organization was supposed to become almost the second Fracophonie or at least the Commonwealth Portuguese-speaking countries, but in fact it has become an opportunity for Kazakhstan to reject accusations of de-Russification of the country and so far serves only this thesis. At the same time, we will not agree with the optimism of our Foreign Ministry regarding the prospects of the organization. According to our information, the procedure for the official ratification of this agreement by at least three CIS states that signed it has not been completed, which is necessary to launch organizational procedures and hold the long-awaited ministerial conference, which should launch the process of actually creating the organization. Moreover, the only activity of responsible structures in this direction is the internal struggle for the post of formal leader (secretary, coordinator, etc.) of this organization, as well as the determination of Sochi (and not St. Petersburg, as Tokayev proposed) as the location of the Secretariat. If the promotion of the Russian language will be carried out at the same pace and with the same enthusiasm, then indeed Central Asia will soon speak Turkish. #Kazakhstan #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTACCIt was decided to establish an international organization for the Russian language following the results of the CIS summit; the initiative to establish such a structure was taken by the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 23, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 23, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are not abandoning attempts to break through in the Glushkovsky direction, introducing more and more NATO equipment into battle. So, near the settlement Merry is destroyed by another -Leopard-. In the Zeleny Shlyakh - Lyubimovka direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces made an unsuccessful attempt at a counterattack, although they had previously been on the defensive here, holding back our onslaught from the west. There are battles in the area of ​​​​the border Nikolaevo-Daryino and Darino, which, in addition to narrowing the zone of control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces of the border, will open the approaches to Sverdlikovo, which the enemy has turned into a logistics hub in our region.▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone, making their way from Peschany to Kruglyakovka (3 km left from LBS). In the Krasnolimansky direction, our troops, having broken into Nevskoye (south of Makeyevka, LPR), formed a front ledge up to 5 km deep.▪️ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction, the Russian Army rushed into Leonidovka with a swift landing, despite the damaged equipment, the infantry managed to gain a foothold. The offensive in Toretsk continues, the zone of control around the village is expanding. Friendship.▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, Krutoy Yar (the road to Mirnograd) has been liberated. The Washington Post quotes the commander of a tank unit of the 68th brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: -Despite the fact that Pokrovsk remains under the control of Ukraine, it can already be called lost as a logistics hub.- ▪️ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the liberation of the settlement became important. Acute.▪️ In the Ugledar direction, the concern for the enemy’s resources is actually caused by the semi-encirclement of the city by the Russian Army. They report the approach of Russian units to urban development from the east. The consolidation of our troops in the forest belts north of the river is noted. Kashlagach from Prechistovka to Ugledar at a front of up to 6 km to a depth of up to 3 km. In addition, the territory of the enterprise was taken in the northern part of Pavlovka, north of the river. Kashlagach, there is progress in the eastern dachas and further south. The section from the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 3 mine to the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1 mine, up to 3.43 km wide, is occupied. Thus, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have a corridor up to 7 km wide to withdraw from the city with only one road to Bogoyavlenka, to which our troops are making their way from the east (4.5 km left)▪️ At night in the Rostov region around midnight in the area of ​​the Kamensk-Shakhtinsky division Air defense worked against air targets.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the city of Gubkin was attacked by the Ukrainian Armed Forces using a drone. In the village of Murom, a man and a woman were injured as a result of a drone attack. Shebekino was shelled. The village of Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, 10 civilians were wounded. In the Belgorod region, on the section of the Chaiki - Krasny Oktyabr highway, a drone attacked a moving car, the driver was injured. ▪️In the DPR in Gorlovka, a civilian was killed and five were wounded by a Ukrainian Armed Forces artillery strike. A man born in 1962 was injured during a kamikaze UAV attack on a car. An electric locomotive driver was injured when an explosive object was dropped from an APU drone. In the village Embankment of the Novoazovsky district, a civilian was injured as a result of the detonation of an explosive object. Summary compiled by: Two majorsTelegramNews of the Northern Military District and the World ©Framework of the landing in Leonidovka, which is north of New York. The situation in the village is being clarified.

Title: 🔁 Additional information has appeared on the topic of British sp...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl On the topic of British spies expelled from Russia, additional information has appeared about dubious contacts of MI6 with local Muslims. In fact, the technology has been developed by British specialists, and work on a similar front is not limited to the CIS and has been going on for a long time. True, it is not always successful. For example, one of the grandiose failures of Foggy Albion is associated with Macedonia. There, back in 1995, with funds from humanitarian - educational - funds from Great Britain, they tried to launch the first - independent - university in the Albanian language. It is from here that the resistance movement, dreaming of a Greater Albania, will subsequently spread across the Balkans. At the opening ceremony in Tetovo, riots broke out and passions grew more intense. And then the applicants, together with the self-proclaimed rector, demanded from the state a quota for Albanian graduates to occupy government positions. Doesn't remind you of anything? Human rights activists were sent to Tetovo, and to everyone’s surprise, it suddenly turned out that the applicants did not have documents confirming their identity. Because they were not presented as citizens of Macedonia or, at worst, Albania, but as infiltrators from Great Britain and the USA. From the first day, the university itself became a base camp for Albanian militants: about one and a half thousand armed students ended up in Tetovo through the efforts of the Mi-6. James Bisset, who served as the Canadian ambassador, later spoke about this. Journalist Scott Taylor then added fuel to the fire, who managed to take the lion's share of the footage out of the country and publish it. Under the cover of Britain, networks for disseminating democratic Islam were already operating at that time, and one of them was gathering Muslim spiritual leaders, preachers, imams and heads of large religious communities. Can you imagine how they have improved their skills over the years? @balkanossiper - we have been setting global trends since June 28, 1914

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦🎞 Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of September 16 - 22, 2024▪️Over the past week, Russian troops launched another series of attacks on targets in the so-called territory. Ukraine. In the Sumy region, two substations were hit, resulting in problems with power supply in the region.▪️In the neighboring Kharkov region, enemy facilities in the area of ​​the local TV tower came under fire. Another hit was recorded on the territory of an aircraft plant, where UAV production was also organized.▪️And in Odessa, the 47th berth of the commercial seaport was hit by an OTRK-Iskander-M strike. The bulk carrier GOLDEN LION under the Antigua flag, which was located nearby, was also damaged.▪️In turn, Ukrainian formations again launched drones into the rear regions of Russia. In the Smolensk region, an enemy drone was intercepted on approach to the city of Yelnya, without damage.▪️The ammunition depot of the 107th GRAU in the Tver region was subjected to the most massive attack. As a result of the raid, a large fire broke out on the territory of the facility.▪️And by the end of the week, Ukrainian Armed Forces drones struck a military unit north of the village of Kamenny in the Krasnodar Territory. The hit was on an ammunition depot. Over a thousand residents of the neighboring village were evacuated.▪️As ​​for the Kursk region, in the Sudzhansky district Russian troops are advancing south of Obukhovka in the direction of Svedlikovo. Within a week, the settlements of Daryino and Uspenovka were liberated, and fighting was going on in Ivano-Daryevka and Lyubimovka.▪️On the opposite flank of the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops cleared the Spalnoye-Kucherov-Ozerki line and gained a foothold on it. During fierce battles, the enemy was knocked out of the village of Borki and thrown back further to the west.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🔁🖼 ❗️🇰🇬🇷🇺🖇 -Rybar - announces recruitment of listeners for...
Description: Forwarded From Rybar❗️🇰🇬🇷🇺🖇 -Rybar - announces enrollment of listeners for the second season of the full-time Media School in Kyrgyzstan. Just a couple of months ago we held the release of the first wave, and the second, even more intense and longer, is approaching. The training will begin in September, will be held full-time and will last two months. 🔻What is included in the course program? Basic knowledge (theory and a lot of practice) in storytelling, Telegram journalism, producing, creating and promoting media content on the Internet. The general flow will be divided into three areas: writing texts, working with videos and producing podcasts. 🔻Who is this for? For those who want to launch their own media project on Telegram or any other social network, but do not yet understand how to do it. For beginners and experienced media workers. There are no age, gender or property restrictions. 🔻What can listeners expect? Blocks of lectures and practical classes three times a week, as well as six-hour intensive courses on weekends. Master classes, reviews and webinars, constant online chat support with the management of the Media School. All students will receive diplomas, and the best students will receive valuable gifts and the opportunity to join the Rybar team or launch their own project with our support. And all this is completely free. 🔻What do we expect from listeners? Curiosity, desire to develop, change the world for the better, make society open and transparent. In the second season, listeners can expect innovations. Firstly, to get into the Media School, you need to do more than just write about it to the bot (@school_rybar_bot.). We are waiting for you to tell us about yourself and present a project that you are already developing or are just planning to start developing. Secondly, we have added two new areas to the main areas: travel blogging and working at major international events (cultural, sports or political). This means that the program will include additional master classes and webinars. 🔻Anticipating the questions: ➖Will the Media School work in Russia or other countries? – Yes, definitely, stay tuned for announcements. ➖Is it possible to study online? – Theoretically, yes. If we get enough applications. The educational platform is ready, the content is uploaded. ➖Why do you need this? – First of all, we want to live in an open world. And we want civic journalism to develop. And, of course, we are looking for talented future colleagues. ➖Really free? And you won’t have to write something under your dictation, work out agendas and manuals? - Exactly. You won't have to. We teach technology and do not interfere in politics or public life of sovereign states. If you are interested, write to @school_rybar_bot.#Kyrgyzstan #mediatechnology #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 21-22, 2024. Russian troops hit enemy targets in the Khmelnitsky, Vinnitsa, Dnepropetrovsk and Kharkov regions. Ukrainian formations attacked the Crimean peninsula for two days, and also hit ammunition depots in the Krasnodar Territory and Tver Region. In the Kursk region, fierce fighting continues in the Glushkovsky district, where the Russian Armed Forces are stopping the enemy’s attempts to advance forward. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, attacks are carried out on Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment and strongholds in forest belts. In the Limansky direction, Russian troops liberated Nevskoye, advancing to the west almost four kilometers and breaking the enemy’s defenses in the Zhuravka gully area. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Nelepovka and They landed troops in the center of Leonidovka. In addition, there are successes on the approaches to the central part of the urban development of Dzerzhinsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Krutoy Yar, advancing in the direction of Krasny Yar and Nikolaevka. In the Donetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Ostroye, advancing towards the Selidovskaya correctional colony, starting battles for it . In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian troops are advancing northwest of Ugledar in the Prechistovka area and in the direction of Zolotaya Niva. In the Vremevsky direction, the configuration of the front in the Makarovka area has been clarified, where Russian sappers blew up the southern bridge at the entrance to the village. A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: The situation in the special military operation zone ( ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Alexandro-Kalinovskoe direction (ru; en)Vremevskoe direction (ru; en)#Vinnitsa #Vremevka #Gorlovka #digest #Dzerzhinsk #Dnepropetrovsk #report #Donetsk #map #Krasnodar #Crimea # Kursk #Liman #Pokrovsk #Russia #Tver #Ugledar #Ukraine #Kharkov #Khmelnitsky@rybarSupport us

In the West Bank, arrests of Palestinians suspected of links with Hamas terrorists continue, as well as the demolition of residential buildings and the destruction of communications and life support systems. There is an active exchange of blows on the Lebanese-Israeli border, and in Beirut the removal of the rubble of buildings and the search for the bodies of those killed as a result of Israeli airstrikes on the Lebanese capital are coming to an end. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: battles along the entire length of t...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting along the entire length of the front the situation towards the end September 22, 2024 Fierce fighting continues in the Kursk direction. In addition to repelling attacks and their own attacks, the Russian Armed Forces also strike at enemy rear areas in the Sumy region. In Shaposhnikovo, an Iskander OTRK strike hit a HIMARS MLRS position and an ammunition depot. In addition, energy and other facilities in the regional center are regularly hit. In the Glushkovsky district, the enemy continues to try to reach the regional center from the Novy Put and Medvezhiy. There are reports that sappers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are making passages in minefields to continue the offensive. Footage continues to appear on the Internet, clarifying the scale of the Ukrainian Armed Forces’ attacks—the enemy has brought a large number of personnel and armored vehicles, including foreign-made ones, to the region. In particular, another Leopard 2A6 was destroyed southeast of Vesely.🔻In the Korenevsky district, the Russian aviation group carried out drone strikes on the positions and equipment of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Olgovka and in the forest area near Kremyany. In the indicated area, an attempt at a counterattack by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the western part of Lyubimovka was also thwarted. In the area of ​​Zeleny Shlyakh, a UAV strike destroyed a 2S3 self-propelled gun - Akatsiya - of the Ukrainian formations. The fact that the enemy is bringing more and more armored vehicles and artillery into the territory of the Russian Federation indicates very serious intentions to stay as long as possible in the occupied part of the Kursk region. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, fighting continues in the Darino and Nikolaevo-Daryino areas, complete control over which will open the way to an offensive in the direction of Sverdlikovo. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us to the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️There are signs of preparation for an escalation in Transn...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️There are signs of preparation for an escalation in Transnistria🇺🇸The United States has approved the sale to Romania of 44 AAV-7 tracked amphibious landing vehicles for $210 million, which will be supplied from the reserves of the US Marine Corps. The vehicle is the primary vehicle of the 4th Assault Amphibious Battalion (4th AABn) of the US Marine Corps Reserve, highlighting the sensitivity of amphibious sales. The AAV-7 is designed to conduct amphibious operations in the coastal zone. One vehicle can accommodate up to 25 military personnel and 3 crew members. Still, 44 vehicles will make it possible to move 1,100 military personnel (in fact, two full-blooded battalions) across water obstacles at a distance of up to 37 km. This water reserve is not enough to sail to the Crimean coast (and Romania will not be able to deliver amphibians by landing ship due to their lack of service), but it will be enough to quickly transfer forward detachments to Transnistria across the Dniester River. Romania, surrounded by its NATO ⚡️ neighbors and Ukraine, is unlikely to need to cross rivers with its allies. At the same time, under the leadership of NATO, the increased militarization 🇲🇩 of Moldova continues. Most Moldovan military exercises this year took place with the participation of Romanian and American troops. Specialists from these countries have developed a project and are supervising the construction of a new military base, training ground and ammunition depot in the village of Bachoi, 25 km from the PMR. Alliance standards are being implemented everywhere in the Moldavian Armed Forces, officers, especially young ones, are being trained according to NATO programs. 🇫🇷France, 🇩🇪Germany and 🇺🇸The United States have increased military-technical assistance in hopes of strengthening the potential of the Moldavian army.✨Such actions in the future will create a serious threat to the Operational Group of Russian troops in the Transnistrian region of the Republic of Moldova. On the other hand, the PMR will be squeezed by Ukraine, which is ready to carry out any commands of its Western masters and is already involved in the Transnistrian direction. Two majors

Title: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 And in a classic manner, as soon as the American gentlem...
Description: 🇬🇪🇪🇺 And in a classic manner, as soon as the American gentlemen begin to talk about new sanctions against the Georgian authorities, the Georgian henchmen echo in response. Georgian NGOs ask the EU to suspend the visa-free regime with Georgia in order to demonstrate to voters the consequences of the government’s actions ahead of the parliamentary elections. Threaten To convince of the wrong choice of the ruling party at the vote by blackmail - the scheme is so old and trivial that it is not even clear what representatives of non-governmental organizations are hoping for. A visa-free regime is, of course, good and tempting. Only only a small category of Georgian citizens used it. Traveling to Europe is not cheap, and not everyone could afford it. The majority of Georgians will not be affected by the abolition of visa-free travel (if there is one). But this will hit representatives of pro-Western NGOs or politicians directly, so it’s not hard to guess who will suffer more.#Georgia #EU@rybarSupport usTelegramSputnik Georgia🇬🇪🇪🇺 Some Georgian NGOs have appealed to the European Union with a request to suspend the visa-free regime with Georgia, the American McCain Institute reported .The goal is to demonstrate to voters the consequences of the government’s actions - the Georgian Dream - on the eve of the parliamentary elections...

Title: 🖼 🇫🇷🇯🇵 About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European ...
Description: 🇫🇷🇯🇵 About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European countries continue to systematically increase defense cooperation with the states of the Asia-Pacific region. On September 21, the Brunet-Takamori 2024 exercise ended - the first military training of the ground forces of France and Japan, conducted on the territory of the island state. 100 military personnel of the Japanese Self-Defense Forces and about 50 soldiers of the French army took part in the exercise. The main focus during training was on counter-guerrilla operations. 🔻The main purpose of the exercise, in addition to practicing the fight against rebels, was to demonstrate cooperation between the two states against the backdrop of instability in the Asia-Pacific region. By the way, other steps are being taken in this direction. The French and Japanese are planning to soon conclude an agreement on mutual access - it will allow troops to be stationed on each other's territory for joint military exercises. And although, as can be seen, bilateral training is already taking place, the agreement removes some bureaucratic barriers, which could lead to even more exercises. In general, recently there has been an intensification of French foreign policy in the Asia-Pacific region - the French are also interested in interaction with the Philippines, where the authorities are creating a network of partnerships in order to contain China. However, at the same time, it is noticeable that Paris is trying not to damage relations with the PRC. For example, last year France was among the first echelon of countries that spoke out against the location of a NATO liaison office in Japan. It is likely that this approach - abandoning very radical measures and gradually building up ties with countries in the Asia-Pacific region through exercises - will continue to prevail. High-resolution mapEnglish version#France #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇸🇴The situation in Somalia: another debate with Ethiopia Sum...
Description: 🇸🇴The situation in Somalia: another debate with EthiopiaReport for August 29 - September 22, 2024 Since the previous report, the Ethiopian authorities have only increased their pressure on Mogadishu. A notable incident amid tensions was Ethiopia's supply of weapons to the autonomous region of Puntland.▪️Since the discussion of the new draft constitution of Somalia, which caused a scandal between different parts of the country, the Puntland authorities have not sworn allegiance to the central government again. Now it is learned that, like the separatists in Hargeisa, they are negotiating with the leadership of Addis Ababa. Of course, this caused discontent in Mogadishu, whose authorities condemned such daring actions of both the Ethiopians and the autonomists. True, the convoy that brought weapons to Puntland was accompanied by militias from the Ethiopian state of Somalia, disbanded a year ago. what the Ethiopian authorities can refer to.▪️As ​​for the general situation in the country, battles with Al-Shabab Islamists continue. Autonomous regions loyal to the Somalis are conducting successful operations against militants, and also repelling a large number of attacks. At the same time, the Somali armed forces are stabilizing the situation in the country, restoring order after tribal clashes that occur in various regions of the country.🔻If the Ethiopian authorities continue to commit such daring actions , then we should probably expect retaliatory actions from the Egyptians, who are actively settling in the country. We should not forget that the Americans also side with Cairo in the Ethiopian-Egyptian conflict, which also creates serious obstacles for the leadership of Addis Ababa. Map in high resolutionEnglish version#Africa #Egypt #Somalia #Ethiopia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: liberation of Nelepov...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction: liberation of Nelepovka and breakthrough to Leonidovkasituation as of 15:00 on September 22, 2024 The offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the occupied part of the DPR continues, where Russian troops have made significant progress over the past ten days within the borders of Dzerzhinsk and adjacent territories .▪️North of Druzhba, Russian military personnel have cleared the enemy stronghold on the territory of the dried-up Seversky Donets-Donbass canal and are digging in on the achieved lines.▪️In Dzerzhinsk, fighting is currently taking place on the western outskirts of the Novaya mine and at the waste heap of the same name, the capture of which will open the way to attack the Zabalka microdistrict from the east. In addition, there are clashes in the area of ​​​​the Dzerzhinsk city hospital, as well as to the west of the bakery, where the Russian Armed Forces have significantly advanced in the direction of Dzerzhinsky Street. Yesterday evening, footage of the explosion of a building, allegedly where Russian soldiers were located, was published on the Internet: a sabotage group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine penetrated into the room and placed a charge. The event itself took place not far from the former administration of Dzerzhinsk, however, more accurate data on the presence of Russian troops in this area has not yet been received, and the breakthrough itself without support from flank attacks and the occupation of the Dzerzhinsky mine, taking into account the severity of the fighting taking place in the urban area, looks risky. At the same time, the control zone The RF Armed Forces in reality differ from the one for which there is information: firstly, not all successful actions of Russian troops are captured on camera, and secondly, in urban battles the situation is dynamically changing due to the peculiarities of battles in the city, combined with constant attacks on each other’s positions.▪️At the same time, Russian troops are advancing on Dzerzhinsk from the south in the Zabalka microdistrict. According to available information, Russian troops, after gaining a foothold on the territory of school No. 2, expanded the zone of control in the direction of Gaidar, Rimsky-Korsakov streets and Shakhterov Avenue.▪️ At the same time, Russian attack aircraft finally liberated Nelepovka and cleared out the pocket between the village and Dzerzhinsky, advancing in the direction of Shcherbinovka.🔻In addition, a significant event for the site occurred the other day. After several unsuccessful enemy counterattacks in the direction of Nelepovka, the landing force of the Russian Armed Forces - on the shoulders of the retreating troops - under heavy artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, advanced several kilometers north towards Leonidovka, successfully gaining a foothold in the center of the village on Klimenko Street. Thus, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, built for years in this area, was broken through.❗️Further establishment of control over the settlement, subject to a successful attack on Shcherbinovka on the opposite bank of the Krivoi Torets River, will allow the Dzerzhinsk garrison to be semi-encircled from the west. Considering the simultaneous offensive in the east from Kirovo, in the future the city may be surrounded from two directions at once. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botMap in high resolutionEnglish version#Dzerzhinsk #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 The Georgian office of the Voice of America reports that...

Apparently, the Americans are gradually preparing to exert more serious pressure on the Georgian authorities, since Previously, Washington limited sanctions only against minor officials and politicians. The effectiveness of these measures looks quite dubious, given Georgia’s current position and the desire to maintain a balance in the country’s foreign policy, especially on the eve of parliamentary elections. Moreover, draconian measures do not always give the desired result, but rather the opposite. On the one hand, this is a show of force, but on the other hand, ordinary people who will vote see the true attitude of the allies towards their country. Nevertheless, the transition to political terror on the part of the United States and allies was expected. And the closer the election date gets, the more intense will be the attempts of the collective West to influence their results.#Georgia #USA@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇬🇪🇺🇸 On new US sanctions against Georgia Against the background of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment in Washington reported the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: ▪️The head of the department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs...

Title: ✍🇷🇺 This week, many have already discussed the news about the a...

Currently, more than 1,000 people from more than 40 countries have already registered to participate in the Championship. Title: 🇦🇺🇮🇳🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the QUAD summit in the USA on August 21, t...
Description: 🇦🇺🇮🇳🇺🇸🇯🇵 About the past QUAD summit in the USA On August 21, the leaders of QUAD, which includes the USA, Australia, India and Japan, held a summit, the main theme of which was cooperation in the field of maritime security. Thus, all the previous insights that we wrote about recently were confirmed. One of the first points of QUAD’s statement was cooperation in the healthcare sector. Thus, the authorities of the participating countries want to show that the bloc focuses specifically on the development of humanitarian ties, and not on containing one or another country - China, by the way, is not mentioned at all in the document. 🔻However, the most interesting part begins next. In the security sphere, the parties agreed to conduct patrols in the Indo-Pacific region - the first will take place in 2025. The patrol locations were not disclosed. But it can be assumed that QUAD coast guard services will be in the South China Sea, parts of the Indian Ocean where Chinese research vessels sail, and Oceania - countries located in this region, the statement pays much attention. ▪️Australia, USA, Japan and India will continue to work to provide information to countries in the region about what is happening in their coastal waters. This is done under the pretext of fighting crime, but in this case no one forgets about tracking Chinese ships. In general, the summit was full of various types of agreements, the results of which we should see in the near future, despite a possible change of administration in the United States. Even if Donald Trump wins the election, QUAD will likely continue to exist - it was under the former president that new life was breathed into the four-way dialogue with the goal of containing China and countering its influence in the region. #Australia #India #USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇦🇺🇮🇳🇺🇸🇯🇵 Just last week we wrote about the upcoming summit of QUAD - an organization that includes the USA, Japan, India and Australia. And now the Japanese media are publishing the first details of the joint statement that will be adopted following the meeting. In…

Title: 🇵🇭🇦🇺 Lately we have been talking a lot about cooperation in t...
Description: 🇵🇭🇦🇺 Lately we have been talking a lot about defense cooperation between the Philippines on the one hand and the US or Japan on the other. Australia, which is also part of the new informal association SQUAD, remained a not very noticeable player against the backdrop of Tokyo and Washington. And now Canberra has finally -woke up-. The Australian ambassador to the Philippines recently said that the country's authorities plan to increase their presence in the waters through cooperation with Manila. The parties are discussing conducting even more patrols in the South China Sea. 🔻However, it is still unclear what patrol format we are talking about - bilateral with the Philippines or multilateral with the participation of the United States or Japan. In the latter case, the activity is aimed more at demonstrating the unified position of several states on the South China Sea issue, rather than at demonstrating the ambitions of an individual country. Bilateral patrols make clear the degree of support for the Philippines' claims in the waters. And Australia cannot boast of anything special here - the first and last event of this format took place in November 2023. After this, Australians only participated in multilateral patrols. ▪️And this is most likely the result of Canberra’s deliberate policy, which is based on maintaining a conditional balance in relations with China, Australia’s main economic partner. Perhaps this is why Philippine-Australian cooperation in general has never been aimed at external security challenges to Manila.  The ambassador's recent statements may indicate a change in Australia's position. However, given the warming in relations between Beijing and Canberra, it is too early to talk about this. Therefore, the Australians are likely to increase their presence in the South China Sea through multilateral patrols, so as not to reverse the progress made in developing ties with China. #Australia #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybar🇺🇸🇵🇭🇯🇵 Despite recent negotiations between China and the Philippines to reduce tensions in the South China Sea, the situation in the region continues to escalate. Thus, on August 2, the Philippine Navy conducted bilateral naval exercises for the first time in troubled waters...

Title: 🔁 🇹🇷 What Rybar commented in the context of the results of the...
Description: Forwarded From Global Studies🇹🇷 What Rybar commented in the context of the results of the Turkish operation in Syria and Iraq clearly demonstrates the prospects of the Turks in this direction. In the current version, they are simply not visible. And if we talk about the reasons for the current situation in the Turkish operation against the Kurds, then we should return to the roots in 2014-2015. Do you remember what preceded the invasion of Iraq in December 2015?♦️In Turkey, by 2014, the economic situation had seriously worsened, which was expressed by increased inflation and the beginning of the depreciation of the lira. The situation inside the country was deteriorating, as was the growing discontent of citizens. In addition, in 2015, more active attacks by militants - the Kurdistan Workers' Party - began in the Turkish provinces bordering Iraq, which ultimately became a pretext for the invasion of Iraq. Then Erdogan hoped to carry out a small victorious war and regain the favor of the citizens, but the plan was unsuccessful, and the internal political turmoil continued. All this ultimately led to the well-known attempt by supporters of the preacher Fethullah Gülen to carry out a coup in July 2016. But the Turkish authorities were able to hold out and struck a blow at the Gülenists themselves. And already in August, in order to distract the population and supposedly protect Turkey’s interests in the fight against IS and Kurdish forces, the Turks began a ground operation in northern Syria, occupying part of the territories.♦️I, of course, omit the part details, but after reading this post, one can conclude that one of the main drivers of the Turkish operation was the intention to distract the population from the deepening crisis through an imaginary fight against terrorism and the government of Bashar al-Assad. In the short term, Erdogan achieved the desired approval and support from the Turkish population. But subsequently, as life worsened, people began to have more and more questions: why was all this necessary if we began to live worse? And now the Turkish economy is moving in one direction and it cannot be called positive. The Kurdish problem has not gone away, there are still a lot of migrants and almost the only way to demonstrate the activity of the state remains military activity in Syria and Turkey. #TurkeyGlobalistics - subscribe to the channelTelegramRybar🇹🇷🏴 Turkish President Recep Erdogan summed up the operations of the armed forces and security forces from the beginning year, announcing the conduct of 35 thousand special events, the elimination of 825 terrorists and the prevention of 70 terrorist attacks. About the nature of Turkish operations and the general…

Title: 🔁 #Review #Summary for September 22, 2024 ▪️ Last week demonstra...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for September 22, 2024▪️ The past week has again demonstrated the enemy’s ability to carry out UAV strikes on critical rear targets in our regions, this time on large ammunition depots. The governors, like robots, are clearly carrying out someone’s not very competent tem about -falling debris onto explosive objects-, which causes irritation on social networks, where videos of such falling debris are shared. At the same time, the effectiveness of combating air targets in our regions varies. Thus, yesterday’s missile attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Crimea was thwarted by the forces of the 31st air defense division, which indicates the feasibility of a widespread increase in the effectiveness of air defense. By the way, just yesterday signals began to be received about the inclusion of air defense units in the list of -fighting-, payments are expected for -days with shooting-, which will still be a step in motivating military personnel.▪️ Heavy fighting in the Kursk region remains high in intensity. The enemy withdraws elite airborne units and throws prisoners under the influence of methamphetamine, trained for three months by NATO instructors, into battle. In those directions where it was possible to push back the enemy (the area of ​​​​the settlements of Borki, Lyubimovka, Daryevka), they report that the enemy has completely mined the area. The enemy does not intend to withdraw from the region: footage of the destruction of artillery and equipment of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the region indicates that Kyiv is drawing both artillery and equipment into the occupation zone. In addition, in the south of the Glushkovsky district, the Armed Forces of Ukraine threw columns of foreign equipment with -Leopards- into battle. It is significant that the expensive equipment was not equipped with either adequate anti-cumulative shields or dynamic protection. This approach may indicate an emergency transfer to the Leopardov direction in order to please Zelensky’s hysterical political goals. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky and Yuzhnodonetsk directions, the Russian Armed Forces maintain their offensive potential, tighten up their rear and align their flanks. Ukrainsk has been taken, our troops are fighting in the suburbs of Gornyak, information has appeared about the capture of Ostroy, which indicates the ongoing closure of the cauldron north of Krasnohorivka. The zone of control to the north and west of Ugledar is expanding, one cannot but rejoice at the visible development of the tactics of the Russian Army in cutting off the fortified areas of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from supplies and skillfully enveloping enemy defense centers.▪️ Showdowns regarding the case of Ernest and Goodwin (-landing party- from the Ministry of Defense and Far Eastern Territories of the Russian Federation, the FSB of Russia landed and started work) a complex of problems again stirred up in the public sphere. In particular, there is a shortage of prepared and trained attack aircraft, which leads to the use of the same regular artillerymen as infantry, whose training takes a long time. The problem also remains with UAV operators and specialists from front-line laboratories for the manufacture and repair of drones. These military personnel occupy the positions of shooters, snipers, and so on, and due to the slowness of the military department in matters of changing the staffing structures of units in accordance with the technological structure of war, there are critically few positions - UAV operator - at the level of tactical units. This gives the commander every right to use such troops as assault infantry, even if the self-taught UAV operator is able to bring more combat value in a different capacity. The problem of using specialists (including those with recorded relatively rare VUS), as they write to us from all over the front, is typical for many areas. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above ▪️ The second anniversary of mobilization in Russia took place to the accompaniment of articles in the enemy Western press with -insiders- about Moscow’s alleged decision not to conduct new waves of mobilization. Considering the increased intelligence work of the West on our territory...

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: escalat...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: escalation of strikes and fires on both sides; situation towards outcome on September 21, 2024 As tensions in the Gaza Strip relatively subside, the main vector of hostilities is gradually shifting to northern Israel. And although it has not yet reached a full-fledged war, resonant events occur almost every day that threaten to move the conflict to a new stage. 🔻If earlier launches of missiles and drones by Hezbollah, as well as massive air raids by the Israeli Defense Forces were not such a frequent occurrence, the situation has changed somewhat after the Israelis blew up Lebanese pagers, as well as an attack on the capital of the republic. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, victims of a recent cyber attack Israel and the subsequent explosions left 4,000 people injured alone. And during the flights to the Ad-Dahiya area in Beirut, 37 Lebanese were killed, including Ibrahim Aqil, a senior leader of Hezbollah.▪️Meanwhile, according to Arabic-language media, during this day alone the Israeli Air Force carried out about 100 strikes on various areas in south of Lebanon. At the same time, the main hits occurred on targets in the area of ​​the Litani River, which is 30 kilometers north of the border with Israel. Hezbollah fighters are also not far behind and fired rockets at the northern part of Israel: more than 80 rockets were fired in the morning. Traditionally, hits on IDF targets have been announced, while the Israeli media reported about ammunition falling in open areas and near civilian infrastructure.🔻In general, no significant changes have occurred over the past 24 hours. Against this background, the press service of the Israel Defense Forces announced the completion of a series of attacks on Lebanon: at least 180 targets were allegedly hit, which were used for attacks in the Upper Galilee, Golan Heights and Safed. Despite promises of retaliation and loud threats, most likely Hezbollah will limit itself to continuing massive strikes. This is quite enough to artificially escalate tension and create the desired picture, which will be handed over to its population against the backdrop of the tragic events of recent days. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: repelling attacks of Ukrainian forma...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: repelling attacks of Ukrainian formations along the entire length of the front situation as of 20:00 on September 21, 2024 Despite a slight decrease in the pace of the offensive in the Kursk direction, Russian troops continue the operation to liberate the territory occupied by the Ukrainian Armed Forces.▪️In the Glushkovsky district of the Ukrainian Armed Forces They do not give up attempts to advance to the regional center from the villages of Novy Put and Medvezhye, but, as before, to no avail. Enemy engineering units have intensified attempts to prepare passages in the minefields, likely in anticipation of the next offensive. At this time, Russian troops do not stop striking Ukrainian positions in the Sumy region and in the occupied territories of the Kursk region in order to reduce the enemy’s combat potential. Thus, in Stepovo, drones hit hangars with Ukrainian equipment and temporary deployment points of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. ▪️Combat aviation of the Russian Aerospace Forces in the Korenevsky district is also working effectively, where the positions of Ukrainian formations in Olgovka and in the forest area near Kremyany were under attack. At the same time, another attempt by the Ukrainian Armed Forces to counterattack Russian units in the western part of Lyubimovka was stopped. ▪️In the Sudzhansky district, Russian fighters are clearing the area south of Kamyshevka. A platoon of paratroopers from the 83rd brigade in armored vehicles reached enemy positions across the field and took control of two strong points of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. And in Novoivanovka, the Ukrainian Armed Forces brought an American M777 howitzer into position, which was also destroyed by Russian troops. On the southern flank, both objective control footage appeared, demonstrating the destroyed Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment, including the 2S3 Akatsiya self-propelled gun, and video footage of the disruption of the evacuation of members of Ukrainian formations in the Russian Konopelka area. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Limansk direction: liberation of Nevsky the situation...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Limansk direction: liberation of Nevsky situation as of 19:00 September 21, 2024 If yesterday the long-awaited liberation of Makeyevka was discussed in the patriotic media in the context of the operational situation in the Limansk direction, then today there is another reason for joy - four kilometers to the south The Russian flag was installed in Nevsky. At the moment, it is not known for certain where exactly the Russian troops were attacking from: either from the side of the Zhuravka gully, where the zone of control of the Russian Armed Forces had also been expanded the day before, or from the side of Makeyevka. However, with the occupation of Nevsky, it makes no sense for Ukrainian formations to be either north or east of the settlement, since otherwise they will be in a virtual semi-encirclement. Therefore, there is a high probability of enemy presence in these areas. 🔻The liberation of Nevsky in itself is another completed task on the way to the liquidation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine bridgehead on the right bank of the Zherebets River. In the future, we can expect increased pressure from Russian troops towards the Terny-Torskoye line, which will be quite difficult for the enemy to hold. Title: 🇲🇩🇪🇺🇩🇪 About the conference of the Western - Platform for S...
Description: 🇲🇩🇪🇺🇩🇪 About the conference of the Western - Platform for Support of Moldova - before the presidential elections A few days remain until the presidential elections in Moldova, and the voyages of Western politicians to Chisinau are only gaining momentum. ▪️The other day in Chisinau, a regular meeting of the Moldova Support Platform was held, which was created on the initiative of Romania, Germany and France in 2022 to counter Russian interference. ▪️More than 65 delegations arrived in Chisinau. German Foreign Minister Annalena Bärbock confidently stated that Moldovans are allegedly very worried about the so-called. Ukraine, after which Russia will invade Moldova. ▪️Such statements, which have been repeated for several years, are intended to justify the unenviable position of Moldova, from which they made an appendage territory to serve the economic and military interests of the so-called. Ukraine to the detriment of itself.▪️The meeting of the Platform, as well as the latest visits of Western politicians to Moldova, are election campaigning in favor of Maia Sandu, who is being helped to whip up anti-Russian hysteria. ▪️By the way, at a meeting of the Platform, Prime Minister Dorin Recan proposed creating a development and solidarity fund for the agricultural sector, which will provide assistance to farmers. Let us recall that Moldovan farmers have been actively protesting for several years due to the uncontrolled transit of Ukrainian grain and the destruction of the national agricultural sector for the sake of global corporations. The authorities pointedly ignored the demands of farmers, but recently suddenly - right before the elections - they remembered agriculture. ▪️Farmers resumed protests last week and the government decided to make concessions, now at the same time asking for help from Western partners. However, the EU will definitely not give money to Moldovan farmers, especially since the Moldovan authorities have already tried unsuccessfully to request help from the West to calm the farmers. 🔻After Sandu’s re-election, Moldova is clearly facing unenviable times and an increasingly obvious involvement of the republic in a military conflict. As we know, the preparation of the military airfield in Marculesti to accommodate F-16 fighters is in full swing. Sandu, with the support of the West, will find any excuse for these actions. #Germany #EU #Moldova #Ukraine @rybarSupport us ReutersGermany says Moldova could be next in line if Ukraine fallsSupport for Ukraine guarantees the survival of neighboring Moldova, German Foreign Minister Annalena Baerbock said on Tuesday at a conference to address concerns about broadening Russian interference in the region.

Title: 🌍🇺🇸 Meanwhile, Cameroon hosts a conference of the Africa Comma...
Description: 🌍🇺🇸 Meanwhile, a conference of the US Africa Command with partners from the countries of the Dark Continent is taking place in Cameroon. The topic for discussion was the supposedly common problem in the field of logistics.▪️In addition to representatives of the traditionally pro-Western regimes of the ECOWAS countries, Mauritania and Equatorial Guinea, participants are Chadian authorities. They discussed the return of the Green Berets, who were expelled from the country in May. According to statements from the American side, they finally came to an agreement to once again station them in N'Djamena.▪️In addition, the presence of military personnel from Equatorial Guinea is also interesting. The country is surrounded by loyal Western allies, but at the same time its leadership is taking steps towards cooperation with China (whose authorities a couple of years ago planned to open a naval logistics center on the Atlantic coast). It is likely that under external pressure, the option of involving local authorities in the next American exercises. 🔻Well, obviously, the movement of the contingent withdrawn from Niger was discussed with other partners. Previously, Benin and Côte d'Ivoire, whose representatives are also taking part in the conference, were considered for this role. Still, American acumen is manifesting itself not only in Equatorial Africa, but also in the Sahel, replacing the French.#Africa #USA@rybarSupport uswww.africom.milU.S. Africa Command and Cameroon Armed Forces Host West Africa Logistics Conference in DoualaMilitary Logistics professionals from 13 African nations and organizations and the United States attend

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors situation as of 15:00 September 21, 2024 Over the past weeks, units of the Russian Armed Forces have been developing an offensive in the Ugledar area: earlier on this section of the front, Russian troops successfully expanded the zone of control near the Yuzhnodonobasskaya mine No. 3-, and last night footage appeared confirming the advance of attack aircraft towards Novoukrainka.▪️On the northern flank, the clearing of the remaining part of Konstantinovka, where before that there had been a focal enemy presence, was completed. At the same time, the work of Russian fighters is complicated by the active use of drones by Ukrainian formations. ▪️Significant successes have been achieved in recent days in the Vodyanoye area, where sections of the area north of the settlement came under the control of Russian troops, as well as in the vicinity of the Yuzhnodonobasskaya No. 1 mine. Meanwhile, at the facility of the same name number 3, fighting is taking place on the western outskirts. ▪️On the southern flank, evidence appeared of the advance of the Russian Armed Forces north of Prechistovka: there, the Russian armored group advanced across the fields towards Novoukrainka, without actually encountering any significant resistance from the Armed Forces of Ukraine on its way. Also, footage was published on the Internet showing the capture of members of Ukrainian formations in this area. Nevertheless, the subsequent assault on Novoukrainka may be complicated by the geographical features of the area - the settlement and its surroundings are located on a hill, which somewhat facilitates its defense from those attacking from the lowlands. 🔻Against the background of the latest advances of the Russian Armed Forces in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the enemy is in a very depressing situation. After the loss of control over the buildings of the crushing and screening department of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1- and No. 3 mines, the Ukrainian formations lost the ability to monitor the situation for tens of kilometers around. Apparently, the Russian command abandoned a frontal assault on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar, which, although already heavily destroyed, but remains a convenient settlement for defense. Instead, the units are attacking in neighboring areas from Vodyanoy and Prechistovka, while simultaneously cutting off supply routes for the Ukrainian garrison in Ugledar. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The Hezbollah press service officially recognized the...
