And this if you don’t take into account the murder of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, for which the Axis of Resistance placed responsibility on the Israeli intelligence services and promised a tough response (however, so far nothing of such resonance has happened in relation to the Zionist state). And no matter how the Lebanese don’t wanted to succumb to obvious provocations from the ultra-Orthodox government, sooner or later they will have to give a response. Most likely, this will be the usual massive launch of drones and missiles against IDF targets. Moreover, the intensity of strikes has already increased somewhat in recent days.#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇨🇩The situation in the east of DR Congo: activity of terrori...
Description: 🇨🇩The situation in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo: activity of terrorist groups Situation for August 1 - September 20, 2024 In the resource-rich east of the Democratic Republic of Congo, fighting continues between government troops and a conglomerate of groups. If previously the Rwandan-backed March 23 Movement (M23) was the one most often in the news, now other factions are showing themselves more strongly. ▪️Against the background of the M23 offensive, cultists from CODECO have become more active: during the latest raids in the province of Jigu, they stole more than 10 people, killing about 30 more. The organization is fragmented groups of bandits attacking mainly civilians. They do not agree to a truce with the authorities because if they surrender, they will face the death penalty.▪️The Alliance of Democratic Forces, affiliated with the Islamic State, operates in a similar way. The attacks target Christian settlements, not army posts. They take property from villages, burn houses, execute one part of the population and try to recruit another. Such tactics do not bring any noticeable operational success - Islam in the DRC is widespread quite locally, and the religious factor in local wars does not play the first role. However, with such attacks, militants continue to wreak havoc in the Ituri region. The growing activity of several groups at once forces government troops to stretch their already limited forces to fight terrorism, which worsens the level of security in the east of the country and brings great economic costs. In these conditions, - Western partners - new levers of pressure are emerging on the authorities in Kinshasa, especially in matters of the exploitation of large deposits of natural resources. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrain...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrainian formations carried out another massive launch of drones in the rear regions of the Russian Federation. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, over 100 drones were intercepted by air defense systems. ▪️One of the targets of the enemy attack was an ammunition warehouse on the territory of a military unit north of the village of Kamenny in the Krasnodar Territory. As in the case of Toropets, regional authorities again announced the fall of fragments of ammunition, as well as the resulting fire and detonation of explosive objects. Nevertheless, the entire media space has already circulated footage showing a powerful explosion with the characteristic sounds of secondary detonation. Due to the incident, a nearby village was evacuated. However, the results of the attack will be clear after the publication of satellite images. ▪️In the Tver region, Ukrainian drones attacked the 23rd GRAU arsenal in the area of ​​the village of Oktyabrsky, which is located less than 20 km south of Toropets. According to heat signatures from the satellite, a fire broke out in the facility. Against the backdrop of the incident, it was reported that the Staraya Toropa railway station, located further south, was evacuated: several passenger trains were canceled, others were sent along an alternative route. ▪️In other regions there were no significant damages or casualties. Most of the drones were shot down in the Bryansk region, as well as over the Azov Sea. In total, air defense systems worked in eight regions of Russia. The latest raids by Ukrainian formations clearly demonstrate that one of the targets of the attacks, in addition to the already familiar fuel and energy infrastructure facilities and airfields, were large ammunition depots. And given the high volumes of production of enemy drones, whose production of new UAVs completely covers the consumption of vehicles during previous attacks, we can expect that such raids will only intensify. High resolution mapEnglish version#Bryansk #Krasnodar #Russia #Tver #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁🖼 🇫🇷/ 🇺🇦 From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian f...
Description: Forwarded From the Fifth Republic🇫🇷/ 🇺🇦 From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian future F16 pilots underwent accelerated training at a secret base in southwest France, which - as can be seen from the June 17 video - is the air force base in Cazeaux where they are based Alphajets. Although the Ukrainians in the photo from the French Ministry of Defense were blurred, RFI handed over everyone and everything - firstly, in June there were 11 Ukrainians being trained. One got lost somewhere, since only ten were issued certificates. Six of them had previously spent 6 months learning English and terminology at the English Armed Forces base. All pilots were between 21 and 23 years old. The crash course teaches them Western combat techniques, flying at extremely low altitudes at high speed, various missions, including striking warehouses with enemy shells, reacting in case of breakdown, etc. They flew 80 hours on Alphajets and 50 on F16 simulators from THALÈS. Then they will continue their training at the bases of the Romanian and NATO Armed Forces, where they will train for another 6 months on local F16s with instructors (probably from the Armed Forces of Belgium, Denmark, and Holland). France will train a total of 26 F16 pilots at the same Cazeaux base. #Ukraine #F16 #army #NATO #France @fifthrepublic : freedom, equality, drunkenness

Title: 🎬 ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: ❗️🇮🇱🇵🇸🎞 Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of September 14 – 20, 2024▪️In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked the capital of the enclave and satellite cities. At the same time, the number of deaths in the region has already exceeded 41 thousand people, and the number of victims has reached 95 thousand. ▪️North of Gaza, after another Hamas strike on Ashkelon, the IDF announced the evacuation of several areas of Beit Lahia. At the same time, at the moment, the deployment of Israeli troops has not been recorded.▪️There were periodic firefights in the vicinity of the University College in southwest Gaza. Despite this, the line of combat contact has not changed significantly over the past period of time.▪️In the central part of the enclave, the Israelis periodically carried out air and artillery strikes on various targets. Nuseirat again remained under the most concentrated fire, where there were no casualties among the civilian population. ▪️There were also several hits on residential buildings in various areas of Al-Breij. In just one day, Israeli airstrikes on the settlement killed at least 50 people.▪️Meanwhile, Palestinian forces fired at IDF positions in the Netzarim corridor. Judging by the lack of reports of evacuation helicopters flying over, such attacks did not lead to any tangible results.▪️In the south of the enclave, Israeli units carried out engineering work on the territory of the Philadelphia Corridor. At the same time, the IDF was preparing for the likely end of the main phase of hostilities in Rafah. A suburb of the Lebanese capital, the Ad-Dahiya district, where several Hezbollah-owned buildings are located, was also attacked. The hit was in the building where a meeting of one of the prominent representatives of the group with the Palestinian delegation was taking place.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 20, 2024. Within 24 hours, Russian troops hit enemy targets in Kharkov and Dnepropetrovsk, as well as port infrastructure in Odessa. In the Kursk region, Russian troops are advancing in the Sudzhansky district, at the same time repelling enemy attacks in Glushkovsky. In the Limansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in the vicinity of Makeyevka, almost completely taking control of the settlement. In the Slobozhansky direction, Russian troops hit enemy positions in Volchansk and are attacking in the direction of Tikhoy. In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing in Grodovka, and also launching missile strikes on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near Pokrovsk.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution maps: Situation in the zone special military operation (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Liman direction (ru; en)#digest #Dnepropetrovsk #report #Donetsk #map #Kursk #Liman #Odessa #Russia #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for September 20, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked both the capital of the enclave and the satellite city of Beit Lahia. The largest number of hits traditionally took place in the southern part of Gaza City. In the south of the enclave, clashes occurred in the eastern part of Rafah, where Palestinian forces reported several ambushes on Israeli units in the Musab and Khirbet al-Adas areas. The Israeli operation -Summer Camps- continues in the West Bank. The most violent clashes broke out in Qabatiya, where the Israelis eliminated up to seven militants. The Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the Lebanese capital, resulting in the death of Hezbollah deputy leader Ibrahim Aqil and the senior command staff of the Radwan forces. In turn, Lebanese groups fired at northern Israel, causing damage to Metula.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇮🇳🇺🇦 About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukra...
Description: 🇮🇳🇺🇦 About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukraine Reuters released an article about supplies to the so-called. Ukraine 155-mm Indian-made rounds, evidence of the use of which by the Ukrainian Armed Forces has appeared on the Internet from time to time over the past six months. According to the material, they reach the Kyiv regime through EU countries. Thus, the Yantra India company entered into an agreement with the Italian Meccanica per l'Elettronica e Servomeccanismi (MES) for the supply of shell casings. Their equipment with explosives is produced by Western companies, which formally allows us to consider this not a sale of ammunition, but only components. Similar schemes have been implemented with contractors from Spain, Portugal, the Czech Republic and Slovenia - exports to these countries of large Indian ammunition manufacturers have grown to 135 million euros from 2022. The government in Delhi is aware of such episodes, but has not imposed any restrictions on exports to Europe.📌 When in March it became known about the Czech initiative to transfer 800 thousand rounds to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, we assumed that India could be one of the suppliers through sales through third parties countries. The facts that have come to light confirm these guesses. In this case, Delhi is taking advantage of the current situation to expand its already growing military exports. At the same time, the country positions itself as friendly to Russia and acts as an important buyer of Russian weapons and sanctioned oil. In the current realities, one can consider steps that would look like a limited response to gestures and would not become a significant reason for the deterioration of relations. For example, in the form of mirror schemes with the supply of individual components to Pakistan.#India #Ukraine@rybarSupport us ReutersExclusive: Ammunition from India enters Ukraine, raising Russian ireNew Delhi sees the lengthy war in Europe as an opportunity to develop its nascent arms export sector.

Title: 🎬 🇬🇧🇷🇺🎞 Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing a...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺🎞 Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing an avalanche of outraged articles in Western publications about groundless accusations and Moscow’s aggressive campaign, we decided to add visual details on the situation with the expulsion of British spies. ▪️Claims that accusations regarding the actions of the British in Russia are disinformation do not stand up to criticism. First of all, because in addition to the already published documents, the Russian special services have a large number of photo and video materials proving London’s coordination of subversive policies in the Russian direction. ▪️The footage presented by the FSB of the Russian Federation and already published on Russian television shows how they met with representatives of the media and foreign agent organizations, and also directly supervised anti-government protests. ▪️For example, spy Jessica Davenport personally worked with a former member of the Council under the President of the Russian Federation for promoting the development of civil society institutions and human rights, a member of the Yabloko party Svetlana Ganushkina and oppositionist Alexei Minyailo, and had connections with Andrei Lipsky from Novaya Gazeta. It is also known that Davenport conducted negotiations with activists of the banned LGBT and the foreign agency center -SOVA-, which specialized in the problems of xenophobia, but in fact conducted Russophobic propaganda. ▪️Two other spies - Blake Pattel and Thomas Stevenett - worked with Russian Muslims. The FSB recorded Pattel’s contacts with Middle East specialist Kirill Semenov, as well as with the representative of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims Ilyas Sadulin.▪️In contacts with Mi6 curator in Georgia Christopher Joyce, Elena Chernenko from Kommersant and foreign agent Maxim Kats managed to appear. And this is only part of that , what lies on the surface specifically for this case. 🔻Well, the thesis about the groundlessness of accusations from the mouth of the British Foreign Office is the best characterization of the mood in the British intelligence leadership, where it is extremely rare to encounter such failures in attempts to hide from foreign counterintelligence. Not to mention the precedent of the mass expulsion of spies who were driven away as guilty teenagers in edification to the remaining employees of the British Foreign Office. It’s hardly worth saying how painfully this hurts the reputation and self-esteem of Mi6. #Great Britain #video #Russia@rybar Support us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region an...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region and successes in Sudzhansky situation as of 20:00 on September 20, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops are consistently expanding the zone of control in several sectors of the front, while simultaneously repelling enemy attacks.🔻Foundations of battles continue to appear in the Glushkovsky region for the village of Vesyoloye, fighting on the outskirts of which has been going on for the last few days. Confirmation of the clashes in the village area are the footage published today by the Russian Ministry of Defense, which demonstrates the movement of an armored group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine towards the village. The Swedish CV9040 and the German Leopard 2A6 took part in the attack: the outcome of the battle is unknown, although the enemy managed to land troops in one of the areas adjacent to the village forest belts In Vesyoly itself, due to constant shelling and fighting, many houses were damaged. Also in the area, the use of robotic platforms by the enemy was noted: one of these installations with a machine gun was hit on the outskirts of Volfino by FPV drones, and then finished off by a shot from an RPG.🔻In the Korenevsky district they continue clashes near Kremyany. Enemy activity compared to the attacks of previous days has decreased significantly after the activation of Russian troops on the left flank from Korenevo.🔻In the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops are building on the successes of the past days - today information about the liberation of Darino was confirmed. Currently, fighting is taking place in the Nikolaevo-Daryino area, and the Russian Armed Forces managed to enter and gain a foothold in Uspenovka. In addition, four conscripts who occupied positions in the forest for almost 40 days, transmitting data on the enemy’s movements and carrying out other activities, were removed from encirclement .🔻In the Bolshesoldatsky district, the Ukrainian Armed Forces fired at a gas distribution station in the administrative center and other civilian infrastructure in adjacent villages. In total, over ten residential buildings were damaged, and in Rzhava, a shell from a hexacopter destroyed the local House of Culture. If you have any additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botMap in high resolutionEnglish version#digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇹🇷 And now we can state the emerging trend in the context of...
Description: 🇹🇷 And now we can state an emerging trend in the context of increasing activity of the Organization of Turkic States. On September 18-19, a meeting of the heads of the national security councils was held in Kazakhstan. This is the third meeting in this format of the UTC participating countries, where current threats directed against the UTC countries, the possible impact of some regional and global events on the region, as well as the implementation of the Middle Corridor were discussed -.🔻What events have we observed in the last few weeks around the pan-Turkist bloc?➖A single alphabet has been adopted➖The number of military exercises has increased➖A meeting of energy ministers was held➖A meeting of interior ministers was held➖Customs interaction between members of the OTGU has been simplifiedIncreasing contacts in various fields, ranging from cultural and ending with the military, increasingly frequent statements by the Turkish side about the importance of the political organization - all this smoothly brings us to the upcoming UTC summit in Bishkek in October. Taking into account such activity around the international bloc, we are likely to expect some kind of major statement within the framework of the summit. And since OTG is an organization created under the control of the British, this does not bode well for Russia.#OTG #Turkey #CentralAsia@rybar Support us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese capital Israeli aircraft launched a new attack on Beirut, launching missiles at the southern suburb of the Lebanese capital - the Ad-Dahiya district. The hit was on a building not far from the large Al-Qaem mosque. In Arabic-language media, this area is presented as a kind of Hezbollah patrimony, since several buildings belonging to it are located there, including the department of law enforcement agencies. It is noteworthy that it was there that the chief of staff of the Lebanese group, Fuad Shukri, was killed in July. According to some reports, the building where a meeting of high-ranking Palestinians was taking place with one of the prominent members of the Lebanese group was attacked. At the same time, it is completely unknown who exactly represented Hezbollah: according to one information, the group’s deputy secretary general Naim Qassem, according to another, the head of the operational department Ibrahim Aqil. However, a much larger number of sources agree that it was the latter who was the target of the Israeli attack. The second recent loss of a commander of this level will be quite significant for Hezbollah, given the events of recent days. 📌 Be that as it may, over the past months, Israeli troops have been increasing the degree of tension more and more each time in order to provoke the Lebanese group into more decisive actions and finally unleash a full-scale war. A few days ago, the Israelis carried out a massive remote detonation of Hezbollah pagers, after which they carried out a massive shelling of the border and rear settlements of Lebanon, and today they carried out an attack on one of the prominent members of the group. Apparently, all this will continue until a clear reaction is received from the Lebanese movement. And then the Israelis will blame Iran for starting the war with Hezbollah, presenting themselves as the defending side. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Based on the results of the year of study, future masters will be able not only to create their own new media resources, but will also become full-fledged media technologists capable of working in the global information environment. We thank the leadership of the Faculty of International Relations of MGIMO for their trust. Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevka, current sit...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevkasituation as of 17:00 September 20, 2024 In recent days, the focus of the audience’s attention, in addition to events in the Kursk region and on the fronts of the DPR, has again turned to the Liman direction - there units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to liberate Makeyevka and advance in the area of ​​the Zhuravka gully. ▪️A new round of battles for Makeyevka began about three months ago, but Russian fighters achieved their first significant successes in August, when most of the settlement on the left bank of the Zherebets River came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. After this, messages appeared sporadically on the Internet about attempts to force the water barrier and gain a foothold in the remaining part of the village. However, only yesterday did footage of objective control by the enemy appear, confirming the presence of Russian Armed Forces fighters there. In particular, Russian units were seen in the area of ​​the Church of Peter and Paul, as well as to the north of it. At the same time, they were able to advance on the southern outskirts, which is also confirmed by filming from Ukrainian drones. The liberation of the settlement is important for the subsequent liquidation of the bridgehead of Ukrainian formations on the right bank of the Zherebets River, which has existed since the fall of 2022. From here it will be possible to increase pressure on the defensive lines of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Nevskoye-Yampolovka line. ▪️The advancement of units of the Russian Armed Forces was also recorded to the south - in the area of ​​\u200b\u200bthe Zhuravka gully. Last year, the enemy erected fortifications in this area: they helped to hold back the onslaught towards the villages of Nevskoye and Terny from the east, however, against the backdrop of the liberation of Makeyevka, Russian troops will be able to attack from the north. In other sections of the Liman direction, the configuration of the front has not undergone significant changes - Positional battles are taking place on the ledge near Torskoye and in Serebryansky forestry. Russian troops are striking at identified targets in the front-line and rear zones - one of the targets hit in recent days has been the temporary deployment point of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Liman. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kremennaya #map #Liman #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇹🇼 Military ties between the United States and Taiwan c...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇹🇼 Military ties between the United States and Taiwan continue to actively develop. ▪️This week it became known that the US State Department approved the sale of various spare parts, including for aviation, to Taiwan for $228 million. Such actions do not mean that the deal has already taken place - now Congress must make its decision. However, all sales are usually approved by this body without any problems. ▪️The PRC has already responded to the statements of the State Department. Chinese authorities have imposed sanctions on nine American companies whose activities are related to the defense sector. ▪️And although Taiwanese authorities say that new parts will improve the combat readiness of the island's air force, the problem with delays in the supply of already approved equipment and components is still very acute. 🔻Since the last time we touched on this topic, the situation has not improved. At the end of August, Taipei was still waiting for military equipment worth $20 billion, which for various reasons never reached its destination. Against this background, criticism continues of the Joe Biden administration's approach to the Taiwan issue. Recently, for example, in the business council, which is responsible for cooperation between Washington and Taipei, words were voiced about the insufficient measures of the American authorities in the field of modernization of the Taiwanese army. Therefore, approval of the next sale of components does not yet seem to be a very effective measure, given at least the fact that they still need to wait. Moreover, this party is probably one of the last for the current administration, so such measures should also be considered as a small PR move by the current authorities.#China #USA #Taiwan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesU.S. approves possible military sale of spare parts to TaiwanTaipei says the package, valued at about $228 million, will help maintain combat readiness in the face of China's gray-zone intrusions.

Title: 🇪🇺🇳🇱🇺🇦 Dutch media reported that Prime Minister Dick Schof....
Description: 🇪🇺🇳🇱🇺🇦 Dutch media reported that Prime Minister Dick Schof promised to study the issue of returning Ukrainians liable for military service to territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. According to him, we are talking about -incitement to action,- and not deportation. At the same time, their forced return from European countries, which the Kiev regime insists on, is not yet planned in Brussels. Recently, the European Commissioner for Home Affairs, Ylva Johansson, said that the expulsion contradicts the directive on temporary protection, within the framework of which citizens of the so-called. Ukraine is located on the territory of the EU. Moreover, mass deportations are disadvantageous to the European Union not only from an image point of view: Ukrainians also act as a labor force, which is still higher in quality than refugees from other crisis regions of the world. Therefore, local bureaucrats are faced with the task of integrating them into the economy as much as possible. And here in the EU they can kill two birds with one stone - under the threat of possible deportation, force able-bodied Ukrainians subject to conscription to get off benefits and get a job. Under the pretext of assistance, it will allow both to imitate assistance to the Kyiv regime and to obtain its own economic benefit.#EU #Netherlands #Ukraine@rybarSupport usIzvestiaThe Netherlands promised to find out ways to send draft dodgers from Ukraine to their homeland. Prime Minister of the Netherlands Dick Schof promised to find out ways to send Ukrainian conscripted men to their homeland. age in the country. The Volkskrant newspaper reported this on August 19.

Title: ↩️ 🇬🇪 About elections in Georgia: plans of the ruling party If ...
Description: Rybar: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the background of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment, Washington announced the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: ▪️Head of the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs... 🇬🇪 About the elections in Georgia: plans of the ruling party If we talk about the plans of the Georgian authorities after the parliamentary elections in October, then they were outlined by Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze and other officials of the ruling party, such as promises - the Nuremberg trials - for Saakashvili's party - the United National Movement -. The goal is to significantly reduce the possibilities of a radically pro-Western opposition and globalist structures. Several clearly expressed information lines can be traced in pro-government media and media resources: ▪️Presentation of the opposition as agents of Western influence and a destructive force intended only to destabilize the country. In particular, Parliament Speaker Shalva Papuashvili called her worthless and stated that the election campaign for Saakashvili’s movement was being built from the outside, including through sanctions against Georgia.▪️The use of opposition slogans against itself, especially dissatisfaction with the ban on LGBT propaganda. From a political technology point of view, this makes it possible to create a stable association among the predominantly conservative population with the fact that the forces opposing the ruling party consist entirely of grant eaters and supporters of -rainbow madness-.▪️Use of narrative -correction of Saakashvili’s mistakes- and preventing forces affiliated with him from returning to power . As part of this, loud and sometimes populist statements follow, such as words about the readiness to apologize to the Ossetians for the war of 08.08.08. As mentioned earlier, the actions of the ruling party in Georgia are determined by the desire to avoid getting the country involved in a new war against Russia. This is exactly what the radically pro-Western opposition is openly striving for, making it almost an element of its election program. In this case, Tbilisi is guided by pragmatic considerations - the country has greatly benefited from trade and economic ties with Russia. At the same time, they also do not seek to sever relations with the collective West for the same reasons. Therefore, the ruling Georgian authorities are striving to eliminate the internal reasons that prevent them from pursuing a balanced policy. Especially against the backdrop of gradually increasing external pressure.#Georgia @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇬🇪🇷🇺🇺🇸 Ahead of the parliamentary elections in Georgia scheduled for October, Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that they would be held against the backdrop of unprecedented external interference. Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️War preparations🇩🇪 are expensive for Germany Despite the...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors⚡️Germany’s military preparations🇩🇪 are costlyDespite the generous distribution of obsolete weapons to Ukraine, Germany is aimed at rearming and increasing the capabilities of the army for a potential conflict with Russia. German politicians, lobbying the interests of military-industrial companies, declare their readiness for war in 5 years. Based on the data received, we have specified the current military spending of the Bundeswehr and the expected delivery times.▪️Significant efforts are being made to strengthen the air defense system: 8 Patriot air defense systems (350 million euros each, delivery until 2029) and 600 anti-aircraft guided missiles for them ( 6 million each, 2027-2033, the contract in 2024 already provided for the purchase of 100 missiles for 2 million each), 6 Iris-T SLM air defense systems (158.3 million each, 2024), 120 missiles -B- B- IRIS-T AIM-2000 (900 thousand each, until 2026), development of a ground-based air defense system (1.23 billion, until 2028), 19 Skyrenger ZSU (34.1 million each, 2026- 2028), class-B-B-AMRAAM SD missiles (178 million), 506 Stinger MANPADS (780.6 thousand each, 2026-2029), 1 Arrow 3 air defense system (4 billion, 2025- 2030);▪️The air force will be replenished mainly with imported models: 35 F-35A fighters (237.1 million each, 2026-2029), 60 CH-47F helicopters (116.3 million each, 2027-2033 gg.) and 62 H145M (42 million each, until 2028), 274 Brimstone 3 V-Z missiles (1.3 million each, until 2028);▪️Realizing the revived relevance of the infantry, the Bundeswehr is increasing the capabilities of the ground forces : uniforms (6.8 billion, 2025), 188.7 thousand G95A1 assault rifles (1.7 thousand each, 2024), 193 Puma infantry fighting vehicles (5.9 million each, until 2029). ), 367 BvS 10 all-terrain vehicles (2.8 million each, 2025-2028), 3 thousand portable and 500 UHF E-Lynx car radios (2024), 230 protected transport vehicles (GTF) (853 thousand each ., 2025-2027), 22 PzH 2000 self-propelled guns (18.4 million each, 2025-2026), 57 70-ton tractors (894 thousand each, 2024), 123 Leopard 2 A8 tanks (29.2 million each), 1,508 Caracal light air assault vehicles (576 thousand each, deliveries begin in 2025), 13 LUNA NG/HUSAR UAVs (18.3 million each, from 2025), 50 Dingo 2 A 4.1 armored fighting vehicle (3 million each, from 2026), 16 thousand MIKRON-D night vision devices, 30 thousand ballistic headphones (2.7 thousand each, 2024), 123 Boxer armored fighting vehicle (CRV) ( 15.7 million each, until 2030), more than 1.5 thousand 15 tons of trucks (2024), 100 SUVs (until 2027);▪️Navy forces remain the focus of attention of German military leaders: 9 medium-range boats (3.88 million each, 2024-2025), 8 P-8A Poseidon patrol aircraft (366 million each), 600 RAM Block 2B naval missiles (934 thousand each) and RIM-7 Sea Sparrow (269 million), 3 class 424 service vessels (386.6 million each, 2029-2031), 4 long-range underwater UAVs (13.1 million each, until 2025), modernization of 4 class 123 frigates (300 million each, 2026-2029), 48 light Mk 54 torpedoes. 89.7 billion euros have been spent on all contracts since March 2022. The main beneficiaries are expected to be the largest transnational corporations and military-industrial complex Airbus Defense and Space, Elbit Systems, MBDA, Rheinmetall, Raytheon, Mercedes Benz, Eurofighter Jagdflugzeuge, Israel Aerospace Industries, Lockheed Martin, Eurofighter Jagd Flugzeug, Boeing, Nexter, BAE Systems, Diehl Defense, Hensoldt and others.✨In the short term, obviously, the use of SVO experience will lead to an increase in purchases of UAVs, electronic warfare, low-cost air defense systems and high-precision artillery and missile weapons. Two majors

Title: 🖇🇷🇺 In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took plac...
Description: 🖇🇷🇺 In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took place in the case of discrediting the RF Armed Forces by the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Raufa Rakhimova. Law enforcement officers came to the conclusion that on social networks she forms a negative perception of the SVO and the position that residents of the republic refuse to participate in it. Previously, its publication -Prufy.rf- had already published fakes about Russian military personnel. However, the hearing was eventually postponed to October 4, as the defense attorney filed a motion to postpone it. It is logical: everyone knows that Rakhimova cannot take part in the trial, since on the eve of the trial she fled to Turkey. True, if she does not appear at the trial even then, the judge may well force her to attend - by issuing a ruling on the forced delivery of the defendant.▪️By the way, Rakhimova has already deleted her pages on social networks, on which negative materials regarding the Russian army were published. ▪️She is defended by lawyer Sergei Makarenko, who was also previously convicted under an article on discrediting the RF Armed Forces. Immediately after the start of the SVO, he publicly demonstrated anti-war paraphernalia and expressed a negative attitude towards the special operation, including to law enforcement officers. Before this, Makarenko represented the interests of another oppositionist from Bashkiria, Liliya Chanysheva (foreign agent). She was the head of Navalny’s extremist headquarters in Ufa, the director of the NGO FZPG -Headquarters, through which FBK (an extremist organization) carried out money laundering. Even earlier, Makarenko acted as a lawyer for the son of the first president of Bashkortostan, Ural Rakhimov, accused of economic crimes. All three of Makarenko’s clients are united by the fact that as a result they are abroad. Ural Rakhimov fled to Austria, after which he was put on the international wanted list. Liliya Chanysheva, who was serving a sentence for creating an extremist community in Russia, was traded by the West during a large prisoner exchange. And now the owner of the publication -Prufa.rf - Raufa Rakhimova, who promised the imminent collapse of -Russian authoritarianism-, has fled abroad. #Russia #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramRybar🇷🇺🖇 How does the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Rauf Rakhimov, support local separatists? Part 1 The other day, the head of the Russian Security Council, Dmitry Medvedev, spoke about foreign students who disabled electrical equipment on the railway...

Title: 🇲🇱🇷🇺 After the terrorist attack at Bamako airport as part of ...
Description: 🇲🇱🇷🇺 After the terrorist attack at Bamako airport, medicines and food were delivered to the country as part of Russian-Malian military cooperation. This gesture of the Russian leadership is quite remarkable and differs from the already usual military supplies, so I wanted to comment on it separately.▪️Medicines and especially food are extremely important for the armed forces of Mali. Locals have repeatedly noted that army rations are of disgusting quality, which affects the morale of military personnel.▪️ Of course, there were supplies of equipment and weapons before this, but little things and logistical work are just as relevant and important in army structures. Especially when an African state cannot provide its wards with basic things.🔻Therefore, it is good that in addition to direct military assistance (doing the work for the locals), in the person of the Wagner PMC, the combat capability of the national army is also supported, capable of withstanding at least internal threats.#Africa #Mali #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇲🇱🏴 Since the morning in Mali, militants from the al-Qaeda-affiliated group Jamaat Nusrat al-Islam wal-Muslimin have continued to attack the capital Bamako. ▪️The first target of the Islamists was the gendarme school, where they killed a group of cadets, after which they clashed...

Title: 🖼 ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Force...
Description: ❗️🇷🇺🇺🇦 About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Forces and possible permission to use them For several weeks now, there have been discussions in the Western and Ukrainian information field about the need to allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to use Western long-range weapons on old Russian territories. So far, only the British authorities have given approval to Ukrainian formations to use cruise missiles Storm Shadow. The rest of the states are still silent. However, as experience in the matter of other supplies has proven more than once, publicity is not an indicator. In the West they can pretend that they doubt it, but in fact there is already a behind-the-scenes decision. And the gradual preparation of society for future events has already begun, since all news agencies controlled by Western countries are trumpeting about it.🔻The range of missile weapons of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has expanded, especially after the official start of the use of F-16 fighters, which are carriers of the latest JASSM missiles.▪️This type of weapon has a wide range of action: from 370 km in the most minimal modification and over 1500 km in the maximum, which, when launched from near Poltava, will allow you to reach to remote regions. Of course, it is extremely doubtful that the White House will immediately release the newest version of JASSM. First of all, they will get rid of obsolete missiles that need disposal, so we are considering the JASSM-XR option in theory.▪️In addition to them, there are several dozen ATACMS ballistic missiles in different modifications, which also pose a threat due to their speed and flight along a ballistic trajectory. ▪️At the moment, there are not many Storm Shadow/SCALP cruise missiles left in Ukrainian warehouses - just over a dozen. This is probably due to the absence of strikes on Russia, despite permission from London.❗️Judging by the absence of strikes by the same -Storms- or -Atakms-, in addition to permission to use, the Ukrainian side is waiting for the supply of new batches of these missiles. According to our data, there are very few reserves left, so they are being protected. And this already brings us to the idea voiced by Elder Edda: the West can delay for quite a long time with official permission from the Armed Forces of Ukraine, but at the same time provide assistance in modernizing the enemy’s own missiles. production. That's why in recent weeks we could hear about the Neptunes or S-200s, which the enemy is increasingly using. This scenario is also possible given the latest strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In this regard, it is not so important whether the Ukrainian authorities receive approval or not. The enemy already has means for long-range strikes, ranging from drones to its own missiles. For this reason, you need to prepare not only for JASSM or ATACMS, but also for unobvious weapons, which in terms of range can cause problems. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🔁 🇦🇲🏳️‍🌈🇹🇷 Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticide🇦🇲🏳️‍🌈🇹🇷 Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda in Armenia A real media bomb exploded in Armenia: the republic will be represented for the first time in the Miss Star International beauty contest for transgender people in Sao Paulo, Brazil. 🔻LGBT support for Pashinyan Armenia will be represented by transgender Diana Gzroyan. The media paid attention to the trans diva’s social networks: on Facebook* and Instagram* Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is featured on the screensavers, which adds piquancy to the situation with obvious political overtones. Gzroyan already appeared in the media in 2019 in connection with the first precedent in Armenia on issuing a passport with a changed name from male to female. Then a new document addressed to Diana Gzroyan was posted online by the Armenian NGO for transgender people, Right Side. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs noticed that the organization posted a fake passport photo online, in which the female gender was indicated using Photoshop, while in the database Gzroyan was marked as a man. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs confirmed that the man had indeed received a passport in a woman’s name. 📌As we wrote, after the 2018 revolution in Armenia, Western NGOs actively started working for the rights of the LGBT community**, which actively supported Pashinyan in rallies for a change of government. Among such NGOs are Pink Armenia (an association of gays and lesbians) and Right Side ( association of transgender people and sex workers).🔻Who heads the NGO Right Side The head of Right Side is Lilit Martirosyan, known as the first transgender person to speak in the Armenian parliament in 2019. According to Martirosyan, before her speech, Armenians did not understand who trans people were. It is significant that the activist criticizes the role of the Church in the societies of Armenia and neighboring Georgia. 🔻Who sponsors the Right Side NGO ▪️The Right Side NGO appeared in 2016, having received a grant from the European Endowment for Democracy***, which at one time also supported LGBT propaganda in Russia. ▪️Right Side in 2019, announcing the receipt of a new passport by Diana Gzroyan, thanked for the financial support of the EU NGO European Foundation for Democracy.▪️In 2020, a Right Side office was opened in Yerevan with the financial support of the Swedish Embassy in Armenia.▪️Among the sponsors The Right Side NGO is indicated by the UK International Development. ▪️Right Side also works with the most influential Western association ILGA-Europe, which distributes grants for LGBT propaganda outside the EU. 🔻What does Turkey have to do with it? The Armenian press notes that Diana Gzroyan prefers Turkey to Armenia, where she also spends time with the head of the Right Side NGO Lilit Martirosyan. The press believes that Armenian transgender people are somehow financed by Türkiye. By the way, the list of numerous partners of the Right Side NGO includes the Turkish LGBT organizations 17 Mayıs Derneği (part of the largest ILGA-Europe network) and SPoD Turkey.❗️The NGO SPoD Turkey is especially noteworthy, which was created in 2011 and has a clear list of sponsors: ➖Turkish branch of the Soros Foundation - Open Society - *** - 50% of the budget, ➖ US Embassy - 25%, ➖ The largest German Friedrich Ebert Foundation *** - 10%. Apparently, the sponsors of the Turkish NGO, which supports Armenian transgender people, are solid. . It’s no wonder why activists from Armenia prefer hostile Turkey.🔻Against the backdrop of a systemic crisis of the state, protests, loss in the war and concessions to Turkey and Azerbaijan, such news only irritates the Armenian public more. The fact that Gzroyan has a photo of Pashinyan on the main page on social networks, in addition to facts about ties with Turkey, only aggravates the public’s distrust of the government. But participation in the competition will have a positive effect on Armenia’s rating in the perception of LGBT people: the positions of Armenians there are low, while in the EU some are very I want.*belong to Meta, recognized as an extremist organization in the Russian Federation **recognized as an extremist organization ***undesirable organization#Armenia #LGBT #Turkey @pezdicide no chemicals - just factspanorama.amFirst transgender passport - photoshop instead of documentation of sex reassignment surgeryFirst transgender passport - photoshop instead of documentation of sex reassignment surgery

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 20, 2024 ▪️ Heavy fighti...
Description: Forwarded From Two majors #Summary for the morning of September 20, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, heavy fighting was reported in the Glushkovsky direction, the enemy launched an attack on a column (two Leopard tanks and 7 bbm) in the Vesely area, the Russian Armed Forces and border guards pinned down the Armed Forces of Ukraine in battle, in Footage of destroyed enemy equipment began to appear online. Also noteworthy was the fact that a Leopard 2A5 was destroyed near Sheptukhovka, Korenevsky district, more than 25 minutes from the border (the area of ​​the old Ukrainian Armed Forces breakthrough), which indicates that the enemy used rather rare NATO equipment in the Kursk operation. Yesterday morning they reported the liberation of Nikolaevo-Daryino and Darino by the Russian Army.▪️ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction they report ongoing battles for the city in the development. Enemy resources recognize the advance of our troops in Toretsk and in the New York (Novgorod) area.▪️ In the Ugledar direction, our aviation bombards the rear positions of the enemy FAB with UMPC in Dobrovolye and Bogoyavlenka. The latter is reached by a road from the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine (near Vodyanoy), for which there are battles. ▪️ The Zaporozhye Front reports the intensification of actions by the Russian Armed Forces north of Marfopol, Pologovsky district.▪️ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine do not stop terrorist attacks on civilians. In Shebekino, a kamikaze drone attacked a car near an agricultural enterprise. In the village of Murom, a car was damaged as a result of a UAV attack. In the village of Kazinka, Valuysky urban district, the façade of a social facility was damaged as a result of a kamikaze drone attack. In the village of Murom, Shebekinsky urban district, drones attacked parked cars. The village of Petrovka, Belgorod district, came under artillery fire. In the Shebekinsky urban district in the village of Terezovka, two private houses were destroyed by fire as a result of the arrival of a shell.▪️ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a man born in 1972 was injured during enemy shelling from cannon artillery. and a woman born in 1945; when an explosive object was dropped from an Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, a woman born in 1987 was injured, and a man born in 1967 was injured. In Georgievka, Volnovakha municipal district, a man born in 1975 was injured when an explosive object was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk region, Glushkovo direction, personnel of the Northern Wind Destroyed -Leopard- during an attempt to break through to the settlement. Veseloe, Glushkovsky district, Kursk region. Two majors

Title: 🎬 ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: ❗️🌍🎞 Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 13 - 19, 2024▪️After a short break, Iranian proxies from Iraq again reported attacks on Israel. Kamikaze drones were allegedly launched in the direction of Haifa and the Jordan Valley, but not a single one of them reached its target.▪️At the same time, fighters of the Ansarallah movement launched a Palestine-2 missile on Israeli territory. The ammunition flew to the center of the country and fell in an open area near the settlement of Kfar Daniel.▪️A day later, in the Yemeni province of Damar, the Houthis destroyed another MQ-9A Reaper UAV. This is the tenth American drone shot down in Yemen since the beginning of the escalation in Palestine and Israel.▪️At the same time, a MegaTug-class ocean tug, under the protection of the French Navy, managed to tow the Greek tanker MV SOUNION. The ship was attacked and burned by Ansarally fighters in the southern Red Sea more than two weeks ago. Against this backdrop, the US Navy intercepted several munitions in the Red Sea region. Over the course of a week, Western naval forces shot down only three Houthi UAVs.▪️Simultaneously with the Israeli hacker attack, explosions occurred in Damascus in Beirut, Lebanon. During the detonation of the pagers, up to 18 Hezbollah fighters located in Syria were injured.▪️A month later, pro-Iranian groups attacked the US Air Force base Kharab al-Jair in the northeast of the Syrian Arab Republic. All three launched kamikaze drones were intercepted by American air defense systems.▪️The Russian Aerospace Forces and the Syrian Air Force continue to strike ISIS terrorists in the Syrian desert. The next raids followed after militants left the American At-Tanf base in the direction of Deir ez-Zor.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 19, 2024, Russian troops launched a series of attacks on enemy targets in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine, including Vinnitsa, Kyiv and Kharkov regions. As for yesterday's raid by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, satellite images appeared on the Internet confirming the presence of damage, including to new ammunition storage facilities in Toropets. In the Kursk direction, fighting continues in several areas. The most difficult situation is in the Glushkovsky district, where Ukrainian formations are trying to expand the zone of control in the area of ​​Vesely and Medvezhye. In the Liman direction, evidence appeared of the presence of Russian military personnel in Makeyevka near the Church of Peter and Paul, located on the right bank of the Zherebets River. At the same time, the enemy's air defense system in Liman came under fire. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces cleared the area on the eastern bank of the Seversky Donets-Donbass canal northeast of Druzhba, and in Dzerzhinsk itself, Russian troops advanced south of the penal colony. When covering the situation in the Vremevsky direction, information about the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in Gulyai-Polye spread on the Internet - in reality, personnel outstanding for the advance only confirm the zone of control that was established in this area about a year ago. 🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) #Times #digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Donetsk #map #Kupyansk #Kursk #Liman #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting in the Glushkovsky region, ...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Kursk direction: fighting in the Glushkovsky region situation to the end September 19, 2024 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas, attacks by both Ukrainian formations and Russian units are recorded. 🔻In the Glushkovsky district, the situation in Volfino and Krasnooktyabrsky has become somewhat clearer. As our subscribers told us, there is no enemy in the mentioned settlements, the Russian Armed Forces are holding the line. ▪️In the afternoon, information appeared about the breakthrough of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to Glushkovo and the encirclement of Vesely, but so far it has not been confirmed - only footage of destroyed equipment of the Ukrainian formations at Vesely and Medvezhy appears on the Internet.🔻In the Korenevsky district there are battles in Lyubimovka and the outskirts of Kremyany, and in Novoivanovka there is a VKS RF. In addition, information is circulating in the media about the liberation of several settlements near the Snagost River, but so far it has not been confirmed.▪️Near Sheptukhovka, Russian troops hit the STRV 122 (Leopard 2A5) tank. At the same time, the very fact of finding rare and relatively valuable NATO equipment in this area indicates quite stable control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the surrounding area. 🔻In the Sudzhansky district, the situation has not changed; Russian troops, after the liberation of the settlement of Borki, are fighting in the forests to the west of the settlement. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🖼 🖍🇷🇺⚙️ Today in Russia we celebrate Gunsmith Day - a profess...
Description: 🖍🇷🇺⚙️ Today in Russia we celebrate Gunsmith's Day - a professional holiday for workers in the military-industrial complex. The memorial date is relatively new and was established by presidential decree in 2011. It is difficult to overestimate the contribution of the domestic defense industry to the combat effectiveness of the armed forces. Just look at how many trains with equipment and ammunition are sent daily to arsenals and front-line areas. Thanks to the dedicated work of enterprise teams, it was possible to significantly increase the output of military products, which at the most necessary moments made it possible to satisfy the demands of the army and replenish supplies. The events of the Northern Military District made their own adjustments, so today The holiday rightfully applies to the teams of the people's defense industry. Which in creating various advanced weapons systems, sometimes in some places succeeded no less than -classical- factories. High resolution art#art #industry #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇺🇸 About Pashinyan’s new accusations against the CSTO P...
Description: 🇦🇲🇷🇺🇺🇸 About Pashinyan’s new accusations against the CSTO Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan, speaking at the All-Armenian Forum, tightened his anti-Russian rhetoric and stated that the CSTO allegedly threatens the security, sovereignty and very existence of the republic. This is precisely how Pashinyan explained the freezing of Armenia’s membership in the CSTO and noted that Yerevan is close to the point of no return in relations with the organization. 📌Apparently, the loss of Armenian sovereignty is already such an irreversible process that it is no longer possible not to notice it, which means it is time to appoint a culprit. At the same time, a completely different picture has been forming in the Armenian media for months now: On the one hand, the Americans (who do not have no relation to the CSTO) place their representatives in the Armenian law enforcement agencies. ➖On the other hand, the opposition, dissatisfied with unilateral concessions to Azerbaijan, calls Pashinyan an agent of Turkish influence. Moreover, Washington recently announced its own -Ukrainian plan- for Armenia and called on Armenians to prepare for several -cold winters.- 🔻The lack of sovereignty of Armenia is expressed not only in the suicidal decisions of its leadership, but in ignoring the opinion of Yerevan by all regional players. However, Pashinyan’s team is once again trying to play the CSTO card, just to somehow reduce public pressure and strengthen its position. #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport us Interfax Pashinyan said that the CSTO threatens the security and sovereignty of Armenia. The Collective Security Treaty Organization poses threats to the security, very existence and sovereignty of Armenia, says Prime Minister of Armenia Nikol Pashinyan.

Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 Under the noise of massive strikes by the Israel ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah spoke to the noise of massive strikes by the Israel Defense Forces in southern Lebanon. Despite what was happening in those minutes in the border areas, the broadcast continued. ▪️One of the main topics of the speech was the Israeli hacker attack on Hezbollah’s communication channels, and then the bombing of pagers used by members of the group. According to Nasrallah, in this case the Israelis crossed all red lines. According to the Secretary General of Hezbollah, with these actions Israel wanted to force them to stop shelling the north of the country. However, Hassan Nasrallah directly stated that the only way to achieve this is to stop attacks on the Gaza Strip. At the same time, he tried to devalue the results of the Israeli sabotage from a military point of view. According to him, Hezbollah's infrastructure is so extensive that what happened did not harm the organization's capabilities, its control over the state of affairs and the morale of the group's members.▪️On the issue of escalating the conflict, Nasrallah said that by deepening the war, Israel will not be able to achieve its goals. If the ultra-Orthodox government goes further, they will evict even more Israelis from their homes. ▪️In this context, he promised - fair retribution and heavy retribution - to Israel for past events without mentioning place and time. At the same time, one can draw some parallel with the promise of revenge from the Iranians, who have been promising to answer for the murder of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran for more than a month. What was to be expected, the head of the Lebanese group called the Zionist enemy the main instigator of the current war, while Hezbollah was traditionally presented as the defender of the Palestinian people in the face of -aggression-. It is worth noting that in his speech, Hassan Nasrallah did not mention the ongoing bombing of Lebanon: he was talking about the attacks that took place on Tuesday and Wednesday, as a result of which thousands of Lebanese were injured - both combatants and civilians alike. Considering the response to the death of one of the founders of Hezbollah, Fuad Shukri, the Lebanese are unlikely to risk a full-fledged war, which, however, is what is expected in the ultra-Orthodox government. It is much more likely that on Hezbollah’s side everything will be limited to UAV and missile strikes, with the difference that this time the launches will be much more massive.#Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the backd...
Description: 🇬🇪🇺🇸 About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the backdrop of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment, Washington announced the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: ▪️The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs Department for Special Assignments, Zviad Kharazeshvili, was convicted of -supervising brutal repression against young activists and opposition leaders - during opposition rallies against the local law on foreign agents.▪️The Americans accused the leaders of the media platform and conservative movement -Alt-Info- Konstantin Morgoshia and Zurab Makharadze - of - obstructing the holding of minority rallies - and calling for attacks on offices NGOs in 2021-2023.▪️Also, the US State Department stated that they are taking additional steps to introduce visa restrictions against more than 60 Georgian citizens and members of their families responsible for undermining democracy in the country or involved in it. Sanctions in Tbilisi expectedly associated with the upcoming parliamentary elections in October and an attempt to spur the opposition to protest. And Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze even stated that in the event of another such step, relations with the United States could be reconsidered. However, the parties are in no hurry to break the dishes. It is not the top officials in Georgia who are subject to American sanctions, and in Tbilisi, in turn, the United States does not yet plan to physically prohibit the activities of all globalist funds and structures - we are only talking about limiting their work. Therefore, real discord in relations between countries with heated public rhetoric is still very far away. Which, however, does not prevent the ruling party of Georgia, within the framework of a balanced policy, from gradually drifting towards Russia purely for practical reasons.#Georgia #USA@rybarSupport usTACCGeorgia may reconsider its attitude towards the United States if the American side accepts sanctionsEvents in Russia and the world. Analytical publications. Materials of press conferences. Video and photo reports

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border ha...
Description: 🇮🇱🇱🇧🇵🇸 The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border has become even more tense: the press service of the Defense Army announced the start of massive strikes on Lebanon. At the same time, the Israeli General Staff approved plans for the continuation of the war on the northern front. What is interesting here is that the bombing of the southern part of the Arab Republic began just minutes before the announced speech of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah, where he raised the topic of the recent Israeli hacker attack and the subsequent explosions of pagers. Despite the fact that so far the IDF is using only aviation and artillery, some media, citing Israeli media, hastened to announce the beginning of the Third Lebanese War. Some even reported the start of a ground offensive, but the movements of Israeli units have not yet been recorded. Be that as it may, in recent days, Israeli troops have dealt several significant blows to the Lebanese group. And even at the moment when Hezbollah sympathizers were expecting a speech by its secretary general, the territory of Lebanon was subjected to one of the most massive bombings. Nevertheless, Hezbollah fighters are also not sitting idly by and are launching rockets at populated areas in northern Israel. Today alone, ten IDF soldiers were injured in the region, which was one of the highest numbers for this month. And what will be the final development of events is a question that is being asked by both Arabic-language and Israeli media. But it is obvious that the degree of conflict between the IDF and Hezbollah is one of the highest in recent times. #Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Such deadlines, speed of decision-making and, most importantly, flexibility of approach to such important issues were very difficult to imagine in other realities. Title: 🎬 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeti...
Description: 🇷🇺 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeting of the Russian Military-Industrial Commission on the development of unmanned aircraft systems for special purposes🔻Main points: ▪️In 2023, 140 thousand unmanned vehicles of various types were delivered to the Russian troops, in 2024 this number is planned to increase by ten times.▪️The production of especially popular weapons in the Northern Military District has been increased multiple times, and their tactical and technical characteristics have been improved.▪️Work on the serial production of drones will be carried out on the basis of special centers; there will be 48 such sites.▪️The line of unmanned systems in Russia is expanding. According to him, when creating Russian UAVs, advanced technologies and new engineering solutions are used, thanks to which the country gains an advantage on the battlefield.▪️Today, the so-called -people’s defense industry- has come into line with powerful defense enterprises - these are representatives of small and medium-sized businesses, talented young engineers, specialists.#digest #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: 🎬🖼 🇮🇱🇮🇷 This morning the Israeli security service Shabak re...
Description: 🇮🇱🇮🇷 This morning, the Israeli security service Shabak reported the detention of 73-year-old Ashkelon resident Moti Meman, who was allegedly recruited by Iran to assassinate prominent representatives of the Israeli authorities, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant. Meman himself was arrested back in August, but the investigation lasted all this time. It is noted that the accused provided all possible assistance to the special services and even thanked them for his detention, because he was afraid of further developments. According to the investigation, Meman was recruited in April 2024, while he was in Turkey. He held several meetings with Iranian businessmen and intelligence agents, after which he carried out various assignments: from photographing IDF facilities to transferring finances to anti-Israeli groups. At the last meeting, he was asked to organize assassination attempts on various individuals, allegedly as revenge for the murder of former Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh. At the same time, according to Meman, the Iranians presented this as the only way to avoid war. However, they were unable to agree on the amount of the reward, so the issue was postponed, and Meman himself went to Israel, where he was detained. 🔻It’s interesting that the Israeli media actively praise the actions of their own intelligence services, which in recent days have not only organized explosions of various devices in Lebanon and Syria, but also stopped a possible attempt at terrorist attacks. In turn, Arabic-language media perceived this news through the prism of the impending response from Iran, which has been expected since the end of July in response to the Israeli murder of the Hamas leader in Tehran. #Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇨🇳🇰🇷 Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get...
Description: 🇨🇳🇰🇷 Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get rid of any Chinese equipment installed at sensitive facilities, and in South Korea they are trying to keep up with this trend. It recently became known that surveillance cameras at some military bases in the Republic of Korea were made in China - they are now being removed en masse and replaced with others. We are talking about 1,300 cameras, the supplier of which, as the media write, initially claimed that they were not from China. According to intelligence information, the equipment could transmit video recordings abroad when connected to some Chinese server. South Korea claims that the cameras were not installed at the most sensitive military installations, located, for example, near the demilitarized zone separating the South from the North. Observation using this equipment was carried out mainly at training grounds. 🔻There may indeed be a grain of truth in this story, especially given the situation in the region. However, it is South Korean intelligence that is in charge of solving the problem, and it has recently become the epicenter of several major scandals related, for example, to the leak of data about agents. So even if the cameras weren't actually made in China, South Korea's intelligence agencies may be trying to improve their reputation and demonstrate their usefulness to the country's population through these types of news outlets. over 1,300 Chinese-made surveillance cameras at unitsSEOUL, Sept. 13 (Yonhap) -- The military has recently taken down more than 1,300 surveilla...

Title: 🖼 🇦🇿🇦🇲 About the military expenditures of Armenia and Azerba...
Description: 🇦🇿🇦🇲 About military spending in Armenia and Azerbaijan The news about reducing defense spending in Azerbaijan for the coming 2025 remained unnoticed in the Russian segment. Compared to 2024, the decrease was about 6.6%.📌 In the Armenian media, this was presented as an important step that the neighbors really strive for peace. And it really seems like this: the budget is actually being reduced. But for some reason everyone forgets about the numbers. For 2024, expenses ranged from 3.5 to 3.9 billion dollars, that is, the reduction will be up to 3.1 to 3.4 billion dollars. And this is the level of expenses for 2022-2023. Now the Azerbaijanis do not need to set very high standards, because Karabakh was taken without resistance. Therefore, cutting defense spending and focusing on the social needs of the country is natural. But the amounts are still high, considering how little the Armenians have spent on their army in recent years. And it’s curious whether this minor budget cut in Azerbaijan will be presented as a demonstration of peace?❗️Logically, Baku will probably expect a similar step from the Armenians, whose military budget already looks ridiculous. But if expenses suddenly increase in Yerevan, then the neighbors will have a new reason to accuse them of militarization and disruption of all agreements. By the way, the Azerbaijanis themselves train their units with enviable regularity. Recently, training took place for two border units in the north and south of the country, and Akıncı drones operate near the Armenian borders almost without interruption. High resolution mapEnglish version#Azerbaijan #Armenia@rybarSupport us
