Title: 🖼 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 About American missiles around China Cost the Ame...
Description: 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇵🇭 About American missiles around China As soon as the American military announced the imminent deployment of the Typhon medium-range missile system in Japan, new details emerged about the missile installation already in the Philippines. ▪️According to Reuters sources, the Americans do not plan to return equipment to the United States in the near future. ▪️In addition, Manila stated that Philippine and American troops continue to work with the missile system. They also do not know plans for its withdrawal, although the joint exercises in which Typhon arrived in the Philippines are ending this month.🔻Yes, such plans may suddenly appear. However, so far everything indicates that the scenario of deploying two American missile systems at once in the Asia-Pacific region is becoming more and more likely. Thus, China will be surrounded by American missiles on both sides. In this case, we should expect a response not only from China, but also from Russia - Vladimir Putin, for example, spoke about the appearance of medium-range missiles in the Philippines back in June of this year. In general, the actions of both the Americans and the Chinese could lead to the start of a new arms race in the region, for which, it seems, the preconditions are now being actively created. And the lack of plans to withdraw Typhon from the Philippines is proof of this. High resolution mapEnglish version#China #USA #Philippines@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: 🇬🇧🇷🇺 About the summons of the Russian Ambassador to the Briti...
Description: 🇬🇧🇷🇺 About the summons of the Russian Ambassador to the British Foreign Office After the decision of the Russian FSB to terminate the accreditation of six British diplomats from the embassy in Moscow, the head of the Russian diplomatic mission in the UK, Andrei Kelin, was summoned to the Foreign Office in connection with the advancement of -malicious and completely groundless accusations- In addition, the Foreign Office spokesman accused Russia of waging a -deliberate campaign- aimed at undermining and threatening the security of the UK, as well as curbing support for Ukraine through - disinformation, acts of sabotage in Europe, direct harassment and restrictions on diplomatic missions in Russia -. 📌Listening to such accusations is quite comical. Apparently, representatives of the Forrin Office forgot that they themselves are hindering the work of the Russian Embassy in their country. Almost six months ago, the British expelled Russia's military attache under a ridiculous pretext, without presenting a single piece of evidence of destructive activities.🔻Well, given the current geopolitical situation and tension in bilateral relations, Russia and Great Britain will certainly continue exchanging pleasantries in the diplomatic sphere. #Great Britain #Russia@rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usTelegramRybar🇬🇧🖇 About British spies in Russia and the intelligence activities of the British Foreign Office Today's announcement by the Russian FSB to stop accreditation of six diplomats from the British Embassy in Moscow is another illustration of the rule, which almost never happens...

Title: 🇩🇪🇰🇿🇺🇿 About Olaf Scholz’s visit to Uzbekistan and Kazakhst...
Description: 🇩🇪🇰🇿🇺🇿 About Olaf Scholz's visit to Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan An atmosphere of excitement was initially felt around the visit of the German Chancellor to Central Asia, with a visit to the two diplomatic capitals of the region, Samarkand and Astana. It is not surprising, given that this is the first visit of the head of the German government to the region in eight years - the last time was Angela Merkel, who visited Kyrgyzstan in 2016. Also, on October 17, a summit - Central Asia - Germany - was held, as a result of which the six leaders adopted a very framework declaration, and the real result was support for Kyrgyzstan’s candidacy for the post of non-permanent member of the UN Security Council for 2027-2028.📌Separate anti-Russian media are parallel to savoring the details , who would meet the important guest at the plane's ramp, assumed that agreements would be reached on investments in energy, labor exports, and even the joining of the leaders of Central Asian states to Western peace initiatives under the so-called. Ukraine.▪️But the reality turned out to be more prosaic. The first failure occurred in Samarkand, where the German leader first arrived. Despite reaching an agreement on simplified entry for highly qualified Uzbek specialists, Scholz apparently failed to reach a compromise on the return of Afghan refugees through Uzbekistan, although this was one of the conditions of the visit. Just as it was not possible to clearly answer the question of what Germany can offer to the region.▪️The meeting of the Chancellor with the President of Kazakhstan was frankly unsuccessful, at which Kassym-Jomart Tokayev dumbfounded his German counterpart with statements that Russia could not be defeated on the battlefield, that the Istanbul Agreements were a good chance for peace, and in the end canceling the joint press conference altogether.🔻After Vladimir Putin’s statements about the consequences of attacks on Russia with long-range weapons, Central Asia clearly became nervous. The escalation will inevitably affect them too, forcing them to abandon the policy of two chairs and profits from the transit of Russian gray imports. Therefore, a kind of cold shower for the chancellor with a reminder of possible irreparable consequences turned out to be the easiest way to signal his concern.#Germany #Kazakhstan #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport us

Title: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 How the Americans are trying to sell the non-existent pr...
Description: 🇦🇲🇺🇸 How the Americans are trying to sell the non-existent project of a new nuclear power plant to the Armenians. Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, speaking at the Pan-Armenian Forum in Yerevan, raised the issue of building a new nuclear power plant. Let us recall that the Armenian authorities intend to close the existing Metsamor nuclear power plant, which is maintained by Rosatom. Now its service life has been extended until 2036. According to some information, it is the West that is demanding the liquidation of the station, which generates about 40% of the electricity in the republic and provides the lowest tariffs for the population.▪️Now the key issue has become the choice of the contractor country, using the technology of which a new nuclear power plant will be built, similar to innovative small modular reactors ( MMR), which are considered safer. ▪️It is significant that Pashinyan stated that it was the Americans who made the greatest progress in the development of SMRs. However, this is clearly disingenuous, since the leaders in the field are precisely Russia and China, where stations of this type are already operating or are being built. ❗️At the same time, the Americans failed several of these projects for economic reasons. For example, last year the SMR project of NuScale Power Corp., which the United States promoted around the world, was loudly closed: its cost turned out to be 53% higher than planned. And this despite the fact that the project was actively advertised in Poland and Romania, but the Americans refused to build it even at home. ▪️It is critically important for the United States to stop the expansion of Russia and China in the export of nuclear technologies, but so far potential partners can only be lured with promises, not specific actions.  ▪️As we wrote, recently the Americans have been too active in the nuclear sector of Armenia and even announced that the Armenian authorities have applied to join the 123rd agreement, which gives access to US civilian nuclear technologies that do not yet exist.🔻However , despite the recent failure of a similar project, the Americans are promoting the same non-existent SMR project for Armenia, and Pashinyan is only happy to voice Washington’s marketing and political promises, which cannot be supported by anything. Needless to say, almost the entire energy and economy of the republic is at stake. #Armenia #Russia #USA  @rybarSupport usfinport.amPashinyan announced a strategic decision on a new nuclear power plant | Finport.am

Title: 🔁 #Summary for the morning of September 19, 2024 ▪️ In the Kursk...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 19, 2024▪️ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing near Vnezapny, Byakhovo and Obukhovka, Korenevsky district. There are battles going on northeast of Lyubimovka. In the Glushkovsky direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are attacking in the Medvezhiy area, are present in the Novy Put area, and reported battles in the Volfino and Krasnooktyabrsky areas. There were reports of the enemy using German Leopards and Swedish infantry fighting vehicles, which did not help him achieve success. ▪️ In the Kupyansky direction, our troops attack north and west of Peschany and south at Stelmakhovka. ▪️ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in Grodovka; on enemy maps it is almost completely occupied by our troops. The territory liberated from the Ukrainian Armed Forces around the recently captured Ukrainsk is expanding. To the south, battles are reported on the outskirts of Gornyak and in the Zhelanny First area. ▪️ North of Ugledar there are battles in the area of ​​Vodyanoy and the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine.▪️ In the Kherson direction, the Russian Armed Forces are purposefully destroying the enemy in the area of ​​the southern suburbs of Kherson, depriving him of transport and field warehouses. The enemy is shelling Aleshki, Kakhovka, Novaya Kakhovka, Velikaya Lepetikha, Dnepryany, Cossack Camps, Prince-Grigorievka, Malaya Lepetikha. ▪️ In the Belgorod region, a woman was killed as a result of daytime shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the village of Bezlyudovka, Shebekinsky urban district. In the city of Shebekino, a drone flew into the window of a social building. During work near Shebekino, a drone attacked a truck, the driver received multiple shrapnel wounds. In the Belgorod region, near the village of Nikolskoye, a kamikaze drone attacked a passenger car moving along the road. The village of Murom, Shebekinsky urban district, came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, two civilians were wounded. Yesterday morning in Shebekino, a service bus was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, four civilians were injured. ▪️ In the DPR, in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, a man born in 1964 was injured when an explosive object was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In Vladimirovka of the Volnovakha municipal district, a man born in 2001 was injured as a result of the detonation of an explosive object. Summary compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk region, district of the settlement. Cellars✨The role of our aviation in the Kursk region is difficult to overestimate. I am glad that it is often possible to minimize the time between the transfer of coordinates and a combat mission. Two majors and Smuglyanka’s detachment

Title: 🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Syrian state media report that the Idlib de-escalation...
Description: 🇸🇾🇺🇦🏴 Syrian state media reported that 250 Ukrainian military personnel arrived in the Idlib de-escalation zone to train militants - Hayat Tahrir al-Sham - in the use of drones.🔻The story of the cooperation of the Ukrainian regime with terrorist groups, which was first reported by Turkish publications, received its continuation. Now from Syria itself. From the point of view of the tactics of Ukrainian formations, this is not at all surprising. Whether in Africa or the Middle East, the only goal of the Ukrainian authorities, apparently, is to -annoy- Russia. And training militants to use UAVs is really something that the Ukrainian Armed Forces can teach terrorists, given how often Ukrainian units attack Russia with various drones at different distances. Moreover, the Syrian armed forces are not nearly equipped with the air defense systems that we have, which, under certain circumstances, can create a problem for our contingent throughout Syria. At the same time, if it became known about the arrival of Ukrainian formations in Idlib, then the recent airstrikes of the Russian Aerospace Forces in this area could well have been timed to coincide with this event. دريب -النصرة- على تصنيع المسيّرات - صحيفة الوطنأكد مصدر سوري مطلع وصول 250 إدلب لتدريب مسلحي تنظيم جبهة النصرة الإرهابي على تصنيع الطائرات من دون طيار، جاء ذلك بعد يوم من كشف مصدر سوري -مطلع- أن نظام كييف سلم مجم Well done...

Title: 🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 Chronicle of a special military operation on September 18, 2024, Ukrainian troops, during a night drone raid, attacked an ammunition warehouse in the village of Toropets, Tver region, liquidation of the consequences continues at the arrival site. In the Kursk region, Russian troops are expanding the zone of control in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts, The Ukrainian Armed Forces are not trying to gain a foothold on the outskirts of the Glushkovsky district. In the Kupyansky direction, Russian troops are advancing west of Peschany, expanding the bridgehead in the northern and western direction towards the Oskol River. In the Pokrovsky direction, fighting continues in the Grodovka area and in the fields north of the village. Russian troops control about 80% of the settlement. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces have expanded the zone of control in the Vodyanoy area, there are active clashes in the area of ​​the Yuzhnodonbasskaya-No. 1 mine.🔻A detailed analytical report on the events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @ rybar_plus_bot High resolution maps: Situation in the zone of special military operation (ru; en)#digest #Dzerzhinsk #report #Donetsk #map #Kupyansk #Kursk #Pokrovsk #Russia #Sumy #Tver #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

It would seem: now Lebanese society should... 🇮🇱🇱🇧 According to Channel 12, the Israeli Cabinet of Ministers gave the go-ahead to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Defense Minister Yoav Gallant to take any offensive or defensive action against Lebanon. Statements about the imminent start of the third Lebanese war in In this case, they are premature: as shown by the disruption of communications and attacks on Beirut, the Israelis do not need any kind of good to start a full-fledged war. This act, rather, falls into the treasury of provocations and whipping up a degree of hysteria, so that both the Iranians and the Lebanese would strike first preemptively. Such an outcome for the Israeli elite will be most necessary: ​​it will give them a free hand. Considering that the resonance from operations in the Gaza Strip and the West Bank is no longer enough to overcome protests and discontent, and the retention of power by the ultra-Orthodox is possible in the context of an ongoing conflict and eliminating the threat, provocations will continue until war breaks out. Well, even if the Lebanese and Iranians show amazing miracles of resilience, well, the Israelis will find a reason to justify their own aggression. Title: 🖼 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone ...
Description: 🇮🇱🇵🇸 Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for September 18, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, the Israeli army carried out another airstrike on one of the schools in the Al-Judaida area, where Palestinian refugees lived, citing intelligence data about the presence of militants in the building Hamas. In the south of the enclave, members of Palestinian forces remotely detonated a mined building, which included a group of Israeli soldiers. Four of them died. The usual raids by Israeli security forces to identify Palestinians associated with terrorists took place in the West Bank. A minor was shot dead in one of the settlements. A new series of explosions sounded in Lebanon, this time mobile phones, multimedia devices in cars and even household appliances detonated, resulting in fires in Lebanese homes.🔻A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @ rybar_plus_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: ↩️ 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the unexpected effect of undermining pagers and...
Description: Rybar: 🇮🇱🇱🇧 The day after the remote detonation of pagers, new explosions were heard in Beirut. This time, detonation of other devices is reported, including mobile phones, solar panels, electronic locks, car radios, and even kitchen... 🇮🇱🇱🇧 About the unexpected effect of detonating pagers and multimedia devices in Lebanon. Apparently, the Israeli ultra-Orthodox in power consider the plan for undermining pagers and multimedia devices is brilliant. It would seem: now Lebanese society should demand revenge, pushing both Hezbollah and the Iranians to hoist the next red flags of revenge and loud words about the inevitability of retribution. If the pro-Iranian formations start something, well, the Israelis will have a reason for self-defense, freeing their hands and demonstrating to the entire world community that they are the victims of insidious adversaries. That’s just the fact that almost ordinary multimedia devices provoked justified fears among buyers of such products: how will an iPhone or Samsung fly up into thin air, which by tragic accident turned out to be from another batch, over which the Mossad conjured? To be fair, we were still talking about radio stations and pagers of certain models, but the chaos that reigned added a huge number of other devices to this row - and the popular rumor no longer began to understand.❗️And these questions hit the business reputation of companies producing high-tech devices and microelectronics. It so happens that the ultra-Orthodox, in an attempt to provoke the Lebanese, have now gained close attention from the owners of the most influential companies in the world. Well, the traditional gesheft can turn into quite a Ukrainian zrada - so you have to be able to sit in a puddle (however, no one has canceled the folk wisdom of whoever you mess with - that’s how you’ll gain).#Israel #Lebanon @rybarSupport usTelegramRybar🇮🇱🇱🇧 The day after remote detonation of pagers, new explosions were heard in Beirut.
